this is the first time for us to do the tests, this may add uncertainty to the delivery date. 
Besides, there are always unpredictable issues occurred during the mold making process. This could add a variable to lengthen the
time to delivery as well.
However we promise to keep you all in the loop so you know how we are making
progress.


Who Are We?







rero is designed and built in Malaysia by Cytron Technologies. Cytron was formed by 5 undergraduates in the university lab 8 years 
ago. Together, we started the company by developing various kinds of microcontroller development boards to assist university students in completing their robotic projects. 
After years of uphill struggle, Cytron currently has 19 employees including 7 design engineers. We have developed over 100 products for universities, robotic labs as well as automation industry. All our current products are designed for advanced users. 
Over the years, however, we have had school teachers and parents telling us how keen their kids are to take up robotics and inquiring whether we have something for them to start with. That's why we created rero. 
Our ultimate aim is to bring down the learning curve so that even the young or non-technical person can have fun with robots and at the same time learn some new skills.

story:
Babooshka

I started Babooshka in 2011 shortly after the birth of my son Rowan. I had been crocheting items for him and people would stop and ask me where they could buy these items. This encouraged me to set up my own online shop and give it a go. What did I have to lose? 

It took off and I have been inundated with orders and have had a 6 week waiting list since February 2012. The only problem with crochet is- it takes so long! The orders keep coming in, but there is a cap on how much I can actually earn. So I had to start thinking of other ideas. 
I have dreamt about selling the beautiful yarn that I use to make my products. It took me 2 years of trial and error to finally find this brand which I love. It has such a beautiful range of colours, yarn weights and types, from Baby Merino to Chunky Alpaca. I would love to sell this yarn through Babooshka and I have already spoke to the suppliers and they would be happy for me to do so but they have a minimum first order amount and that is my problem. When I started Babooshka, I put every penny back into making new items and buying supplies so I never had a lump sum to start with. With the next step however- I do! 
This money is the only thing standing inbetween realising my dream of owning my own yarn store and I would be so grateful for any donations towards this. 

Thank you so much for taking the time to read this and even if you can't contribute, you can still help by sharing this with your friends and getting the word out for me.

story:
At the End of 2014, we introduced the Esington Glass to the world on Kickstarter. With incredible support from the community, the project raised $196,560 with 2272 backers! 

After years of testing and feedback from the community, we're back to solve the biggest problem in timeboxing today: interruptions.

When you get interrupted mid-sprint, you can now stop time. 

 

a new superpower, just for you

"Got my Esington today and I am ecstatic! I can't believe how great you handled everything. I am really impressed and grateful for putting this great idea out to the public... I just can't wait to change my life and discipline myself a step at a time to accomplish what I've always wanted to do." - Vanessa C, backer of the original Esington glass. 

Help us unlock the free acoustic base! Read more about the sound tests below.

Esington 2.0

Did you know the average worker gets interrupted after only 11 minutes of work? The crazy thing is it takes 25 minutes to get re-focused on the job. 

interruptions suck

With Esington 2.0, the magnetic time-stopper will keep your place in the sprint and act like a bookmark for your brain, waiting to be unleashed to restart your work.

Control Time

We invented a new way to control the time on your glass. Simply place the magnetic stopper over the neck of the glass and the timer stops!

 

a cool new magic trick - stop the flow of iron nanospheres with the silicone magnet

The magnetic stopper interrupts the flow of the solid iron nanospheres and keeps your place during your timeboxing sprint. 

About the Glass

Each glass is hand-blown borosilicate glass

For Esington 2.0, we are using borosilicate glass (like pyrex). Borosilicate glass is a type of glass that contains boron trioxide which allows for a very low coefficient of thermal expansion. This means it will not crack under extreme temperature changes like regular glass. It's a standard 25 minute timer designed for the Esington timeboxing method (similar to the pomodoro method with a few cue differences). 

4 million solid Iron nanospheres - more than 1 kilogram in each glass

For the timing medium, we are using solid Iron nanospheres. These work perfectly with the magnetic stopper since they are highly attracted to the embedded magnet. 

The most beautiful productivity timer ever made

The solid Iron nanospheres flow freely, even after thousands of magnetic stops. 

White Noise

Millions of solid iron nanospheres produce a soothing white noise for the first 20 seconds to act as a cue to start your work habit (more on this below).  Here's what it sounds like on different surfaces:  

 

Magnetic Silicone Stopper

The silicone stopper is designed to have a unique feeling and a satisfying soft "click" into place to stop the timer. This will make it easy to engrain the "bookmark for your brain", and bring you back exactly to where you left off your work when you're ready to resume.

An elegant addition to any executive desk

While the stopper is in place, your brain senses incompletion and will subtly pull you back to your work. You will get a satisfying reward when you pull out the stopper and unlock the timer.

We tested the prototypes thousands of stops and they work perfectly every time.

The Esington Method

The Esington Method is a timeboxing technique that is similar to the popular pomodoro method, but with a few important cue differences.

  • Turn off all distractions
  • Turn over the glass to activate the 3 cues
  • Work on a single task until your time runs out

Soft Stop

The Esington timer has a “soft stop”.  There are no annoying bells or beeps to signal the end of your cycle.  

The timer runs out gracefully.

Sometimes, your focus can take you well beyond 25 minutes, and that’s ok (especially if working on lower-energy tasks like answering emails).  You don’t want to lose a valuable train of thought.  Just be sure to rest proportionally to the energy spent working.

Why You Need the Esington Glass

  • If you’re not using a timeboxing system, this is the perfect way to start. The Esington Glass is simple, beautiful and is built to last. 
  • If you’re currently using a timeboxing system, you need to upgrade your timer.  Esington is beautiful, elegant and unique.  What does your current timer say about you?
  • Esington 2.0 is the perfect gift for someone you care about.

The Design Process

We made a 3d mockup of the magnetic stopper and then hand-cut a sample out of silicone. 

 

After a few iterations, it worked perfectly with the iron nanospheres!

We used solid iron nanospheres to work better with the magnetic stopper. We also found the the solid iron nanospheres worked much better at flowing smoothly because of the smoothness and uniformity of the nanospheres.

Specifications

The Large glass is our executive edition: 40% larger and 3x bigger. The Large glass has louder white noise. Both are 25 minute timers. Borosilicate glass with 4 million iron nanospheres.

The Large glass is our executive edition: 40% larger and 3x bigger. The Large glass has louder white noise. Both are 25 minute timers. Borosilicate glass with 4 million iron nanospheres.

To show off your glass in an elegant way, we are including a free cork base with each glass. 

 

Timeline and Expectations

July: Early bird orders ship

August: Regular bird orders ship

We have the prototypes ready and have lined up a primary and secondary manufacturer. We have 4 years of experience making these glasses so we are confident we can deliver on time. 

The solid iron nanospheres have been tested thousands of times and we're also confident we can secure high quality material. We also have 4 years experience quality testing these glasses, so we're confident in getting you a great product in a timely fashion. 

Feedback from our first campaign

"I'm going to add to the growing list of glowing reviews. You not only delivered early but also the packaging was outstanding protection. The glasses themselves are even more impressive than I imagined from the photos and I am more than happy with them. You have also been great with your updates and keeping your backers informed. This is how a Kickstarter should be run and I look forward to any future projects from you. Thank you.” - A. Woodham III

“Just opened mine- I was out of town when it arrived. It's beautiful and beyond expectations! Bravo Rudy- like so many others have said, this was an all-time great KS. Can't wait to back your next venture!!“ - Sherri

Mine showed up, Berkeley, CA -- looks amazing, congrats Rudy on running the best run campaign I have seen yet. - M. Manfrin

Why Help Us?

At Esington, we believe that within each of us lies the untapped potential of a great person. A person worthy of leaving a long-lasting legacy.  Our goal is to give you the tools you need to untap that potential.

We have the prototypes you see here.  They have been working flawlessly for months. We are asking for your help to get us to the minimum order quantity from the manufacturer.  In exchange for your pledge, we’re offering the first run at a discount. 

Click the back this project button and help us make Esington 2.0 a reality.

story:
Background

Cppcheck is a popular tool that can detect bugs in your code.

Cppcheck is a hobby project and therefore the available time to develop Cppcheck is very limited. We do not have time to fix as many tickets as we would want.

The tickets that have been selected now have been open for years - far too long.

story:
When you are up against a deadline, it can seem like nothing else matters. At one time or another, we have all experienced the stress and tension that deadlines cause, the way that they seem to creep up on us until we doubt whether or not we can even get the job done.

This frustration is unhealthy, and it is widespread in today's world. For many people, there is nothing as stressful as a looming deadline – and very often, we fail to find balance in our lives because of this stress, because we have fallen short on organization or collaboration somewhere along the way.

There is a solution. We call it Deadlain, and it is just the tool that you need to get ahead of your deadlines once and for all.

Never again will you find yourself wondering how you are ever going to keep up with the workload that you have in front of you or guide your project toward a neat and satisfying end. Deadlain is the productivity tool that you need to reclaim your personal and professional life once and for all.

 

 

How Deadlain Works

Through our user-friendly interface – available on iOS, Android, and web clients – you can chop your work and leisure time into smaller, more manageable pieces, setting deadlines for yourself so that nothing ever sneaks up on you or surprises you. Follow the progress of projects or deadlines in a live mode with a visual calendar-view. The program is designed for almost any industry: event management, hairdressing, graphic design, offices, short or long projects, appointments, home renovations or even leisure activities.
 

Deadlain's Features:

* Notifications

* Visual & legible totality

* Smart & uber-fast deadline adding/insertion

* Shareable & teamwork projects

* Shareable & teamwork deadlines

* Comments

* Attachments

* Reminders

We have engineered Deadlain to serve modern professionals, so whether you are a freelancer or part of a start-up, Deadlain can help you to overcome your fear of deadlines forever!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we are turning to you in order to raise the funds that we need to complete development Deadlain. More importantly, though, we want this campaign to serve as a jumping-off point for the Deadlain community, putting us in touch with entrepreneurs and established business people in order to get our platform out to the people who need it most. To show our appreciation for all your generous support, we are offering some limited-edition, campaign-exclusive rewards and beta access to the Deadlain platform (on the system of your choice).
 


The Impact

The world has come a long way since people started using paper calendars to plan out their days, weeks, and months. Our lives are busier, and we expect more of ourselves than ever before. For better or for worse, we need more efficient tools to keep ourselves on task and productive.

If you are tired of falling behind, tired of coming up short, tired of missing the goals that you have imagined for yourself, then Deadlain is just the tool that you have been waiting for. This is a productivity platform crafted for the success-minded – to put success within your reach!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Deadlain by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Get the word out about what we are doing and what Deadlain promises to do for professionals the world over! We appreciate all your support, and we thank you for your time.

Partners
Animated video: www.selitysvideo.fi | www.explain.me

story:
Nothing Penetrates the Tree (No damage to the tree)

Watch this video that shows that after the brace is removed, there's no damage on the tree. 


You may wonder, if nothing penetrates the tree, why doesn't the table fall? The belt fits snugly around the tree, and that causes the wooden pads to press onto the trunk of the tree.  This is what prevents the Tree Table from falling. In fact, the connection is sturdy.

The bark doesn't get damaged, because there is no sideways movement along the bark. There's only compression, which the bark handles fine.


Why I made the Tree Table

I am a computer programmer, and for decades I had to be indoors in order to work. There was always something missing to make working outdoors a reality. It was either battery power, or the internet, or the sun, or the lack of tables that made it impossible.  But this summer I found all the missing pieces, and finally began working outdoors.

I began by carrying a regular sized table with me, with tall legs (Roll-a-Table).  However, it occurred to me that a regular tree's trunk,  can be thought of as a table leg. By not requiring carrying the legs of the table, the table can be lighter. Second, the table can be mounted on a tree's trunk at any height, allowing to work standing, a variant that I prefer. 

I started looking for such a product, but couldn't find one. Instead, I found this patent which expired in 2001. So, I decided to make a prototype for myself based on that patent. When I started using it, people stopped, stared, and wondered. They said the Tree Table is a good idea, and that they would buy it. And so, I decided to manufacture it.

You can learn more about me at my borisreitman.com website, and I'm on Twitter, TikTok and Medium at @borisreitman .   Also, you can view my LinkedIn page.


What I Need & What You Get

If you support the campaign at $49, then you will get a copy of the Tree Table.

As perks, patrons will get a chance to see the plans and to make suggestions.

How I will use the funds:

  • The funds will go to produce the parts.
  • To pay for my own time managing the process of production.
  • To pay for any necessary consultation with a mechanical engineer about which off-the-shelf parts to use to manufacture at volume and low cost. 

I expect that it will take 3 months of work to create production plans and to identify the plants that will produce them. I allocate up to $30,000 for this stage.   This will include fees I must pay to contractors to help me do this. 

The remaining $70,000 will be spent to produce 2000 Tree Tables that I would ship to the funders, as the perks.  This means that production cost per table is at most $35. I will choose the kind of materials and production process that enable to produce at such cost.  (Note that funders pay extra $10 per table to cover shipping costs.)

 

The Keyboard Shelf

The keyboard shelf allows you to have a fully ergonomic setup for working many hours.  This removes the need to carry your on laptop raiser.  You can get the shelf as an add-on perk.
 

 

Carrying and Portability

The table disassembles and fits into a long bag that is convenient to carry.  Here's a photo of me carrying the prototype.

The aluminium brace and the frame disassembles completely, and packs tightly.  Because of the L-angle, one fits inside the other. Note that this is the prototype, the final product will pack even better. 


Dimensions & Weight

The Tree Table 29.5" wide (75cm), and slightly above 14" deep (36cm).   When packed, the stacked frame is 78cm long. 

The prototype weighs 6 lb. (3kg) and is made of light wood and aluminum. With the keyboard shelf, the prototype weighs an additional 2 lb. (1kg). 

If you don't have an external keyboard with you, you can leave the components for the keyboard shelf at home or in your car, so that it's lighter to carry the table around.

The final product will be lighter, since instead of wood planks, I plan to use light aluminum accordion tables, similar to existing camping tables.


Videos of the prototype in use

Video of mounting the Tree Table:



Disassembling the tabletop.  (Notice that the table wiggles side-to-side because I have released the side locks at the beginning of the video.)
 

 

 

Tips how to use the Tree Table

Here are some tips of how to get the most out of the Tree Table. Watch the video to see how accessories can be used to turn the table into a full ergonomic workstation. In the summer heat working in a tree shade works well. In the Spring and Fall, if it's too cold to work sitting, use a standing position to increase blood circulation. If your fingers get cold, buy regular cotton gloves, and cut off the fingertips.  Drink hot tea and wear a ski-hat to prevent heat from escaping.

 

Tree Table Workstation: Bring your own accessories

As you see in the video, I turn the Tree Table into a full ergonomic workstation. Here are some tips from my own experience to make the Tree Table your comfortable office for a full day of work.

Get the Keyboard Shelf to have a fully ergonomic table, without the need to carry your own laptop raiser.

For portable power that would last you a day (with MacBook Pro + LTE), you can use Rockpals 250 Wh lithium battery AC generator. It weighs 5.5 lb and I carry it inside my laptop backpack. (My backpack is the Incase ICON Slim.)  If you have a Windows or Linux laptop, rather than a MacBook, you probably don't need extra power for the laptop, but you will need a battery to recharge your mobile phone.

What about the Internet connection? Save watching YouTube videos for home, and your LTE data plan will last you a month. Also, check with your provider for something called a "Tablet Plan."  It's a second SIM card that supports only data, that one would put into a tablet. Instead of a tablet, put it into an older smartphone, and share the hotspot or tether to your laptop. Alternatively, put the data SIM card into a portable travel router which would give you a WiFi connection.

If you stay within city limits (by using city parks) you will have a strong LTE signal. If you go camping, far from cell towers, you will need to use a cellular signal booster.
 

The Impact

The Tree Table is an alternative to working in a coffee shop. With Covid-19 lockdowns, many people are trapped home. They also have little time to interact physically with coworkers.  When working in a park, each can be working at a tree far apart. You can also tell your friends to stop by to say hello.

You can also use the Tree Table if you have kids who want to play at a playground, while you want to get some work done. 

There are already tables in some parks, but they are rarely in a shade. With a Tree Table you get automatic shade, and cool in the summer. Thus, the Tree Table can enable more people to get outside, and enjoy the weather.
 

Risks & Challenges

I have not yet mass produced and shipped a physical product, and I will have to learn on the go. (I am a computer programmer by trade.)
 

Other ways you can help

If you can't contribute financially, you can help me by showing this project to your friends and posting it to your social networks.  You can use Indiegogo "share" tools.  Also, the Tree Table has a Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Tree-Table-10633187451...
story_txt:
Nothing Penetrates the Tree (No damage to the tree)Watch this video that shows that after the brace is removed, there's no damage on the tree. 
You may wonder, if nothing penetrates the tree, why doesn't the table fall? The belt fits snugly around the tree, and that causes the wooden pads to press onto the trunk of the tree.  This is what prevents the Tree Table from falling. In fact, the connection is sturdy.The bark doesn't get damaged, because there is no sideways movement along the bark. There's only compression, which the bark handles fine.


Why I made the Tree TableI am a computer programmer, and for decades I had to be indoors in order to work. There was always something missing to make working outdoors a reality. It was either battery power, or the internet, or the sun, or the lack of tables that made it impossible.  But this summer I found all the missing pieces, and finally began working outdoors.I began by carrying a regular sized table with me, with tall legs (Roll-a-Table).  However, it occurred to me that a regular tree's trunk,  can be thought of as a table leg. By not requiring carrying the legs of the table, the table can be lighter. Second, the table can be mounted on a tree's trunk at any height, allowing to work standing, a variant that I prefer. I started looking for such a product, but couldn't find one. Instead, I found this patent which expired in 2001. So, I decided to make a prototype for myself based on that patent. When I started using it, people stopped, stared, and wondered. They said the Tree Table is a good idea, and that they would buy it. And so, I decided to manufacture it.You can learn more about me at my borisreitman.com website, and I'm on Twitter, TikTok and Medium at @borisreitman .   Also, you can view my LinkedIn page.
What I Need & What You GetIf you support the campaign at $49, then you will get a copy of the Tree Table.As perks, patrons will get a chance to see the plans and to make suggestions.How I will use the funds:
The funds will go to produce the parts.
To pay for my own time managing the process of production.
To pay for any necessary consultation with a mechanical engineer about which off-the-shelf parts to use to manufacture at volume and low cost. 
I expect that it will take 3 months of work to create production plans and to identify the plants that will produce them. I allocate up to $30,000 for this stage.   This will include fees I must pay to contractors to help me do this. The remaining $70,000 will be spent to produce 2000 Tree Tables that I would ship to the funders, as the perks.  This means that production cost per table is at most $35. I will choose the kind of materials and production process that enable to produce at such cost.  (Note that funders pay extra $10 per table to cover shipping costs.) The Keyboard ShelfThe keyboard shelf allows you to have a fully ergonomic setup for working many hours.  This removes the need to carry your on laptop raiser.  You can get the shelf as an add-on perk.  Carrying and PortabilityThe table disassembles and fits into a long bag that is convenient to carry.  Here's a photo of me carrying the prototype.The aluminium brace and the frame disassembles completely, and packs tightly.  Because of the L-angle, one fits inside the other. Note that this is the prototype, the final product will pack even better. 
Dimensions & WeightThe Tree Table 29.5" wide (75cm), and slightly above 14" deep (36cm).   When packed, the stacked frame is 78cm long. The prototype weighs 6 lb. (3kg) and is made of light wood and aluminum. With the keyboard shelf, the prototype weighs an additional 2 lb. (1kg). If you don't have an external keyboard with you, you can leave the components for the keyboard shelf at home or in your car, so that it's lighter to carry the table around.The final product will be lighter, since instead of wood planks, I plan to use light aluminum accordion tables, similar to existing camping tables.
Videos of the prototype in useVideo of mounting the Tree Table:Disassembling the tabletop.  (Notice that the table wiggles side-to-side because I have released the side locks at the beginning of the video.) 

 

 
Tips how to use the Tree TableHere are some tips of how to get the most out of the Tree Table. Watch the video to see how accessories can be used to turn the table into a full ergonomic workstation. In the summer heat working in a tree shade works well. In the Spring and Fall, if it's too cold to work sitting, use a standing position to increase blood circulation. If your fingers get cold, buy regular cotton gloves, and cut off the fingertips.  Drink hot tea and wear a ski-hat to prevent heat from escaping. Tree Table Workstation: Bring your own accessoriesAs you see in the video, I turn the Tree Table into a full ergonomic workstation. Here are some tips from my own experience to make the Tree Table your comfortable office for a full day of work.Get the Keyboard Shelf to have a fully ergonomic table, without the need to carry your own laptop raiser.For portable power that would last you a day (with MacBook Pro + LTE), you can use Rockpals 250 Wh lithium battery AC generator. It weighs 5.5 lb and I carry it inside my laptop backpack. (My backpack is the Incase ICON Slim.)  If you have a Windows or Linux laptop, rather than a MacBook, you probably don't need extra power for the laptop, but you will need a battery to recharge your mobile phone.What about the Internet connection? Save watching YouTube videos for home, and your LTE data plan will last you a month. Also, check with your provider for something called a "Tablet Plan."  It's a second SIM card that supports only data, that one would put into a tablet. Instead of a tablet, put it into an older smartphone, and share the hotspot or tether to your laptop. Alternatively, put the data SIM card into a portable travel router which would give you a WiFi connection.If you stay within city limits (by using city parks) you will have a strong LTE signal. If you go camping, far from cell towers, you will need to use a cellular signal booster. The ImpactThe Tree Table is an alternative to working in a coffee shop. With Covid-19 lockdowns, many people are trapped home. They also have little time to interact physically with coworkers.  When working in a park, each can be working at a tree far apart. You can also tell your friends to stop by to say hello.You can also use the Tree Table if you have kids who want to play at a playground, while you want to get some work done. There are already tables in some parks, but they are rarely in a shade. With a Tree Table you get automatic shade, and cool in the summer. Thus, the Tree Table can enable more people to get outside, and enjoy the weather. 
Risks & Challenges
I have not yet mass produced and shipped a physical product, and I will have to learn on the go. (I am a computer programmer by trade.) 
Other ways you can help
If you can't contribute financially, you can help me by showing this project to your friends and posting it to your social networks.  You can use Indiegogo "share" tools.  Also, the Tree Table has a Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Tree-Table-10633187451...

story:
The Project - iVigil.  Empowering 200 million iPhone devices with a new viral cause marketing tool. World Peace and Women Empowerment are the first two causes that iVigil plans to promote.

The Promoters - We are a consortium of LinkedIn members building a technology platform that will potentially amplify the power of social networks in virally disseminating & mobilizing any popular cause across the planet instantly.

Why are we different?

Disruptive Technology – iVigil technology disrupts several industries that include social media, non-profit fundraising, cause marketing and creates new opportunities for mobilizing worldwide support to any popular campaign. Technologies that usually come for crowdfunding are incremental.

Huge Target Market & Unmet Need - Cause marketing/non-profit fundraising is a $300 billion industry in US alone. Much of that fundraising happens at the cost of 30-50 cents to a dollar leaving only 50-70% for the cause itself. iVigil can bring that cost to unbelievable 5-15 cents serving a substantial unmet need. http://www.vigils.us/business.html 

The Impact - Today there are 200 million Apple and 200 million Android active devices worldwide. iVigil technology can bring them alive in support of any cause, whether it is global peace, women empowerment, electoral support, solidarity or just a memorial for a hero. iVigil thus can have not only a direct access to 400 million smart device owners, but indirectly the entire world population.

Crowd Venture - World's first ever venture of the crowd, for the crowd, by the crowd (developed entirely in the virtual world of LinkedIn networkers). Our story has no protagonist. www.Crowdocracy.org 

Our Approach

Vigils, Visuals & Voice - Candlelight vigils are often held worldwide in support of various causes. They are mostly localized and require substantial manpower and logistic resources. Communications that connect easily with the masses are Visuals and Music. iVigil social networking strategy deploys both of these to appeal to the masses. At least the first two iVigil campaigns will be pre-empted with music video releases.

World Peace – Remembering history’s biggest peace protest of Feb 15, 2003, when 30 million people marched on a single day. www.feb15.org

Women Empowerment - http://ivigil.org/womane

Steve Jobs Memorial – http://ivigil.org/SteveJobs

iVigil in Media
Our pre-launch release of video got half a million views within the first 48 hours. http://www.youtube.com/ivigils 

Why Crowdfunding?
Firstly, iVigil itself is conceived and born in the crowd (http://linkd.in/IBFiPQ), and secondly, iVigil is a social media innovation that disseminates popular causes amongst crowds.  Crowd, is therefore the obvious choice for funding the project, as well as popularizing the project.

What if we surpass the goal?
Our current goal only helps us develop iVigil mobile app and produce a music video for World Peace with assistance from iVigil Consortium members.  iVigil is highly scalable, and reaching out to 400 million smart phone users globally is quite a daunting task, which will become a lot easier with every possible financial and moral support from our patrons.

Help us by spreading the word
Share us on LinkedIn and G+.  Share and like us on Facebook.  Like and favorite us on Youtube. Tweet and follow us on Twitter. 

Sign up to join us because, there is no cause bigger than saving humanity,  and there is no force like people united in their cause.  www.feb15.org 

WE LOVE  YOU.  THANK YOU.

story:
What is MyCloud?

If you had a computer that could do anything, what would you have it do?

Host your own website?

Create a file sharing service?

Be an email provider?

Share your pictures, movies and music?

Bring all of the services you pay for on the internet onto your own system so you wouldn't have to pay user or hosting fees?

Conduct your entire business in-house, including having remote access/telework from anywhere in the world with any web enabled device?

How about doing all of these things at the same time on a single, low-cost computer?

We posed the "what would you have it do" question to people all over the world and they responded in a very simalar way. 

"No more confusing privacy controls, no more big companies or hosting service controlling my information and my access or making me pay monthly fees use it.  I want my own private piece of the internet to create and share whatever and however I want".

So we got to work designing and building on that idea.

We came up with a platform like no other on the market today, it costs less than a mid-range computer and can do just about anything you want it to.

MyCloud is a scalable, flexible and affordable private cloud networking platform that can host multiple operating systems on the same machine, all running at the same time. Host a website, store and share your filee, photos and music, run your business and applications, create virtual workstations for your users and create a development network for your application developers all on the same single machine and run them all at the same time.

Best of all, you own it!  No more hosting fees, no more third-party data storage/cloud services, no more expensive data centers and no more complicated networks.

It's your own personal internet!

MyCloud is the simplest way to do everything on one machine.  The platform is a durable, light weight machine that weighs only about 20 pounds, but it’s powerful enough to host up to 25 different operating systems running at the same time, on the same single machine.  The MyCloud machine can host workstations, servers, domains, websites, storage, or just about anything you need.  It’s designed to be used in any environment, development or production or both,  

No more racks of servers.  No more data centers.  No more application or data hosting services. Just one small computer that can do it all better, faster and more securely.

The MyCloud machine also has core network devices built in.  It has a completely configurable Gig Ethernet router that connects directly to an ISP and a 4 port GIG Ethernet switch for connectivity to a Local Area Network.  The MyCloud machine is also a secure hotspot so local wireless devices can connect to it.

Simply put, it’s a hi-speed  data center, a Local Area Network and Network Area Storage all in one small, light weight machine.  And it’s built on inexpensive and open source software and hardware.

You still have access to the old internet.  MyCloud plugs right into your service provider.  But your information and data is safe and secure on a machine that you control.  You control who has access to it and what level of access they have, or you can just open it up to everyone (though, that’s not recommended).

NEW!: Now you can connect, manage and monitor your MyCloud from an iPhone or Android phone or from your iPad/tablet with a free, simple to use app! 

Application/Uses for MyCloud

The applications for the MyCloud machine are limitless, but here are a few to consider:

  • Host your own private social network and share with only those you want to.
  • Create private file and folder synchronization services (like Dropbox).
  • Migrate your business from third party hosting services to MyCloud.  Host your website, business applications and LAN on the same machine (The latest prototype has a fully configurable core network and a high speed wireless access point).
  • Create the next big video sharing service. 
  • Create the ultimate gaming platform for you and your friends.
  • Host your eCommerce site.
  • Create your own private cloud (because that’s where things are heading).

These are just a very small sampling of what you can do with it.  MyCloud can be whatever you want it to be.  It’s only limited by your imagination.

Meet the Design Team

 

YOU are the design team for MyCloud.  Only you are in any position to say what YOU want.  We listened to you when we initially designed this, and we will continue to listen to you as we move forward.  You tell us what you want it to do and we will build it into future designs. The MyCloud is your cloud, after all.  Just tell us your ideas on Twitter #freemydata and we will take your ideas and put the best ones into future versions of MyCloud.

We also like to give credit where credit is due,  Have a great idea for MyCloud?  If enough people like it, we will build it in MyCloud with you as the lead designer!

You can also email your ideas to itsmyidea@inevolvesb.com.

Be sure to include your name and valid email address to we can give you credit.

Where we are now

Currently we have built the final prototype and we have established and finalized partnerships with VMware, Microsoft, HP, Cisco and a manufacturing company to built and manufacture the MyCloud machine.

What’s next

There are costs associated with mass-producing this machine, but they are very low. We built the prototypes on a shoe string budget (old computer parts and a tax refund).  Now we need to produce a final product and bring it to market.  We have no doubt that once this gets out to owners, it will change the world. 

We are excited about this system and will do whatever it takes (days, nights, weekends and holidays) to finish it and get it ready to free people from the big tech companies that control the internet no later than the beginning of the first quarter 2013 (January).

Your support of this project will help us build the final product and get it ready and shipping.

This is about getting a truly innovative product in the hands of every computer user on the planet.  We want to start shipping as soon as humanly possible because the 3rd cloud computing cycle is about to end.  And when it does, your personal data that is stored on it goes with it.  You will need to free it before it does or it will belong to everyone (just like the last 2 times when it happened).

Project Updates

We believe in free and open communication on the status of our projects.  We will provide weekly updates here on Indiegogo and on our blog!  

Follow us on Twitter: @reclaimmydata

MyCloud Blog: blog.reclaimmydata.com

The full project document can be found in the gallary tab.  It includes prototype and testing information.

Thanks for supporting us!

story:
Short Summary

Nowadays, a group of people with similar interests is generally called ‘a community’. For us, the definition of ‘community’ implies rules and restrictions. We believe that good/unique ideas and pieces of work can be created only without adhering to rules. Be wild and free! That’s why we are called Tribe of Inspiration. When saying ‘Tribe’, we imagine something wild and savage. That’s who we are!

We are honoured to introduce you to Planner by the Tribe of Inspiration. No more post-its and missing scribble notes! Everything that’s important can finally be found in one journal!

This planner is for everyone: managers, designers, teachers, and even stay-at-home moms!

 

Take a tour in virtual planner HERE !

 

Technical information:

  • It has a handy size – 5.5 x 8.5 inches (140 mm x 215 mm) –, thus making it easy to carry and, at the same time, having enough space for notes.
  • The cover is made of artificial leather: a soft material that’s pleasant to hold in one’s hands.
  • The certified and environmentally friendly paper – Munken Pure 100 gr – is not too bright and has a rather mild shade.
  • Bookmark – for easy access to the current week.
  • 272 pages

First page

Full calendar of 2017 and 2018

Weekly spread – TWO spreads for each week!

First spread of the time plan

  • Handy time plan in one spread
  • Weekly layouts (Monday - Sunday) run from January 2017 - December 2017
  • Marked time schedule from 6 am to 6 pm and a free space at the bottom to mark your own time plan.
  • Daily schedule divided into 1-hour sections (you can use the half-hour when necessary).
  • Daily To-do list.

Second spread with a free space

  • two free pages for notes, creating, drawing, writing, sketching, generating, painting, composing, creating poetry and doing WHATEVER you LOVE!

Monthly view

  • Each month begins with an inspiring picture and a phrase followed by the plan of the whole month.

 

List of books, movies and useful information – a space to write down

  • books you want/plan to read;
  • movies you want/plan to watch;
  • useful web sites, company addresses, interesting sightseeing places and other information.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to start the production of the planner, we need to order at least 600 copies of paper journals. By supporting us, you receive a great opportunity to become an owner of the planner by the Tribe of Inspiration!

When choosing perks, please pay attention to the term of delivery. For the delivery in November and December, the number of copies is restricted, so don’t miss it!

 

Risks & Challenges

Our team is experienced in project management, design, as well as printing and polygraphy. Although we have managed everything on time, there is still a slight risk of exceeding the delivery term. As the post offices are very busy at the end of the year, we will do everything that’s in our power for you to receive the planner on time. International customers also assume the liability for any customs and import charges due upon delivery.

The Planner by the Tribe of Inspiration is under Copyright protection and may not be produced, distributed, or used for commercial or personal purposes without our express permission.

If you have any questions or comments, we would love to hear from you.  You can email us at tribeofinspiration@gmail.com.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford the paper copy, please feel free to buy it in PDF format and share this campaign on your Facebook timeline.

Also, you can always help us by sending positive vibes and by sharing the campaign on your social media profiles or by telling your family and friends about us!

List of books, movies and useful information – a space to write down

books you want/plan to read;
movies you want/plan to watch;
useful web sites, company addresses, interesting sightseeing places and other information.



 
 
 

What We Need & What You Get
In order to start the production of the planner, we need to order at least 600 copies of paper journals. By supporting us, you receive a great opportunity to become an owner of the planner by the Tribe of Inspiration!
When choosing perks, please pay attention to the term of delivery. For the delivery in November and December, the number of copies is restricted, so don’t miss it!


 
Risks & Challenges
Our team is experienced in project management, design, as well as printing and polygraphy. Although we have managed everything on time, there is still a slight risk of exceeding the delivery term. As the post offices are very busy at the end of the year, we will do everything that’s in our power for you to receive the planner on time. International customers also assume the liability for any customs and import charges due upon delivery.
The Planner by the Tribe of Inspiration is under Copyright protection and may not be produced, distributed, or used for commercial or personal purposes without our express permission.
If you have any questions or comments, we would love to hear from you.  You can email us at tribeofinspiration@gmail.com.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot afford the paper copy, please feel free to buy it in PDF format and share this campaign on your Facebook timeline.
Also, you can always help us by sending positive vibes and by sharing the campaign on your social media profiles or by telling your family and friends about us!

story:
Meet Dotag

 

 

 

The World's Simplest Worksite Documentation Software

 

 

Why use pen and paper when you can go digital?

 

Dotag was designed to take you away from complicated, messy worksite visits all the way to clean and easy reporting using only a mobile device.

 

 

 

 

Are companies already using Dotag?

 

Why yes, they do! The people in the video below have been using the earlier version of Dotag for years. Take a look at what they have to say.

 

 
 

 

 

You may have seen us on

 

 

Have I used something like this before?

 

Probably not. Dotag’s approach to worksite digitalization is different from your typical software solutions. It is a simple application that focuses on the things you actually need and it does it really well. 

It adds your markup and the data around it to the precise location. It's as simple to use as pen and paper. Only digital.

 

 
 

 

How does the app work and what does it look like?

 

Glad you asked! All you need to start using DOTAG is a mobile device. Just install the DOTAG app and you’re ready to go. Take a look at some of our cool features:

 

 

 

 
 

Comparison and differences between our competitors

 

Our goal is to disrupt the worksite digitalization industry by designing a solution that addresses the major consumer pain points of existing solutions.

 

What do I get if I pledge?

 

Glad you asked. At the 69 EUR package and above, your’re getting:

  • Digital certificate
  • Company or personal name on our website’s supporters list
  • T-shirt

 

How do subscriptions work?

 

We have packages for any team size, take a look:

 

What systems will it support?

 

Dotag is designed to work on any mobile device. It works on Android and iOS as well. 

Dotag Manager (the Saas component) works on both Windows and MacOS operating systems.

 

 

 

Meet the team

 

 

Why we need your support

 

By now you’re probably asking why we’re doing this crowdfunding campaign if we have a finished product.

Well, the first reason is that since our launch in 2019, we have gathered a lot of feedback from the companies already using our tool.

And even though we received a lot of positive feedback for our simple and user friendly UI, the companies have been asking for new features.

This demand lead to us to renewing the whole software. And development costs a lot of money.

We already applied for government funding here in Finland, which we got this year, and we have already gathered enough funds to complete about 70% of the new requested features.

According to our calculations, we are still short of 30.000-40.000 euros to complete the demands. 

The second reason is that we also want to help and serve companies in other countries and expanding into new markets is not that easy.

We really hope you will back us on our campaign. If you can chip in and donate thank you so much!

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Our team has extensive experience in developing software so we do not see any issues moving forward in this regard.

We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however, please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues.

We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable with our team in place. Product specifications may change to ensure that the product is of the highest quality and bug free. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of the crowdfunding page. Since this is a crowdfunding project, please ensure you read the above points in advance. Please do not hesitate to contact us at aki.vanska@dotag.com. We look forward to answering any questions you may have. Thank you!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Help us spread the word! Know someone who could benefit from Dotag? Let them know. You can also share our campaign on social media. Thank you!

story:
ANGL.TV WorldView

Be part of the live stream revolution

 

A Groundbreaking Solution for Crowdsourcing Reality

For those Adventurers living in the Information age: our advanced homepage collects live stories and classifies them by events, geographic locations and by further exciting functions to provide you the most easily searchable system available. You can see live videos from popular social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Periscope on one site.

There was a fantastic app called ANGL, which has won its founders the Innovation Contest. Since then, the founders have been far from idle. Instead, they have been eagerly improving and are now ready to launch ANGL.TV, with the knowledge collected during the years the ANGL app has been active. Social media platforms aren’t interested in providing you cross-platform access to live streams, and overall in providing the top live streams from the millions of them. This is why we have created this platform-independent site: to have a great live stream adventure for people who don't want to miss out on the biggest stories.

 

The most effective way of accessing the top live streams

ANGL.TV is not a prison for videos. We are collecting only the hottest content on Earth: user-generated live streams. It is just so much more complex and interesting. Live streams flow from everywhere to ANGL.TV, just for you to add your ECHO to the streams you like. With your ECHO you vote for the best ones to stay on for longer. But without ECHOes, the live stream must go. We're not storing uninteresting videos that nobody gives an — ECHO.

We offer the fastest news flow with a time-saving algorithm. And the icing on the cake is that it's a worldwide experience. Our interface is the newest and most fun way of keeping up with the best stories across the web. The renewed ANGL is very smart-and-special: our Artificial Intelligence system memorizes your interests and offers you the most exciting top live streams in a non-invasive yet personalized way. Using ANGL.TV WorldView you can participate the coolest event and save time at the same time. Amazing, right?!

 

Missing out on the most significant events? With ANGL.TV WorldView it is not an option! You can be wherever, whenever and you can know whatever you want to.  With ANGL.TV You can attend the most notable events in the world in real time and experience them with the local video creators and the live streams. So you can experience the stories - whether from a coffee house sipping a latte macchiato or from the comfort of your bed. Be wherever in the world, whenever you want with the ANGL.TV website.

 

But the list of innovations do not stop here. We are working on the world’s first live stream system with API. The ANGL Open Api is a special function - the live stream providers can integrate their videos to our system. Soon according to our plans you can find all the available and exciting streams in a personalized way on ANGL.TV!

 

 

5 reasons to support ANGL.TV on Indiegogo

 

1. Joy of unexpectedness.

ANGL.TV WorldView is the next level. It's the future of having fun online and watching news at the same time. Yes, we know live streams sometimes can be boring - but not in our system. You can count on that.

 

2. Getting the top stories first-hand.

There are sites which focus on videos, but until now there hasn’t been an interface such as ANGL.TV, which works with the top live streams. In every topic.

 

3. You create the news.

Watching live streams isn’t the same as watching just everyday videos. It happens real-time and what is more, you can also participate in it real time and talk to the live stream creator. You are really the part of it, you can lead the direction of the live stream.

 

4. Easy-to-find live content of your choice.

We offer a personalized flow of live content. One of our strongest features is personalization: ANGL stores your interests and offers you the most exciting live streams in a non-invasive, yet personalized way.

 

5. These functions are just the beginning.

Last, but certainly not least... we are full of great ideas about new and exciting live streaming functions & listings. Imagine what an astonishing feature would it be, for example, to search for live streams by the people tagged. And our developers are geniuses, so it’s on you. ANGL.TV WorldView is a huge initiative - but it could become bigger still.

 

     

     

    Meet the people behind ANGL.TV

    András Kövécs, the founder of ANGL has been active in the area of live streaming for 10 years. He saw that live streaming is on the rise and it is changing the way that news is viewed in a few different ways. Not only did he realise the strengths of it, he saw the weaknesses of live content as well. This is why ANGL.TV WorldView was created: to offer a solution for live stream viewers and creators. With Miklós Pálfy, Chief Technology Officer at ANGL and with the other talented team members, ANGL.TV's mission is to provide the best live streaming adventure one can have on this unique, cross-platform webpage.

     

     

    In togetherness, castles are built

    We aim to raise funds to maintain and develop further ANGL.TV WorldView’s system with the feature-set you want. Your name will become a part of ANGL.TV and we’ll reward your support with premium features and more!

    We’ll use the 34 900 $ fund for:

     

     

    Support Email Address

    If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact our Campaign Manager, Márta Makra.

    E-mail address: makra.marta@angl.tv

story:
Have you ever been guilty of wishing there was more time in the day?

If you said YES, are you also a later riser? Those who wake up early claim that they rarely wish for more time. On the other hand, those who sleep later literally have fewer hours in their day before they need to head to bed again.

Did you know?

Early risers tend to make more healthy decisions when it comes to food.This can be broken down in this way: early risers start their day with a good breakfast. A late riser might skip on the breakfast and then, in their hunger, make the easier choice for lunch over the healthiest. Those early risers who had a healthy breakfast are much more likely to eat a smaller and more planned out lunch.

 

Clocky- The World’s Smartest Alarm Clock

Clocky makes an early bird out of everyone. Wake up and get everything done on time.

We present to you Clocky, a device that will put a stop to all of your problems in the morning by getting you  out of bed on time. We have designed a device that makes you get up and start your morning routine whether you want to, or not. But, you will be doing this with the coolest new device and your favorite playlist by your side.

Rise and shine sweetheart!

 

 

How it works?

Clocky is an alarm clock, and in order to turn off the alarm in the morning you must set it on the first base. It has no snooze button. Once Clocky is on the first base it will automatically turn the alarm off and your playlist will start playing. After your time at the first base is finished the alarm will turn on again, and this will let you know that you need to move on to the next base. When set on the next base the music will continue. This process keeps repeating itself, depending on how many bases you set.

It will let you organize your time and your morning routine.  From the moment you open your eyes until the moment that you will walk out the door to tackle the new day ahead of you.

Plan the time you wake up, and believe us that you won’t have the chance to oversleep, because Clocky is not an ordinary alarm clock. It will force you to get out of bed and make the first step towards a new day.

Where do you usually go after you open your eyes in the morning? Most people go to the bathroom to get their morning hygiene done. Clocky is not a device with a single base, but has as many bases as you need. It is simple. The main device wakes you up and in order to stop the alarm, you will need to put it on top of the first base, which for example is in the bathroom.

 The first step is made . Plan with the help of the mobile app, how much time you need in the bathroom, so you will manage everything. Clocky will notify you 5 minutes before you need to go to the next base.

Put bases throughout your home depending on your morning routine and clocky will help you by telling you when you need to go to the following base.

Once out of the bathroom you need to go get dressed, so set your next base next to your closet and set how much time you need there to get ready.

Once dressed, set a base in the kitchen, because breakfast is the most important meal of the day, so never miss it.

After breakfast, set a base next to the door and place Clocky on it until you return home after you are finished with your day.

The key to success is organizing your time accordingly, and understanding how important this is.

What stage is Clocky at:

Testing Clocky prototype:

 

 

First samples are finished and tested.

 

FAQs:

Q- What is Clocky?

A- Clocky is a smart alarm clock that gets you out of bed. You must get out of bed in order to turn the alarm off.

Q- How do I set Clocky?

A- Clocky is set through the mobile application, like the alarm on your phone.

Q- How do I turn off the alarm?

A- This is the whole concept of Clocky, and that is that you will have to get out of bed to set Clocky on the base. You decide where this base is set. It can be your bathroom, kitchen, living room etc.

Q- How many bases do I need?

A- You can use as many bases as needed for your morning routine. This can be one base, or more bases to organize your morning. Each base will get you to a new checkpoint that will organize you to leave the house on time.

Q- How do I set the alarm sounds?

A- Clocky will use your phones sounds.

Q- Is it water resistent?

A- Clocky is splash resistant. Don't try to put it in water, or this will be the last base for it. :)

Any other frequently asked questions will be added here during the campaign.

story:
A PLANNER MADE JUST FOR NONPROFITS BY A NONPROFIT

 

What’s different about this planner? EVERYTHING.

It is made for nonprofit centric people at every level.

  • Directors
  • Paid and Volunteer Staff
  • Board Members
  • Regular Volunteers
  • And More!

 

The EXPLORE MORE NONPROFIT PLANNER is a 6-month, undated planner (and yes the image above is a TRUE prototype) that allows you to build on the passion you have for the nonprofit you love. It challenges you to look at all aspects of your nonprofit, helps you organize the nonprofit's work, also helps you track personal tasks and creative endeavors!  

It is composed of:

  • 1x  6-Month Planner - See your entire 6 months and plan weeks in advance. Size is 9.25 (tall) by 6.25 (wide).
  • 6 Monthly Spreads - Plan for the current and upcoming month. See what's happening right now and look back on what you have accomplished. 
  • 26x Weeks - Organize your tasks and events in detail for the current and upcoming week. Each day of the week has a dedicated FULL page!
  • 6 Goal Planning Spreads - Track your goals, stay motivated, and improve your overall success.   
  • Lined and Dot-Grid Note Pages -  Includes 20 lined pages and 20 dot-grid pages for you to use however you need.

 

Get one for yourself and for all of those who are ready to explore more and take your nonprofit forward.

Why is this being marketed through Indiegogo? The planner is already fully designed and a prototype has been produced. But before we can go into mass production we need support to help fund the remainder of the project. The goal we need to reach is just $4,500.00 in total and then we will be able to move to production.  Read more about Indiegogo in the FAQ section.

     

     

    Sneak Peak at Planner Spreads

    We kick things off with a few WHO YOU ARE spreads. This allows you to take time to evaluate who you are as a nonprofit. What you do great at. What you might need to improve. We ask you questions so you can reflect. This helps get you in the right place and start determining some of the key areas you might want to focus on.

    _______________________________________________________________________

     

    We have a dedicated spread for each of the five core areas. These core area spreads contain the weekly activities you will be prompted to turn to throughout the planner.  We have set the planner up so that one week you focus on EXPLORE and that will prompt you to turn to the EXPLORE spread to complete an activity. The next week might be a motivational quote or quick activity or a goal check week. The weeks alternate so that every other week you will have a main core activity that relates to BRAND, PEOPLE, EXPERIENCE, PARTNERS, or EXPLORE and that is followed by something motivational or a quick activity.

    _______________________________________________________________________

     

    After the core area spreads we have six goal spreads. These are not spreads where you simply write down a goal. We will help you break the goal down so you can really understand what it will take to accomplish the goal. Ultimately making it actionable and rewarding.

    _______________________________________________________________________

    Here is a peek at the weekly/daily layout. Each week starts with either an activity related to one of the five core areas, a motivation quote, a quick activity, or is dedicated for a goal check-in week. After the weekly introduction page, each day of the week (Mon-Sun) has a dedicated page for you to manage and own the day!

    _______________________________________________________________________

     

    MORE THAN A PLANNER THOUGH

    Of course you can handle normal task tracking and appointments with this planner, but that is not the core focus. The focus is on motivating you and to get you thinking outside of the box for your nonprofit. This all starts with "WHO YOU ARE."

    • Who is your nonprofit?
    • What is the vision/mission?
    • Strengths?
    • Opportunities? 

    Once we can lay the foundation, we can start digging deeper. This planner has been created around five core areas: BRAND, PEOPLE. EXPERIENCE, PARTNERS, and EXPLORE. 

    What’s the story behind these core areas? We wanted more than just a task tracking planner. We wanted to create a method, a flow that would truly create motivation and action and growth. So after our research and brainstorming and holding focus groups we determined five core areas that we could tie everything back to.

     

     

    FIVE CORE AREAS 101

    BRAND - Brand is how the world sees your organization and the work you do. Brand is the ability to build a loyal tribe.

    PEOPLE - Having the right people in the right places means everything. Ensuring those people are inspired, committed, and invested in your nonprofit’s success can bring more success than any one strategy. 

    EXPERIENCE - Every interaction creates a different experience for your followers. From your website to your social accounts to your events, and more—every touch point means something.

    PARTNERS - Who is in your village? Who can you add? Who can you learn from? Are you networking in the community? What actions do you take to be a good partner?

    EXPLORE - There is always room to improve and think outside of the box. The EXPLORE section is all about going down paths you have not gone down before to take your nonprofit to new heights. Get ready to EXPLORE and create some magic.

     

     

     

     

    Check Out The Planner with Co-Creator Ashley

     

     

    MEET THE CREATORS: SHAWN AND ASHLEY

    There are 1,000’s and 1,000’s of planners and journals out there. Some of them are incredible and fun and motivating. Honestly, we love looking at and trying out new planners. And maybe that love/interest is where it started. Or more likely, it probably started with our passion for nonprofits!

    “How many planners do you own Shawn?” – Ash.

    “You know the answers to that… but probably a bookcase shelf or two.” – Shawn

    During all of our research over the past several years we realized that there are so many planners specifically designed for entrepreneurs or artists or moms or business leaders, but nothing that really hits home for nonprofits.

    That got us thinking. We are nonprofit centric people. We need something to help us grow. Let’s create something. And that is where the EXPLORE MORE vision started.

    So, our research continued. Testing. Creating. Designing. Focus groups. Trial and error. Interviews. And more research.

    And we finally arrived and something we think is great and are so excited to share it with you—EXPLORE MORE Nonprofit Planner.

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Shawn Logan, director of a nonprofit (plus dad, husband, entrepreneur, community networking elitist, to name a few)

    Ashley Brown, board member of a nonprofit (plus wife, mom, software sales manager, marketer, health guru, and ski lover)

    Did we mention we are great friends and have been working together for a decade on nonprofit work? We get it. We want to help. And we created a planner for you, for us, for nonprofits. We are excited for you to start your journey and cannot wait to hear about it!

     

    Have feedback? Questions? Email us!

     

     

    _______________________________________________________________________

     

    Another Reason to Support Us...We're Giving Back!

    We are proud to note that $1 from each planner purchase will go to Smiles for Jake!

    Smiles for Jake’s mission is to be a suicide prevention movement that spreads positivity through life-affirming actions, listening ears, and the message that everyone should have hope. Born in and spreading from a community that experienced the suicide of a beloved son, our short-term goal is to reduce the suicide rate and our long-term vision is to stomp out suicide worldwide.

    #stayhooked

     

     

    ______________________________________________________________________

     

     

    Manufacturing

    Explore More is keen on delivering high-quality valuable products that add value to your life. Our product is beautifully designed and equally well-manufactured. In terms of manufacturing, we know that a perfectly designed product is nothing without proper execution and hence we've partnered with a manufacturer (after tremendous amounts of research) who has been making planners for years and knows how to produce a true masterpiece. We are confident in the work they will produce for our backers. Manufacturing and shipping has many moving parts, but we've planned things ahead of time and already have our prototype complete and all materials secured for full manufacturing.
story_txt:
A PLANNER MADE JUST FOR NONPROFITS BY A NONPROFIT What’s different about this planner? EVERYTHING.It is made for nonprofit centric people at every level.
Directors
Paid and Volunteer Staff
Board Members
Regular Volunteers
And More!
 The EXPLORE MORE NONPROFIT PLANNER is a 6-month, undated planner (and yes the image above is a TRUE prototype) that allows you to build on the passion you have for the nonprofit you love. It challenges you to look at all aspects of your nonprofit, helps you organize the nonprofit's work, also helps you track personal tasks and creative endeavors!  It is composed of:

6 Monthly Spreads - Plan for the current and upcoming month. See what's happening right now and look back on what you have accomplished. 
26x Weeks - Organize your tasks and events in detail for the current and upcoming week. Each day of the week has a dedicated FULL page!
6 Goal Planning Spreads - Track your goals, stay motivated, and improve your overall success.   
Lined and Dot-Grid Note Pages -  Includes 20 lined pages and 20 dot-grid pages for you to use however you need.

story:
FOREWORD

Hi, please let me introduce myself, I'm Fery Hartono, the founder of my current business - Business Excellence Consulting and the founder of the future ELbiz Business Problem-Solving Guide Platform. I already established Business Excellence Consulting 18 years ago and have  served more than 200 companies, ranging from Small to Medium Businesses, State-Owned Companies, Large Companies/Corporations with Local and Global Scale (you can find out more about our details in our website www.business-excellence.co.id). Our core services in business consulting are business plan development, new business design, organisation alignment, business process improvement and human capital management.

Let us talk about Indonesia, my country. With around 262 million people (2017), Indonesia is one of the largest economy and fastest growing countries in Asia, where these people are well familiar with smartphone and internet. There are 143,26 million smartphone users and 100 million internet users across Indonesia, with more than 40% of the population itself (107 million people) are working in Micro Businesses and Small to Medium Enterprise (SME). According to Ministry of Cooperative and Small - Medium Enterprises (2017), there are more than 59,2 million of Micro Businesses & Small to Medium Enterprises in Indonesia.

After 18 years working as a business consultant here, I realized that there is a gap between big companies and Micro Businesses & SME in terms of business best practices. Big companies can often engage in local & global consulting firms, training providers as well as market research companies to improve their capability to sustain the growth of their business. In comparison, Micro Businesses and SME have limited budget to build up their skill, knowledge and capability about management.

My experience of encountering different types of business problems as a business consultant encourage our consultant team to take the initiative to fill this gap by creating ELbiz as Business Problem-Solving Guide Platform for Micro Businesses and SME in Indonesia. We are going to provide an online business Problem-Solving Guide Platform that is easy to be accessed and at a very affordable price. Furthermore, we are going to develop it using our years of experience in business consulting which is supported by our consultant team.

WHAT IS Micro Businesses & SME in Indonesia? 

  • Micro Businesses:
    • Businesses with revenue up to IDR 300 Million (USD 21,500) per year.
    • Asset is up to IDR 50 Million (USD 3,450).
    • Operated by Owner and Worker.
    • Number of Employees & Worker up to 10 people.
    • According to Ministry of Cooperative and Small - Medium Enterprises (2017).
  • Small Businesses:
    • Businesses with revenue between IDR 300 Million – IDR 2,5 Billion (USD 21,500 – USD 172,413) per year.
    • Asset is between IDR 50 Million – IDR 500 Million (USD 3,450 – USD 34,500).
    • Operated by Owner, Supervisor, Staff and Worker.
    • Number of Employees & Worker up to 30 people.
    • According to Ministry of Cooperative and Small - Medium Enterprises (2017).
  • Medium Businesses:
    • Businesses with revenue between IDR 2,5 Billion – IDR 50 Billion (USD 172,400 – USD 3,450,000) per year.
    • Asset is between IDR 500 Million – IDR 10 Billion (USD 34,482 – USD 690,000).
    • Operated by Owner, Manager, Supervisor, Staff and Worker.
    • Number of Employees and Worker more than 30 people.
    • According to Ministry of Cooperative and Small - Medium Enterprises (2017).
  • More than 98% of Indonesian Companies are Micro and Small Businesses.
  • By 2017, there are 59.2 million Micro Businesses and SME in Indonesia (Based on Indonesia National Statistics Bureau).

THE CONDITIONS of Micro Businesses and SME in Indonesia  

    • Micro Businesses and SME can not afford to engage business and management consulting (local & global consulting) to improve their business and management performance.
    • Micro Businesses and SME owner commonly face difficulties in areas of marketing, sales, operation, logistic, human resource, accounting & finance as well as business development because they do not get enough best practice knowledge to fix their problem. Therefore, their insufficient knowledge about business best practice will always position big companies ahead of them.
    • They have limited budget for people development, organisation development, and system management as well IT implementation.
    • Big companies have advance knowledge when it comes to managing their business since they are able to engage business & management consulting firms to solve their business problem, strengthen their competitiveness, and maneuver their business development. On top of that, they have bigger capital, stronger network for financing, professional management team, strong organisation culture, advance facilities for product development and capable team for business development, which make them grow faster compared to Micro Businesses and SME. 
    • Business Consulting Fee in Indonesia ranges from USD 10,000 – USD 100,000 per project for local consulting firm, USD 70,000 – USD 500,000 or more for global consulting firm, depending on the scope of work. Micro Businesses and SME can not afford to pay that much consulting fee.

    Then, how do we bring the value of business best practice to Micro Businesses and SME society?

    Our PROJECT MISSION 

        • We saw a huge gap between Micro Businesses and SME & Big Companies in terms of business best practice. Therefore, we are proactively creating value by proposing an idea to become the centre of business problem-solving guide platform for them.
        • Although the outcome might not be in the same level as having direct consulting activities from consulting firm, we believe that our experience and capability can contribute to assist Micro Businesses and SME society with business best practice.
        • We have a moral obligation to assist Micro Businesses and SME society in Indonesia that do not have an opportunity to improve their business & management skills due to their limited budget.
        • We want Micro Businesses and SME to get business best practice similar to the knowledge obtained by big companies in more affordable price.
        • Improve the capability of Micro Businesses and SME society in Indonesia in terms of managing, sustaining and growing their business.

        Our PURPOSE & IMPACT

              • Contribute to improve Micro Businesses and SME performance in Indonesia by providing business problem-solving guide based on our experience as business consultant in affordable price.
              • Assist Micro Businesses and SME by providing a database of problem-solving guide for many types of businesses. This development is more like investment in front since we will spend hundreds of man days of consultants to develop the contents of this business problem-solving guide. Once they are done, they will be uploaded to an online platform.
              • Provide an online platform (website portal & mobile application) so that Micro Businesses and SME players can easily access information from their mobile phone and computer. Thus, they can use on demand basis in very cheap price (USD 3-7/ on demand case).
              • Our business problem-solving contents will create value assets of Intellectual Property that will also be used in global market.
              • In the future, once our problem-solving guide has succeeded in Indonesia, we can expand our market to another country by translating the content of our problem-solving guide platform.

              We will put our business problem-solving guide in the website portal & mobile application which is supported by local web developer vendor.

              WHAT WE WILL DO

                      • Utilizing our years of learning & experience as business consultant for medium and big companies to turn them into a portable business problem-solving guide platform.
                      • Engaging consulting team to spend their time to develop business problem-solving contents for different varieties of business and industry.
                      • Developing business cases that will be used as contents in ELbiz Website Portal & Mobile Application.
                      • Spending huge effort for consulting team to develop and write business problem-solving contents for thousands of business cases.
                      • The business problem-solving contents will be an Intellectual Property database that will increase from time to time by our development effort and market input.
                      • Design & Development of online platform to upload our business problem-solving contents and development process.
                      • Design & Development of social media for delivering our business problem-solving contents to users in an easy way.
                      • The business problem-solving guide is available Indonesian & English language.
                      • To register the new company and its legal to operate the business.

                      FUNDING NEEDS

                      We need the funding for this start-up business as follows:

                      • Developing of Business problem-solving contents by professional consultant team for a minimum number of 1,000 unique business cases.
                      • Design & Development of Website Portal & Mobile Application for Business problem-solving guide (iOS & Android).
                      • Hardware equipment deemed as necessary such as Notebook & Backup Server.
                      • Project Management cost.
                      • Company Legal & Intellectual Property Right establishment.
                      • Project Funding USD 70,000. (Seventy Thousand Dollars).

                      HOW YOU CAN MAKE IT HAPPEN 

                      • You can pledge in Indiegogo.
                      • You can also spread the words about this project by sharing it to your friends and family.

                      Thank you and I really hope together we can make this project happen.

                      Fery Hartono | Founder of ELbiz
