story:
Colors from left to right (Blue, Red, Black, & Silver). Once the funding period is over, a survey will be sent to you requesting which color you want with all other necessary details.

Tired of the same old fashion key chains? Want something innovative that is compact and keep your pocket organized for everyday needs? Check out our SINGKEY. A personal stylish key organizer which is strong, durable, &light weight with bottle & can opener features. Impress your friends and co-workers but most importantly, impress your pocket!

 

Our Goal: Organize your keys and enjoy your refreshments The SINGKEY was designed to solve a set of problems while eliminating bulk specifically:

• The solution needed to stop keys from jingling, becoming disorganized or causing discomfort.

• The keys needed to be easily accessible, and the device simple, compact, and durable.

• The solution needed to be so intuitive that a user would forget that they are using a key organization device.

 

SINGKEY / SINGKEY CLASSIC will be available in two different materials 

• Titanium: Ti

• Power Coated Ultra-Steel: Fe

 

SINGKEY Fabrication

 The SINGKEY is machined via Water-jet technology from Titanium or Ultra Steel material right here in US. Once the material is cut into the desired shape, tumbling technique is used to give a smooth and polish finish. Finally to give a desired color to Ultra steel SINGKEY, Zinc color coating technique is used. The Zinc coating acts like a paint, making SINGKEY several times more durable depending on Zinc layer thickness. For the hardware assembly, we have used our local hardware store for easy assembly accessibility. Therefore for replacement parts, or to lengthen the SINGKEY you can always buy screws from us or any local hardware store. Our SINGKEY are designed to fit almost any common set of keys by adding longer screws. 

Design History

 Two months ago, we started with a simple sketch figuring out the innovative way to replace the old fashion key chains. After couple of iterations we moved on to 2D/3D model of the SINGKEY. For the initial prototype, we partner up with the local manufactures houses here in California, US. After all that hard work here we are with a personal stylish key organizer which is strong, durable, &light weight with bottle & can opener features.

SINGKEYTM Project team members

Craig Wronka: Hello everyone!!! My name is Craig Wronka and I am from Orange County, California. I have over 10+ years of manufacturing and business experience. I have developed many products ranging from large cell phone charging stations to small unique gadgets. I love the concept of Indiegogo and look forward to creating many more projects. Thank you for your support!!! 

Harpreet Singh: I’m an entrepreneur inspired by creative design. I like creating, tinkering, building, day dreaming, innovating and…playing tennis. In real life, I’m a design engineer in the area of biomedical industry. The idea of developing technology that improves health and quality of life has always been a driving factor. Some of my specialties includes CAD Modeling (Proficient in SolidWorks), FEA (Proficient in Comsol), Design & Manufacturing, Research & Product Development.

Why we need you ? 

Okay Indiegogo, this is where YOU come in. We have the tools to create prototypes, but are lacking the necessary equipment for efficient production. It is time to spread design and quality as far as we can, and we need your help.By pledging toward our SINGKEY project you can help us reach our financial goal so that we can afford to machine and purchase the parts we need to make the SINGKEY a reality. So if you like what you see, make it a reality and help us bring back American Made Product SINGKEY to the market.

Future Design Work

If you have a great idea for a SINGKEYTM compatible tool or have a new cool concept, feel free to contact us for product design and development. If you come up with something great feel free to start your own Indiegogo/Kickstarter project or contact us with your design. We will help manufacture and commercialize your product from start to finish. Please visit our website for more detail at www.klevertools.com

Disclaimer: Please be advised the design (Shape or Color) might changed during stretch goals based on the  pledges we received. However we will keep you posted as we go along. 

Risks and challenges

We have already partnered with local manufacturing companies and suppliers needed to produce a great product. Like any manufacturing supply, an extremely large demand may take longer to deliver. However, we feel confident in supplying high quality products on or before the given delivery date. Thank you for your support!!

 

FAQ 

  • How many keys does each SINGKEY hold?

    1-6 keys not using the included extensions. 6-20 keys using the included extensions.

     
  • What is included with the SINGKEY ?

    2 x plates, 2 x standard and longer extensions, 4 additional spacers in case you have odd number of keys. It will also include a spacer that allows for car keys or another key ring to be attached.

     
  • How do I pick which color I want ?

    Once the funding period is over, a survey will be sent to you requesting asking which color you would like. Reminder: The colors are only offered in the Steel versions.

     
  • What if you want to order more than one, or one of each colour and/or material ?

    Currently, Indiegogo doesn't allow us to put up bulk orders. You can take advantage of our Early Backer discounts and order multiple of a category. For example, pledge $57+ ($19 x 3) and mention the different colors. Our stretch goals will include more colors as well. At the end of the listing we will take a survey and make sure we give you the correct colors. Colors are only offered for the Steel version.
story_txt:
Colors from left to right (Blue, Red, Black, & Silver). Once the funding period is over, a survey will be sent to you requesting which color you want with all other necessary details.
Tired of the same old fashion key chains? Want something innovative that is compact and keep your pocket organized for everyday needs? Check out our SINGKEY. A personal stylish key organizer which is strong, durable, &light weight with bottle & can opener features. Impress your friends and co-workers but most importantly, impress your pocket!
 

Our Goal: Organize your keys and enjoy your refreshments The SINGKEY was designed to solve a set of problems while eliminating bulk specifically:
• The solution needed to stop keys from jingling, becoming disorganized or causing discomfort.
• The keys needed to be easily accessible, and the device simple, compact, and durable.
• The solution needed to be so intuitive that a user would forget that they are using a key organization device.
 

SINGKEY / SINGKEY CLASSIC will be available in two different materials 
• Titanium: Ti
• Power Coated Ultra-Steel: Fe

 

SINGKEY Fabrication
 The SINGKEY is machined via Water-jet technology from Titanium or Ultra Steel material right here in US. Once the material is cut into the desired shape, tumbling technique is used to give a smooth and polish finish. Finally to give a desired color to Ultra steel SINGKEY, Zinc color coating technique is used. The Zinc coating acts like a paint, making SINGKEY several times more durable depending on Zinc layer thickness. For the hardware assembly, we have used our local hardware store for easy assembly accessibility. Therefore for replacement parts, or to lengthen the SINGKEY you can always buy screws from us or any local hardware store. Our SINGKEY are designed to fit almost any common set of keys by adding longer screws. 
Design History
 Two months ago, we started with a simple sketch figuring out the innovative way to replace the old fashion key chains. After couple of iterations we moved on to 2D/3D model of the SINGKEY. For the initial prototype, we partner up with the local manufactures houses here in California, US. After all that hard work here we are with a personal stylish key organizer which is strong, durable, &light weight with bottle & can opener features.

story:
The MAVRIC Matchbox is Your Internet Large File Transportation Solution. Matchbox is a personal cloud device that lets you send files larger than email, and up to and in excess of 500 GIGABYTES, directly, without going through a third party. 

Ask Yourself these questions :

1. Do you have data files that you cannot send because they are too large to attach to your email?

2. Do you send flash drives, DVD's and hard drives by FEDEX, mail or courier? Have you sent them internationally?

3. Have you used third parties like Dropbox, Yousendit, Box, Skydrive,Googledrive, FEDEX Office, and others to send and share information?

4. Are you or your company concerned about security so that you can't or won't use these servies and do not want to install software?

If you answered YES to any of these questions then you already know the problem. The MAVRIC Matchbox is the solution you have been waiting for.

The Solution - MAVRIC Matchbox

MAVRIC Matchbox is a simple, secure, and private tool to send and distribute your large files across the globe, without the hassle and the expense. It's perfect for home use, small businesses, large businesses, the project leader or the road warrior.


MAVRIC Matchbox Plug and Desktop Units are easily accessible with our web-based Dashboard Contol Panel

                                             




MAVRIC MEDIA WEB BASED DASHBOARD CONTROL ACCESSIBLE FROM ANYWHERE



MAVRIC Cloud Virtual Matchbox - Cloud Based Matchbox by subscription


Matchbox Features:

SIMPLE. Plug and play with a web-based dashboard control so there's no software to install. Supports any type of file up to and in excess of 500 Gigabytes. Send it and Forget it. If it loses power or signal, it picks up where it left off with auto restart and auto resume. Seamless integration with Virtual Matchbox in MAVRIC Cloud.

SECURE. Data is secure with leading-edge, MAVRIC Media patented encryption methods.  Files are encrypted both on disk and as the file is sent. Extra Physical Security  - A key to opening your data that you can hold in your hand. HIPPA Compliant right out of the box.

PRIVACY AND CONTROL. MAVRIC's peer-to-peer technology enables your files to be distributed without holding your data in an ominous data center. No Third Parties ever.

SPEED. MAVRICnet boosts your network and accelerates file transfers. Each incremental file transfer is accelerated by other MAVRIC Matchboxes.

COST EFFECTIVE.  Expandable and removable storage. Cost about the same as 5 FEDEX packages or a few months of cloud services. Eliminates disk space, hosting, and bandwidth expenses associated with cloud services.

Matchbox Technology

Our patented point-to-point file transfer technology works over your typical internet connection, and soon our optional 3G/4G upgrade makes sending large data files over mobile networks possible like never before. Unlike most online sending and sharing sites, the MAVRIC Matchbox has no file size limits, bandwidth restrictions, or outside servers to save your files. If you are sending DVDs, hard drives, or usb sticks by mail or FedEx, or using costly cloud services, the MAVRIC Matchbox gets your file there in a fraction of the time for a fraction of the cost.

Commercial warehousing of your confidential data stays out of the picture with MAVRIC's point-to-point technology.



How it works ( if you are interested)


Diagram of MAVRIC Matchbox technical flow (patent pending and trademarked)


Project Status and Timeline

The company office is approximately 2000SF located in Roseville, CA, just outside Sacramento. We currently have working prototypes of the hardware and software components of the MAVRIC Matchbox and MAVRIC Cloud that you are backing as part of this Kickstarter project. We have conducted field tests with companies, and have a group of beta testers for our products. We are confident that we can deliver on our project.  Our software is an application that runs on the Linux operating system. It is developed completely in house by our own software team, and we have a well documented API (application programming interface) we can use to integrate our application with others. If MAVRIC's project is funded we have the expertise to continue developing our own software. We have development relationships with several hardware manufacturers that supply industry standard hardware that runs our software application. We have the technical expertise to develop our own hardware, but have chosen to use the Ionics plug computer platform for the Matchbox hardware.  See more about the Matchbox hardware in the manufacturing plan.

Here is our timeline for putting the MAVRIC Matchbox in your hands.

SEPTEMBER 

  • Add one more developer to the software team for back end support on Matchbox and Matchbox cloud.
  • Promote our Kickstarter Project and respond to inquiries
  • Continue product testing on the Ionics plug computer platform.
OCTOBER
  • Final stage of Matchbox software testing  for release 1.0, and the software upgrade system that will upgrade the matchbox software as we release new features
  • Complete certifications for the desktop model
  • Finalize manufacturing process with Ionics, our hardware partner, to install and test Matchbox software onto the plug model at the factory.
  • Final packaging design
NOVEMBER
  • Volume manufacturing of the Matchbox plug model
  • Continue testing of 3g/4g file transfers with the desktop model over mobile networks at our partners innovation labs
  • Beta testing of MAVRIC Cloud with select early adopters 
DECEMBER
  • Distribution - Kickstarter backers get their MAVRIC Matchbox plug models 
  • SDK and API available for select software and hardware partners
  • Finalize manufacturing process with Ionics, our hardware partner, to install and test Matchbox software onto the desktop model at the factory
  • Final testing of Matchbox desktop model
  • Final testing of MAVRIC cloud service 
JANUARY
  • Mass distribution and sales of Matchbox plug model
  • Manufacturing and Distribution - Kickstarter backers get their MAVRIC Matchbox desktop model and ramp to volume supply
  • Roll out MAVRIC Cloud service to Kickstarter backers and prepare for mass release
  • Testing and release of matchbox software enhancements

Manufacturing Plan

It's not good business to develop hardware when the ideal plug computer platforms work great and make our project so affordable.  After testing practically every plug computing device on the market, we made an alliance with Ionics-EMS,  a well established company in the Philippines. Ionics has several manufacturing operations around the world, and has a development office in Silicon Valley. 

We have an agreement with Ionics that allows us to make the MAVRIC Matchbbox available in large volumes on a global basis. The first product shipments will be to the US Only, with International shipments later. Ionics will install and test our software at the Ionics factory. The product warranty is backed by Ionics so unlike other hardware projects from small companies the MAVRIC matchbox hardware platform is built on an industry standard chip, and operating system, which our application runs on. The warranty support comes from both MAVRIC Media and from Ionics-EMS, our hardware manufacturing partner. For more information about Ionics, go to www.ionics-ems.com where you can see detailed information about their manufacturing and integration capabilities.

The MAVRIC Matchbox "Plug" model is fully integrated with the Ionics Stratus Plug Computer.



The MAVRIC Matchbox "Desktop" model is fully integrated with the Ionics Cumulus Plug Computer.


The MAVRIC Matchbox Software

The MAVRIC Matchbox Software is a robust application accessed by a Web Based dashboard, or mobile app (future release). The Matchbox software will be pre-installed on the Matchbox hardware platform and software will be field upgradable through the configuration screen. 

The Matchbox software will also be available with MAVRIC Cloud, which is a Virtual MAVRIC Matchbox subscription service.

SOFTWARE DEMO

Additional Software demos are available on our website and youtube channel. Or, if you have specific questions we will be glad to schedule a personal demonstration. 


About MAVRIC Media

MAVRIC Media is a hardware and software development company based in Sacramento, Ca., about 120 miles north of Silicon Valley. We're a small dedicated team of MAVRIC's (not where our name came from) and we have created the worlds most simple, most secure, inexpensive way to send data files of any size anywhere in the world. We believe in it so much, we have worked without pay, self funded the development of our invention, and paid the legal bills to protect our invention.  We have gained the support of some major companies that have helped us get us to this point, and are ready to help us after launch.

We have been dealing with large data files most of our careers and have developed successful technical projects before. We have tremendous experience with moving large data files and built one of the first web based solutions a few years ago, but it was ahead of is time. Now, the problem of sending and receiving large data files, and how to secure them is known to everyone. The hardware is now available in a handheld device that is affordable, and our years of software development is almost complete.

Sure we know people in Silicon Valley. Sure we have sent business plans to large companies that are very interested in what we are doing. Meanwhile, we continue to work toward our goal. We have built prototypes and tested them with companies like Ionics-EMS, Disney, Sprint and others. Recently, CEO Don Smith was interviewed on MoneyTV and sent a DVD size file across the country during the course of the interview. Then we took on a bigger challenge and sucessfully sent a 500GB file (about 125DVD's) from Los Angeles to China for an international company. The MAVRIC Matchbox (and our tech team up all night watching) sent the file successfully in just over 40 hours over standard internet connections, a full 3 days ahead of the same information sent by FEDEX. We Win !

We're proud to call the MAVRIC Matchbox a  "Send it and Forget it" solution for your real-world data problems: files too large for email attachments, the hassle, costs, insecurity, time-delay, and fees of other services. We knew there had to be a better way, so the Matchbox was started. 

Now, we are taking our story to the street and the kickstarter backers to help us finish the MAVRIC Matchbox project and make it available to everyone. 

Our story and our team

The original founders of MAVRIC Media are a close knit team, with digital media industry roots tracing back to Ampex Corporation, where the videotape recorder was invented and where they all worked early in their careers. In the 1990's, they teamed up at an Intel funded startup, Asset Factory, where they pioneered the concept of an online digital media service bureau and developed proprietary network rendering technology used by Hollywood film and special effects companies.  The company was acquired by NewTek, Inc. (a leading 3D software company). While at Asset factory, they did early work in the field of media asset management and developed concepts which were years ahead of their time.

In 2008, the core team re-assembled to build a media asset management system for the State of California Department of Education Star Testing Program.



Shortly after they introduced the first implementation of the MAVRIC Matchbox, a media asset management system in a small ITX form factor computer (which costs $2500) at that time. It was introduced at the Siggraph show in 2008 and won awards for innovation in the new product category.


Determined that sending video files and big data files would eventually be a really big problem to create a giant business opportunity, cofounder Don Smith worked with Ryan "Whiz Kid" Sundberg to keep the company's vision alive. They wanted to see if there was a better, cheaper way, and could they make money at it.  In 2011 they went to Garland Bell, an early MAVRIC investor, and an outstanding attorney, and convinced him to join us as Chief Operating Officer and Corporate Counsel. Bell and Smith have funded MAVRIC Media's ongoing development and operations.  Martha Bossley, also an investor in MAVRIC and veteran Logitech global supply chain director also believed in the matchbox and helped solidify the company's manufacturing partnership with Ionics and others. Martha has managed hundreds of millions in revenue with manufacturing and supply chain companies around the globe. In the recent months many others have worked countless hours without compensation to get the company visible, and the MAVRIC Matchbox to where it is today.

Our first whiteboards,,,,,,



First Generation Prototypes 


Second Generation Prototypes and Field Demo Units used in real world pilot projects with International Companies.


Current Prototypes and Demo Units



http://www.mavricmedia.com/management-team/

Don Smith, Co-Founder and CEO  www.linkedin.com/in/smittydon

Garland Bell, COO www.linkedin.com/pub/garland-bell/32/218/b90

Ryan Sundberg, Director of Product Development

www.linkedin.com/in/ryansundberg

Martha Bossley, Director Manufacturing and Supply Chain

www.linkedin.com/in/marthabossley

Matthew Bell, Social Media Specialist

To learn more about the team members of MAVRIC Media, email  info@mavricmedia.com.

Frequently Asked Questions

What platforms will the Mavric MatchBox support?

The Mavric MatchBox is an application built in Linux.  It’s functionality is accessed through a web browser. The software itself is not downloaded to the client’s computer, enabling the Matchbox to work with all operating systems as well as mobile devices.

What are the network requirements to use a Mavric MatchBox?

The Matchbox requires only your standard internet connection.

The MatchBox  can connect to your network over Ethernet or Wi-Fi (optional Wi-Fi adapter required), but initial setup requires a wired connection. MatchBox works with all common Wi-Fi networks (802.11b/g/n at 2.4 or 5 GHz) and a number of common security protocols, including Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS), WEP 64/128bit, WPA /WAP2, and WPA-PSK /WPA2-PSK.

How Secure is the Matchbox and will it protect my privacy ?  

The Mavric Matchbox is, in our opinion, is the most secure way to protect your data. As your data file is imported or copied to the Matchbox to be sent, it is encrypted using our patent pending 2048 bit distributed encryption system. That’s about 10 times the best encryption typically used for securing  information. The encryption key is generated inside the matchbox itself, or the MAVRIC Cloud virtual matchbox. There are no third parties that see your data – ever – and your file is 100% totally secure between you and your recipient.  Once the file is received by the recipient matchbox, the decryption sequence is initiated and the encryption key is verified. Your data files are encrypted both on the disk itself, and during the transport of the file over any network – wired, wireless, or mobile.

In addition, since a third party server never holds MAVRIC’s 2048 bit encryption key, theMAVRIC Matchbox is not vulnerable to hackers and data being compromised.

How do I setup the Matchbox on my Network ?

We have a detailed installation program and product manual that will ship with the MAVRIC Matchbox.

Do I have to install the MAVRIC Matchbox Software on any computer that accesses it ?

The MAVRIC Matchbox software is embedded in the Matchbox / Ionics plug computer hardware. It is accessed by a web based control panel thru your brower. Unlike other systems we do not install a software application on your computer because it slows your computer down by up to 40% to send a large data files. Secondly, if you are on a laptop, you may have to leave and take your laptop with you. The MAVRIC Matchbox completely offloads the heavy lifting task of encrypting and sending your data file so your computer is free to work on other things.  The MAVRIC Cloud, is a virtual matchbox in our secure data centers and is also accessed by your web browser.

Will the matchbox affect other devices on my network ?

If you have other devices on your network now, you have probably noticed that some web browsing gets slower when everyone tries to use your internet connection at once. This has become less of a problem as internet connection speeds to the home and business has gotten faster.  The matchbox sends and receives large files quickly because our MAVRICnet system optimizes the speed of your network to get every ounce of power from your internet connection. The matchbox software control panel has advanced configuration capability to manually adjust the available bandwidth among devices including the matchbox.

What is MAVRICnet ?

MAVRICnet is part of MAVRIC Media’s magic formula for sending practically any size file, without failure to any other matchbox in the world. Basically, MAVRICnet accelerates your file transfer speed every time the same file is sent to another incremental matchbox device. For example if Matchbox #1 sends a 5GB file to Matchbox #2, the transfer will be optimized and sent directly to the receiving Matchbox (#2).  If the same file is then sent to a third, forth, etc. matchbox users, MAVRICnet opens multiple parallel data streams and sends the file faster and faster – in most cases up to 75X faster. If the file being sent exists on multiple matchboxes and one loses power or its connection, the other matchboxes on MAVRICnet automatically complete the transfer.  If the file being sent exists on only 1 matchbox and it loses power or its network connection, when you plug it back in, MAVRICnet knows where the file was interrupted and picks up where it left off.

Where does the Matchbox store my files?

The Matchbox imports data files from through web based dashboard which allows a file to be “drag and drop” , or selected from a computer hard drive, flash drive, etc.  The matchbox excrypts the file during import and stores it on optional storage -  internal SD card, and flash drive or hard drive via USB port on the Matchbox.

The matchbox is not like other  so called “ personal cloud” solutions. We don’t require you to make the Matchbox the primary storage device for your data files, although it certainly can be.  Often, the user’s applications in a program like Adobe Photoshop create hundreds of files associated with a project and we feel that is best performed on the user’s computer. Once completed and ready to send, the file is copied and stored on the matchbox or to the MAVRIC Cloud Virtual Matchbox. The user has options available to manage how long the particular file remains on their matchbox storage.

Is there a limit on how much data a Matchbox user can send per month ?

The MAVRIC Matchbox plug and desktop models utilize the owners existing broadband internet connection. Some Internet Service Providers limit the amount of data a particular account can use, but the Matchbox has no data restrictions

The MAVRIC Cloud virtual matchbox is a subscription based account utilizing the resources of Mavric Media. There will be a tiered subscription price that is derived from the amount of storage, and the amount of data throughput the user wants. Pricing has not been finalized, but we expect the subscription to be competitively priced with superior features to any other cloud subscription service.

Is there a limit to how many users I can have on my MAVRIC Matchbox?

The Matchbox plug and desktop models allow you to have up to 10 user accounts per device.

The MAVRIC Cloud virtual matchbox is limited to one user per subscription account at the launch of the service.

Can I send a file to someone who does not have a MatchBox?

 The short answer is Yes!, using our secure MavricCloud , file recipients can log in with a unique user ID and password , able to view only the file directly sent. 

The longer answer is still  Yes, although we have designed the Mavric MatchBox to send files from MatchBox to MatchBox or MAVRIC Cloud Virtual Matchbox.  Each Matchbox can add additional user accounts and send files between user accounts on an individual matchbox, with certain restrictions. 

Risks and challenges

POTENTIAL RISKS: The company does not fund it's campaign or raise adequate capital.

HOW WE'VE MITIGATED THESE RISKS: We have set our project funding goal so we can meet all commitments to deliver our solution and support it for a full year. The key members of the company have made major investments of time and their own money. We are fully committed to MAVRIC Media's success.

HOW WE'VE OVERCOME SIMILAR CHALLENGES IN THE PAST: We never Quit. We define the problem, we come up with unique solutions that others have not thought of, and we work the problems until we win !

SECONDARY ISSUES: ('cause we're just that thorough!) 
We are working with hardware manufacturers to ensure our desktop matchbox and mobile network modules receive certifications required to ship those products in the US and abroad. This could take 90-120 days.

WORST CASE SCENARIO: 
Since we have self funded this project, tested it extensively, we know we can deliver it. We don't forsee a scenario where we cannot meet our promises.

HOW WE ARE PREPARED TO RESOLVE POTENTIAL PROBLEMS: 
If you are not satisfied with our products or services, we will refund your pledge.

Matchbox Technology
Our patented point-to-point file transfer technology works over your typical internet connection, and soon our optional 3G/4G upgrade makes sending large data files over mobile networks possible like never before. Unlike most online sending and sharing sites, the MAVRIC Matchbox has no file size limits, bandwidth restrictions, or outside servers to save your files. If you are sending DVDs, hard drives, or usb sticks by mail or FedEx, or using costly cloud services, the MAVRIC Matchbox gets your file there in a fraction of the time for a fraction of the cost.
Commercial warehousing of your confidential data stays out of the picture with MAVRIC's point-to-point technology.



How it works ( if you are interested)



Diagram of MAVRIC Matchbox technical flow (patent pending and trademarked)


Project Status and Timeline
The company office is approximately 2000SF located in Roseville, CA, just outside Sacramento. We currently have working prototypes of the hardware and software components of the MAVRIC Matchbox and MAVRIC Cloud that you are backing as part of this Kickstarter project. We have conducted field tests with companies, and have a group of beta testers for our products. We are confident that we can deliver on our project.  Our software is an application that runs on the Linux operating system. It is developed completely in house by our own software team, and we have a well documented API (application programming interface) we can use to integrate our application with others. If MAVRIC's project is funded we have the expertise to continue developing our own software. We have development relationships with several hardware manufacturers that supply industry standard hardware that runs our software application. We have the technical expertise to develop our own hardware, but have chosen to use the Ionics plug computer platform for the Matchbox hardware.  See more about the Matchbox hardware in the manufacturing plan.
Here is our timeline for putting the MAVRIC Matchbox in your hands.
SEPTEMBER 

Add one more developer to the software team for back end support on Matchbox and Matchbox cloud.
Promote our Kickstarter Project and respond to inquiries

Continue product testing on the Ionics plug computer platform.
OCTOBERFinal stage of Matchbox software testing  for release 1.0, and the software upgrade system that will upgrade the matchbox software as we release new features
Complete certifications for the desktop model
Finalize manufacturing process with Ionics, our hardware partner, to install and test Matchbox software onto the plug model at the factory.
Final packaging design
NOVEMBERVolume manufacturing of the Matchbox plug model

Continue testing of 3g/4g file transfers with the desktop model over mobile networks at our partners innovation labs
Beta testing of MAVRIC Cloud with select early adopters 

DECEMBERDistribution - Kickstarter backers get their MAVRIC Matchbox plug models 
SDK and API available for select software and hardware partners
Finalize manufacturing process with Ionics, our hardware partner, to install and test Matchbox software onto the desktop model at the factory

Final testing of Matchbox desktop model
Final testing of MAVRIC cloud service 

JANUARYMass distribution and sales of Matchbox plug model
Manufacturing and Distribution - Kickstarter backers get their MAVRIC Matchbox desktop model and ramp to volume supply

Roll out MAVRIC Cloud service to Kickstarter backers and prepare for mass release
Testing and release of matchbox software enhancements

Manufacturing Plan
It's not good business to develop hardware when the ideal plug computer platforms work great and make our project so affordable.  After testing practically every plug computing device on the market, we made an alliance with Ionics-EMS,  a well established company in the Philippines. Ionics has several manufacturing operations around the world, and has a development office in Silicon Valley. 
We have an agreement with Ionics that allows us to make the MAVRIC Matchbbox available in large volumes on a global basis. The first product shipments will be to the US Only, with International shipments later. Ionics will install and test our software at the Ionics factory. The product warranty is backed by Ionics so unlike other hardware projects from small companies the MAVRIC matchbox hardware platform is built on an industry standard chip, and operating system, which our application runs on. The warranty support comes from both MAVRIC Media and from Ionics-EMS, our hardware manufacturing partner. For more information about Ionics, go to www.ionics-ems.com where you can see detailed information about their manufacturing and integration capabilities.
The MAVRIC Matchbox "Plug" model is fully integrated with the Ionics Stratus Plug Computer.





The MAVRIC Matchbox "Desktop" model is fully integrated with the Ionics Cumulus Plug Computer.


The MAVRIC Matchbox Software
The MAVRIC Matchbox Software is a robust application accessed by a Web Based dashboard, or mobile app (future release). The Matchbox software will be pre-installed on the Matchbox hardware platform and software will be field upgradable through the configuration screen. 
The Matchbox software will also be available with MAVRIC Cloud, which is a Virtual MAVRIC Matchbox subscription service.

SOFTWARE DEMO

Additional Software demos are available on our website and youtube channel. Or, if you have specific questions we will be glad to schedule a personal demonstration. 
About MAVRIC Media
MAVRIC Media is a hardware and software development company based in Sacramento, Ca., about 120 miles north of Silicon Valley. We're a small dedicated team of MAVRIC's (not where our name came from) and we have created the worlds most simple, most secure, inexpensive way to send data files of any size anywhere in the world. We believe in it so much, we have worked without pay, self funded the development of our invention, and paid the legal bills to protect our invention.  We have gained the support of some major companies that have helped us get us to this point, and are ready to help us after launch.
We have been dealing with large data files most of our careers and have developed successful technical projects before. We have tremendous experience with moving large data files and built one of the first web based solutions a few years ago, but it was ahead of is time. Now, the problem of sending and receiving large data files, and how to secure them is known to everyone. The hardware is now available in a handheld device that is affordable, and our years of software development is almost complete.
Sure we know people in Silicon Valley. Sure we have sent business plans to large companies that are very interested in what we are doing. Meanwhile, we continue to work toward our goal. We have built prototypes and tested them with companies like Ionics-EMS, Disney, Sprint and others. Recently, CEO Don Smith was interviewed on MoneyTV and sent a DVD size file across the country during the course of the interview. Then we took on a bigger challenge and sucessfully sent a 500GB file (about 125DVD's) from Los Angeles to China for an international company. The MAVRIC Matchbox (and our tech team up all night watching) sent the file successfully in just over 40 hours over standard internet connections, a full 3 days ahead of the same information sent by FEDEX. We Win !
We're proud to call the MAVRIC Matchbox a  "Send it and Forget it" solution for your real-world data problems: files too large for email attachments, the hassle, costs, insecurity, time-delay, and fees of other services. We knew there had to be a better way, so the Matchbox was started. 
Now, we are taking our story to the street and the kickstarter backers to help us finish the MAVRIC Matchbox project and make it available to everyone. 
Our story and our team
The original founders of MAVRIC Media are a close knit team, with digital media industry roots tracing back to Ampex Corporation, where the videotape recorder was invented and where they all worked early in their careers. In the 1990's, they teamed up at an Intel funded startup, Asset Factory, where they pioneered the concept of an online digital media service bureau and developed proprietary network rendering technology used by Hollywood film and special effects companies.  The company was acquired by NewTek, Inc. (a leading 3D software company). While at Asset factory, they did early work in the field of media asset management and developed concepts which were years ahead of their time.
In 2008, the core team re-assembled to build a media asset management system for the State of California Department of Education Star Testing Program.





Shortly after they introduced the first implementation of the MAVRIC Matchbox, a media asset management system in a small ITX form factor computer (which costs $2500) at that time. It was introduced at the Siggraph show in 2008 and won awards for innovation in the new product category.


Determined that sending video files and big data files would eventually be a really big problem to create a giant business opportunity, cofounder Don Smith worked with Ryan "Whiz Kid" Sundberg to keep the company's vision alive. They wanted to see if there was a better, cheaper way, and could they make money at it.  In 2011 they went to Garland Bell, an early MAVRIC investor, and an outstanding attorney, and convinced him to join us as Chief Operating Officer and Corporate Counsel. Bell and Smith have funded MAVRIC Media's ongoing development and operations.  Martha Bossley, also an investor in MAVRIC and veteran Logitech global supply chain director also believed in the matchbox and helped solidify the company's manufacturing partnership with Ionics and others. Martha has managed hundreds of millions in revenue with manufacturing and supply chain companies around the globe. In the recent months many others have worked countless hours without compensation to get the company visible, and the MAVRIC Matchbox to where it is today.
Our first whiteboards,,,,,,




First Generation Prototypes 



Second Generation Prototypes and Field Demo Units used in real world pilot projects with International Companies.


Current Prototypes and Demo Units

Don Smith, Co-Founder and CEO  www.linkedin.com/in/smittydon
Garland Bell, COO www.linkedin.com/pub/garland-bell/32/218/b90
Ryan Sundberg, Director of Product Development

Matthew Bell, Social Media Specialist

Frequently Asked Questions
What platforms will the Mavric MatchBox support?
The Mavric MatchBox is an application built in Linux.  It’s functionality is accessed through a web browser. The software itself is not downloaded to the client’s computer, enabling the Matchbox to work with all operating systems as well as mobile devices.
What are the network requirements to use a Mavric MatchBox?
The Matchbox requires only your standard internet connection.
The MatchBox  can connect to your network over Ethernet or Wi-Fi (optional Wi-Fi adapter required), but initial setup requires a wired connection. MatchBox works with all common Wi-Fi networks (802.11b/g/n at 2.4 or 5 GHz) and a number of common security protocols, including Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS), WEP 64/128bit, WPA /WAP2, and WPA-PSK /WPA2-PSK.
How Secure is the Matchbox and will it protect my privacy ?  
The Mavric Matchbox is, in our opinion, is the most secure way to protect your data. As your data file is imported or copied to the Matchbox to be sent, it is encrypted using our patent pending 2048 bit distributed encryption system. That’s about 10 times the best encryption typically used for securing  information. The encryption key is generated inside the matchbox itself, or the MAVRIC Cloud virtual matchbox. There are no third parties that see your data – ever – and your file is 100% totally secure between you and your recipient.  Once the file is received by the recipient matchbox, the decryption sequence is initiated and the encryption key is verified. Your data files are encrypted both on the disk itself, and during the transport of the file over any network – wired, wireless, or mobile.
In addition, since a third party server never holds MAVRIC’s 2048 bit encryption key, theMAVRIC Matchbox is not vulnerable to hackers and data being compromised.
How do I setup the Matchbox on my Network ?
We have a detailed installation program and product manual that will ship with the MAVRIC Matchbox.
Do I have to install the MAVRIC Matchbox Software on any computer that accesses it ?
The MAVRIC Matchbox software is embedded in the Matchbox / Ionics plug computer hardware. It is accessed by a web based control panel thru your brower. Unlike other systems we do not install a software application on your computer because it slows your computer down by up to 40% to send a large data files. Secondly, if you are on a laptop, you may have to leave and take your laptop with you. The MAVRIC Matchbox completely offloads the heavy lifting task of encrypting and sending your data file so your computer is free to work on other things.  The MAVRIC Cloud, is a virtual matchbox in our secure data centers and is also accessed by your web browser.
Will the matchbox affect other devices on my network ?
If you have other devices on your network now, you have probably noticed that some web browsing gets slower when everyone tries to use your internet connection at once. This has become less of a problem as internet connection speeds to the home and business has gotten faster.  The matchbox sends and receives large files quickly because our MAVRICnet system optimizes the speed of your network to get every ounce of power from your internet connection. The matchbox software control panel has advanced configuration capability to manually adjust the available bandwidth among devices including the matchbox.
What is MAVRICnet ?
MAVRICnet is part of MAVRIC Media’s magic formula for sending practically any size file, without failure to any other matchbox in the world. Basically, MAVRICnet accelerates your file transfer speed every time the same file is sent to another incremental matchbox device. For example if Matchbox #1 sends a 5GB file to Matchbox #2, the transfer will be optimized and sent directly to the receiving Matchbox (#2).  If the same file is then sent to a third, forth, etc. matchbox users, MAVRICnet opens multiple parallel data streams and sends the file faster and faster – in most cases up to 75X faster. If the file being sent exists on multiple matchboxes and one loses power or its connection, the other matchboxes on MAVRICnet automatically complete the transfer.  If the file being sent exists on only 1 matchbox and it loses power or its network connection, when you plug it back in, MAVRICnet knows where the file was interrupted and picks up where it left off.
Where does the Matchbox store my files?
The Matchbox imports data files from through web based dashboard which allows a file to be “drag and drop” , or selected from a computer hard drive, flash drive, etc.  The matchbox excrypts the file during import and stores it on optional storage -  internal SD card, and flash drive or hard drive via USB port on the Matchbox.
The matchbox is not like other  so called “ personal cloud” solutions. We don’t require you to make the Matchbox the primary storage device for your data files, although it certainly can be.  Often, the user’s applications in a program like Adobe Photoshop create hundreds of files associated with a project and we feel that is best performed on the user’s computer. Once completed and ready to send, the file is copied and stored on the matchbox or to the MAVRIC Cloud Virtual Matchbox. The user has options available to manage how long the particular file remains on their matchbox storage.
Is there a limit on how much data a Matchbox user can send per month ?
The MAVRIC Matchbox plug and desktop models utilize the owners existing broadband internet connection. Some Internet Service Providers limit the amount of data a particular account can use, but the Matchbox has no data restrictions
The MAVRIC Cloud virtual matchbox is a subscription based account utilizing the resources of Mavric Media. There will be a tiered subscription price that is derived from the amount of storage, and the amount of data throughput the user wants. Pricing has not been finalized, but we expect the subscription to be competitively priced with superior features to any other cloud subscription service.
Is there a limit to how many users I can have on my MAVRIC Matchbox?
The Matchbox plug and desktop models allow you to have up to 10 user accounts per device.
The MAVRIC Cloud virtual matchbox is limited to one user per subscription account at the launch of the service.
Can I send a file to someone who does not have a MatchBox?
 The short answer is Yes!, using our secure MavricCloud , file recipients can log in with a unique user ID and password , able to view only the file directly sent. 
The longer answer is still  Yes, although we have designed the Mavric MatchBox to send files from MatchBox to MatchBox or MAVRIC Cloud Virtual Matchbox.  Each Matchbox can add additional user accounts and send files between user accounts on an individual matchbox, with certain restrictions. 


Risks and challenges
POTENTIAL RISKS: The company does not fund it's campaign or raise adequate capital.
HOW WE'VE MITIGATED THESE RISKS: We have set our project funding goal so we can meet all commitments to deliver our solution and support it for a full year. The key members of the company have made major investments of time and their own money. We are fully committed to MAVRIC Media's success.
HOW WE'VE OVERCOME SIMILAR CHALLENGES IN THE PAST: We never Quit. We define the problem, we come up with unique solutions that others have not thought of, and we work the problems until we win !
SECONDARY ISSUES: ('cause we're just that thorough!) We are working with hardware manufacturers to ensure our desktop matchbox and mobile network modules receive certifications required to ship those products in the US and abroad. This could take 90-120 days.
WORST CASE SCENARIO: Since we have self funded this project, tested it extensively, we know we can deliver it. We don't forsee a scenario where we cannot meet our promises.
HOW WE ARE PREPARED TO RESOLVE POTENTIAL PROBLEMS: If you are not satisfied with our products or services, we will refund your pledge.

story:
What is Pettag+

Pettag+ is a pet tag which allows the owner to interact and engage with the pet and is connected to a smartphone. Using Bluetooth, the device connects to an app on your smartphone to help you monitor your pets needs are being met.

We created Pettag+ for young pet owners, first-time pet owners, and busy pet owners. Pettag+ creates personalized training and care programs based on your pet’s breed, age, and weight. You simply press one of the buttons on the device and the Pettag+ device is updated. 


Pettag+ also allows you to connect with other pets in your life — those belonging to friends, family, or new folks you just met!

     


Sounds cool right?


       Who needs Pettag+? 

                  You do!

Whether you are traveling pet owner, a first time pet owner or a young pet owner, Pettag+ is for you. 

For a traveling or busy pet owners, Pettag+ gives you the peace of mind to know your pet has been cared for with a simple check of the app. This allows you to see that all the care your pet needs has been done by whoever you put your trust in to watch your pet. 

For first time pet owners, Pettag+ helps with creating your pet's care goals for your specific breed and age of dog. Pettag+ helps create and remind you of basic care needs from 1 month to any age of pet. It will also provide training programs for things like potty training, chewing and fetch. Pettag+ focuses on positive training.

Young pet owners can have the greatest challenge of pet ownership. They need to both learn and be mature enough to care for a pet. Pettag+ helps with the care guides and training as noted above. But it also allows parents to easily check-in to ensure that there child is taking proper care of the pet.

Pettag+ also helps with issues like overfeeding. Never question did my wife/husband or child already feed the dog? Because once the dog is fed they can easily click the bone button to note this fact This will greatly reduce overeating and overfeeding of your pet. Plus reduce your pet's chance at obesity and improve the pet's overall health.

We spent a long time designing Pettag+ so it will be priced so everyone can have one. While many other devices use expensive Wifi and GPS with added monthly costs, we made our product to work with your Smartphone via Bluetooth. Because of this we can be much cheaper than our expensive competitors. We also designed Pettag+ so it does not need to be recharged. That means it never has to come off of the collar and you will not forget to recharge it! We will also replace your Pettag+ for free if it is in any way damaged by your pet. 


     

      How the Pettag+ Device 

  and App Work

    Create your pet’s profile: 

            Create care goals based on age, breed, and weight

        Then, simply press a button on the device to update the app. So long as the app is running in the background, you never have to remove your phone from your pocket!



Meet all of your pet’s daily goals!



    What else does Pettag+ Do?

  Connect with your friends and family and their dogs:


  • Pettag+ provides reminders for any daily or monthly medications with a basic push notification. Mark this to-do as done by using the HEART button.
  • Pettag+ has games and training programs built into the app that upon completion you will receive rewards like dog treats or toys.


                                 



    The Magic behind the

     Pettag+ Device


Pettag+ is made of ABS plastic and features fun buttons made of TPE. The device screws together with four small screws and is sealed with a waterproof gasket. Pettag+ buttons are backlit by LED light to confirm that the buttons were pressed and can be turned on for nighttime walks and play.

The device runs on a watch battery, with a battery life of approximately one year. Thanks to this battery power, Pettag+ never has to be taken off to be recharged.

Pettag+ is equipped with Bluetooth low energy 4.0 (BLE) technology with a range of 75 feet. It has an accelerator to track and store walks, exercise, and other adventures. All button inputs update to your smart device automatically. As long as the app is running in the background of your smartphone — and within range of the Pettag+ device — the app updates without needing to directly interact with your phone. (You can leave it in your pocket!)

Each Pettag+ features an individual QR code on the back that is unique to your dog's profile. Once you enter your dog's info and add the tag information, the QR code will link to your dog's profile.




Exploded View:


         

Dimensions:

Designed in Colorado, Engineered in Brooklyn and MADE IN THE USA!


  Why we need your help:

Let’s face it, molds are expensive. (Like new car expensive!) Developing a new technology, with new computer boards, is also a pretty pricey endeavor. (Like new fancy car expensive!) Plus, there’s the often forgotten costs of app development, patenting, materials, production, packaging, and marketing. We have self-funded the project to get to the present point of being ready to launch. Now it’s time to use those molds, make more of those boards, assemble, package, and get Pettag+ into your paws.

Detail of cost breakdown:

  • Molding
  • Tech Development
  • APP Development 
  • Production, packaging and marketing
  • Patents
  • The list goes on...

Pettag+ gives back:

We will be giving 2% of all sales to animal shelters and donating devices.


Stretch Goals:

One of our goals with this project is to sell discounted or donate these devices to animal rescues and shelters so they can be provided with all adopted pets. Many pets are returned within the first month because the owner has difficulty potty training them. We hope to be able to help teach people using our app and device and thus reduce the percentage of returned animals . 



                   What you get:


 

    When will I get my Pettag+:

We have worked very hard to build a product that we can deliver by December at the latest. We expect to ship in October. We have finished our board design and all the final engineering components for the device itself. The molders are in place and all we need to do is pull the trigger. The APP is almost finished and we have already started testing it. We will be testing full working prototypes within 2 weeks of this going live. 

Give us a BARK OUT!

To make this product successful we need your help. Please share this Indiegogo campaign with all your friends and family. We also understand that there are dog lovers out there that do not own a dog. Once the app is available you can download the app and follow all your friends and families pets.


Who we are:

We are passionate dog lovers who believe in creating a more engaging  experience for Pet owners.

Shahir Ahmed:
Visionary, creative and entrepreneurial professional. I'm an emerging technologies guy at heart - particularly passionate about wired/mobile/media convergence.
Focused on bridging the gap and bringing great minds together to pursue the convergence of LBS technologies, strategic cross promotional user adoption, highly motivating engagement, and on-line to off-line transactions while highlighting the future of redemption at point of sale.

Peter Ragonetti:
Peter T. Ragonetti is the Creative Leader and Chief Designer of PTR Design Studio in Brooklyn. His studio focuses on providing disruptive hypothesis, concept design and manufacturing support for entrepreneurs who try to launch products. He is also the Co-Founder and CCO (Chief Creative Officer) of a start-up company named Pet Tag Plus based out of Denver, CO. Pet Tag Plus is developing the first connected and engaging Pet Tag. Peter was trained in Industrial Design at Pratt Institute in Brooklyn where he received a BID (Bachelor of Industrial Design) in 2004. Since leaving Pratt, Peter was the Senior Designer for JW Pet Company and the Director of Product Development for Kikkerland Design as well as working on many client-based independent projects. In his 10 years of professional design, he has been responsible for the design and development of thousands of products and is also named in over a hundred patents.

Brad Zasada: 
Techincal lead for Pettag+.
Specialties: PHP, Linux, MySQL, jQuery, prototype, javascript, HTML5, Magento, C/C++


OUR PARTNERS WHO HELPED US BUILD THIS WHOM WE WANT TO THANK:

Our Backers, SpireMedia, WideFoc.us, Refactory, Keen Engine, Vibo Studio, Fulcrum PDC, Tradeshow Emporium, Metzger Albee Public Relations, Indiegogo, Kate Unver and Jonathan Weitz, and Our Dogs.


.    THANKS FROM ALL OF US AT   PETTAG+

To make this product successful we need your help. Please share this Indiegogo campaign with all your friends and family. We also understand that there are dog lovers out there that do not own a dog. Once the app is available you can download the app and follow all your friends and families pets.

Who we are:
We are passionate dog lovers who believe in creating a more engaging  experience for Pet owners.

Shahir Ahmed:Visionary, creative and entrepreneurial professional. I'm an emerging technologies guy at heart - particularly passionate about wired/mobile/media convergence.Focused on bridging the gap and bringing great minds together to pursue the convergence of LBS technologies, strategic cross promotional user adoption, highly motivating engagement, and on-line to off-line transactions while highlighting the future of redemption at point of sale.Peter Ragonetti:Peter T. Ragonetti is the Creative Leader and Chief Designer of PTR Design Studio in Brooklyn. His studio focuses on providing disruptive hypothesis, concept design and manufacturing support for entrepreneurs who try to launch products. He is also the Co-Founder and CCO (Chief Creative Officer) of a start-up company named Pet Tag Plus based out of Denver, CO. Pet Tag Plus is developing the first connected and engaging Pet Tag. Peter was trained in Industrial Design at Pratt Institute in Brooklyn where he received a BID (Bachelor of Industrial Design) in 2004. Since leaving Pratt, Peter was the Senior Designer for JW Pet Company and the Director of Product Development for Kikkerland Design as well as working on many client-based independent projects. In his 10 years of professional design, he has been responsible for the design and development of thousands of products and is also named in over a hundred patents.
Brad Zasada: Techincal lead for Pettag+.Specialties: PHP, Linux, MySQL, jQuery, prototype, javascript, HTML5, Magento, C/C++

OUR PARTNERS WHO HELPED US BUILD THIS WHOM WE WANT TO THANK:
Our Backers, SpireMedia, WideFoc.us, Refactory, Keen Engine, Vibo Studio, Fulcrum PDC, Tradeshow Emporium, Metzger Albee Public Relations, Indiegogo, Kate Unver and Jonathan Weitz, and Our Dogs.
.    THANKS FROM ALL OF US AT   PETTAG+

story:
Welcome brand new analog Trezor mini based on original Trezor device

Cryptocurrencies need a wallet to store them. It should be always in hands, easy to use and safe from external attacks. Online wallets are vulnerable for hackers and don't have enough protection. The hardware wallet is the most reliable storage device so far. One of the main players on the market of hardware wallets is Trezor. It will generate the seed for you and always will recover access to your coins. Trezor crew is really cares for safety of your assets and try to assist at any points. We got inspired by this talented team and made a decision to create something similar but better. The latest development is the hardware wallet Trezor mini. It looks like a flash card that stores savings and access keys. The wallet supports ERC-20 tokens and more than twenty cryptocurrencies.

The device is able to perform the same set of functions as online wallets, for example, it can be used to pay for goods or services. And due to the absence of its own Internet connection, Trezor mini prevents any hacker attacks, protecting funds from theft. Usage the Trezor mini is very simple; for the transaction, you only need to connect it to your computer and go to the official site of wallet trezor.io.



 

Trezor mini. What is the difference?


- Trezor mini is smaller than its original: 28х42 against 27х50 the original. This was achieved by placing the controller and elements under the display.

- Trezor mini buttons have a better tactile effect compared to Trezor, which may have false positives when pressed.

- In the scheme Trezor mini has additional filtration elements for power. Some of the parts are replaced by Wurth Electronic products.

- Wiring is made at a more professional level, this is evidenced by the thickness of the tracks, the size of the transition holes and the topology of the elements on the PCB.

- ESD protection of the USB port in Trezor mini is performed on the element that has already built-in resistance lines and the lengths of the differential pairs for the signal lines of the port are also observed. Original Trezor does not have the required chain filtering.

- To protect Trezor mini from physical impact and hacking the device, manufacturers used specialized compounds. The device is protected from any external impact – water, dust, shock.

- Each Trezor mini device passes tests separately.

 

We consider Trezor as a thrust-worthy company as follows:

- open source code
- on the technology market since 2012
- being passionate about its claims and clients as Buratino BlockChain Solutions is.
 

Buratino BlockChain Solutions was established from Research Institute of special Algorithms, engaged in the development and production of complex electronic equipment. We managed to find unique technical solutions for mining and storage of cryptocurrency.

We cooperate with the Samsung Foundry in South Korea and "Neva electronic company" in Russia, which is one of the leading Russian enterprises that manufacture electronic products for legal entities.

In 2018, Buratino Blockchain Solutions improved the product of Czech startup SatoshiLabs. Based on the open-source code of Trezor wallet, the company has developed its own model of Trezor mini, changing the technical part.
 

How exactly does the protection work in Trezor mini?

Device protection consists of several stages. The first is the PIN. When you connect the device to the computer for the first time, you must enter it twice. When you re-enter, there is an empty space where you need to put the combination of numbers, and on the wallet it is shown. This combination is the order of numbers that you need to enter on the screen in ascending order. This provides protection against infected computers when a set of input numbers is being read.

In addition, when you first install the wallet gives 24 code words. They are used to restore access to your device in case of lost. Buying a new wallet, you will need to enter the key words. The key phrase is the main protection of the device. It should be remembered, not written down, as well as a few code phrases. They will be required in case of a real attack on you if the frauds request for access to your wallet.

The website trezor.io does not ask for any passwords and codes. Even if the hackers break into the server, access to the account without the physical presence of the wallet is impossible.
 

We are looking for a partner

We believe in the future of blockchain, we believe that soon it will lead to a complete  different world. The data in blockchain cannot be faked, because dozens, hundreds of participants control the authenticity of the recorded information. We need like-minded people who will help us to make our ideas real and implement useful developments. Now we are looking for partners who are ready to invest in the upcoming digital future.

 

Additional questions? 
Contact our CEO permyakov@buratino.tech

story:
WHY YOU NEED THE IRYS CARD 

1 - You have many passwords to manage?

2- You have already forgotten a password and had to recover it?

3- You do not know how to create strong passwords ?

4 - You just do not care about it or if you ever have difficult to create a new password for a registration?

5 - You are a public person or a celebrity, and need to protect your privacy on the internet?

 

 

MEET THE IRYS CARD

 

CREATE YOUR OWN WAY TO USE

 
 

 

 

CHOOSE YOUR DESIGN

 

 

CARRY YOUR PASSWORDS ALWAYS WITH SECURELY

With IRYS CARD your passwords are encrypted, and only you will know how to decipher them. If you prefer, use the photo of your card on smartphone.

 

 

INFORMATION SECURITY IS THE DUTY OF EVERYONE

"Arguing that you don´t care about privacy because you have nothing to hide is no different than saying you don´t care about free speech because you have nothing to say."

Edward Snowden

 

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

1- Why manage my passwords with a card?
The card is the easiest to have your information always at hand. Security is the same as we keep our credit cards in our wallet. Another advantage is not to show the passwords literally and much less to file them in online databases.

2-Is it worth to buy the IRYS CARD?
Think: Would you like  a stranger access your bank account or use your profile on social networks? Use a strong password is the first step to protect the privacy of your information. This is the point where the Irys card shows its value with double authentication system.

3 - Is there no way to manage my passwords for free?
There are password management APPs, where you register all your passwords in a single place and access with another master password. But:
A) Is it safe to concentrate all of your visible passwords in one place? Besides being a potential target of cyber attacks , they can been accessed from anywhere in the world.
B) Do you have confidence in your bank details, your online presence or your service history on a single free server?
C) Although good alternatives, they are not immune to network failures.
D) What if someone finds out your password? With Irys we will not even know any of your passwords.
The Irys card not only protects and simplifies your life but integrates crescent community that knows it's that information is power.

4- I suspect that my account has been hacked and I need to change the password, do I have to buy another card?
No. You do not need to buy another card, you just need to change your key trick that will have new passwords. But if you have dozens of registrations and do not want to change all, you can enforce only the essential services with a new string or wildcard code in back of the card.

5- My card was stolen, I lost all the passwords?
We always recommend that you take a copy of your card as soon as that it arrives and store it in a safe place, this will be your emergency backup. To access your accounts, the thief would have to know what their records are, the email used and decrypt their passwords with their key trick, something quite unlikely for a simple pickpocket.

 

Risks and Challenges

Delays in production can happen, but we are dedicated to making this project a success. The greatest risk for us involves transport.  But, I guarantee that you will receive your cards as soon as possible. My number one goal is to surprise you. If you have questions or comments, please contact me at cesaroli@iryscard.com.

 

HELP US TO DISCLOSE THE CAMPAIGN

THANK YOU

 

 

Endnote: Excluding Irys card, all brands, logos, trademarks, and names that were used in the campaign not belong to Irys card, so they were used for the sole purpose of exemplifying an actual product application.

story:
Stay tuned, we will relaunch soon this funding campaign. Demonstration videos are on the way. Until then, see us at agentpoke.com
--------

Hi all, welcome to our Indiegogo campaign for AgentPoke, the World's First Appointment Chip for Google calendarTM.
--------

WHAT IS IT ABOUT?

Let's say you got done with a business deal and your client is going to leave. The question is, which of the following would make him go back, more likely, for a new meeting?

A) A piece of candy as a gift,
B) A business card with contact details or
C) A small chip that helps him book appointment instantly.

If your answear is (c), then the AgentPoke chips is for you. 
The AgentPoke appointment chip is a small NFC tag that enables you to share with friends and clients your availability, and allow them to book time slots right on their mobile browsers. Chips are compatible with any NFC ready smartphone so you and your clients don't need to download any app.

[Appointment chip based on NFC technology - No download required]
The chart below summarize the magic of the appointment workflow by using the AgentPoke NFC chip.


WHY YOU WILL LOVE IT?

You would say: "Nice, but wait! Do your mean that apart from running my business, I will have to manage an appointment calendar too?"
NO, absolutely not! The AgentPoke appointment chips are supposed to make your life easier but not the opposite. The main advantages are:

Chips work on Google calendar TM

When people poke on your NFC chip for an appointment, you will receive the booking request in your email. Better, you don't need to manage incoming appointment requests as they can be automatically accepted and directly added to your own Google calendar. And, according to your calendar setting, Google notifies you via pop up, email or sms when a Google calendar event is going to start.

[The appointment booking lands  right on your Google calendar]

As easy as eating chips

Using AgentPoke chips is a piece of cake. Upon the reception of NFC chips, you will simply need to log into the AgentPoke platform to connect your account with Google. You can then share your chips with clients and forget until your next business meetings. Again, using chips is straight forward, NO DOWNLOAD is required. 

Coin-sized, Made of plastic

Water resistant and much less cumbersome than paper-based business cards, appointment chips slip naturally in any pocket and therefore has much more chance to remain there.

Appointment chips are reusable so you can take them back, before a meeting, for another use.

Multiple interactions: Display, Tap and Scan

The possible interaction is not limited to tapping the phone on the NFC chip, your client can also book an appointment with you by scanning the QR code printed on the back of your chip. If you support us via the "CUSTOMIZE" perk below, you can have your contact details along with your logo or any other artwork printed on chips' front sides.

Comprehensive solution

Chips are not for appointments only. Thanks to the AgentPoke's integrated publishing platform, you can create a comprehensive mobile web app for your business and use the app as a landing page for your NFC chips.

You can among other things use the generated app to showcase your products and to share your social pages.

The table below shows what you will get with the AgentPoke solution compared with others.


WHICH PERK?

Whether you want to increase the client return rate or just for fun, you can support our project and enjoy the present and the coming amazing features from AgentPoke. 

[Your rewards in picture: Reusable appointment chips + Mobile landing page]

To start, choose your perk among the following:

The ENGAGE perk

For $30 pledged, you will receive 30 pre-made appointment chips in your chosen color.

Before the shipping, your NFC-QR code chips are coupled with an appointment booking page on AgentPoke.com so you can use them right away.

Chips specifications are:
Content: Scheduling page URL - Reusable
Material: PVC - White
Print quality: Full color CMYK
Size: 30 mm
NFC: Mifare Ultralight

What about a cup of chips. Pre-order now.

The CUSTOMIZE perk

For $100, you will receive 100 NFC chips and you can brand them with your logo, custom texts or any other artworks. If you don't have your own design, you can pick any of our pre-made templates that are tailored for various business categories. New templates will be added gradually as the backers number rises.

To thank you for such a huge contribution, we will not bill you the shipping fee (US). Click here to start.


The EARLY ADOPTER perk

To reward you for being there from the beginning, we will offer you the opportunity to join the magic of AgentPoke for a small amount of money. For only $10, you will get 5 NFC-QR code chip along with the corresponding landing page which normally cost $72  per year.

This perk is limited to 200 backers only, claim your own now.

The ENABLE perk

Keeping clients coming back is good, but catching new comers is better, right? By picking the ENABLE perk, you can place the appointment stickers below on your store's door and catch passing by clients even during off-hours and non-working days.

Like the AgentPoke token chip, the sticker is activated with NFC and QR code tags so that mobile users can read it both by scan and by tap.

Sticker specifications:
Size: 100mm x 80mm
NFC: NTAG203

[Enable perk: Ready-made appointment stickers and mobile landing pages]

The CONNECT perk

Do you like business cards? You will like even more our appointment business cards with NFC tags. The principle is the same, to book an appointment with you, your contact person will simply need to tap the card. A transparent QR code is also provided for non-NFC smartphone.

Back us now and claim your AgentPoke business card >>

Want to get free appointment chips?

Earn referral points by sharing our campaign with friends and social followers. Use the social share button above while you are connected to make us aware of your promotional effort. Once the campaign reaches the goal, we will reward you with NFC chips that is worth tenth of the resulting perks. 

BEHIND THE SCENES

You can manually manage your appointments or edit your whole mobile web app by log in to the AgentPoke platform. The screenshot below shows an overview of the integrated mobile web app builder.

[The AgentPoke.com platform]

If you choose the "CUSTOMIZE" perk or the "CONNECT" perk, you can use our online print template builder to create your own chip design or business card design. 

[The chips and business cards design tool]

WHAT IS NEXT? 

Appointment chips is only the beginning of the killer features from the AgentPoke to make your life better. The current campaign is launched to speed up the platform upgrade process so that we can move to the next step. We will reveal the details of the coming features once the funding reaches ten thousand dollars.

TIMELINE

In a few words, the timeline can be summarized as below:

  • The AgentPoke platform and server are now ready, The platform is live at http://agentpoke.com
  • The chip template builder is still under construction, it will be live in 4 weeks. 
  • Active chips, stickers and business cards will be shipped in the next 90 days.


    ABOUT ME

    I am the Director of Net2mobi Ltd, London, a Software as a Service provider startup. Our main services are AgentPoke.com and TagMyPrint.com. I am also a blogger at mobiwebreviews.com

    I have a scientific background and earn a Processes and High Technology Engineering PhD from the Paris university Pierre & Marie Curie.

      THE TEAM

      Meet the AgentPoke team

      Mirindra, Ph.D. in Engineering
      Our Director

      Ader, Software Engineer
      Our Developer

      Emmanueline, Software Engineer
      Our Developer

      Lova, Software Engineer
      Our Designer 

      FAQ

      With my Google calendar alone, can I use directly NFC chips?
      Short answer: NO, chips work only via the AgentPoke platform
      Long answer: The existing Google calendar widget by Google is great for sharing Free/Busy information on the web. However you cannot receive appointment booking unless your client 1) uses a digital calendar and 2) he/she added your Google calendar to his personal calendar and 3) he knows your Gmail address.
      Will I need to download a software?
      No, you only need a web browser to manage your account. As for chips, they are automatically recognized by any NFC ready smartphone, no additional app is required. Pages open directly on the mobile's browser. 
      Do peoples can book appointment online via my website too?
      Yes, by using the AgentPoke widget you can add the appointment scheduling feature to your existing website. You can also use the widget to automatically redirect mobile users from your website to your mobile web app built on AgentPoke.com
      Will  I be able to change my tags landing page?
      Yes, you can transparently redirect your NFC and QR code link to any URL.
      Is there a subscription fee?
      No, chips and other materials ordered via this campaign come with lifetime accounts on AgentPoke.com,
      Is my phone ready for NFC?
      Check out NFC smartphone here.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      We planned to include an introduction video to this campaign, if you are a video/animation producer, feel free to contact us. As a reward, you will get credit for your video on our site, in this pitch (as an H4 text, our main titles are H3), and anywhere this campaign is posted/shared.

      For any other request (reseller opportunity, partnership, sponsorship), feel free to contact us at contact@ agentpoke.com

      *AgentPoke is not affiliated with GoogleTM
      Icon credits: flaticon, thenounproject, icons8
