story:
Sky notebook is not an ordinary notebook. Each page of it contains a fragment of an artwork. All the fragments are united by one single subject which is the sky, as the embodiment of the majestic, sublime and spiritual. We used fragments of masterpieces from the greatest US art museums. Now you can get acquainted with masterpieces from these museums by simply opening your Sky notebook. Explore art, enjoy time spent with Sky notebook, write, draw, get inspired, create, plan, do everything you like.

 

● Every page is unique and has no duplicates  

● Pages contain fragments of paintings of great artists from the biggest art museums in the US:  

● Every page contains a QR code that redirects to the corresponding fragment painting page to find more information about its name, author, host museum and the complete version of the painting.

 

● Our Sky notebook is just like the sky - it has no limits, and yields imagination and creativity. For convenience of keeping, the notebook we chose points that won't distract you, but will help to make your notes tidy and neat.

Have you ever noticed how the sky influences one`s mood?

Have you ever been to an art museum?

Are you acquainted with the masterpieces created by the greatest painters?

Dive with us into the world of art, creativity and feelings.

Since ancient times humanity has dreamt about the sky. The sky is a source of creative energy. The sky is a sanctuary of the spiritual and sensational. Poets, writers, composers, and painters appealed to the sky talking about love, and exposing to us all the beauty of their souls. We look at masterpieces of the greatest painters and we see the sky that they painted many years ago. The sky has no age, even in old paintings it looks modern. A vision of the sky is a vision of eternity.

After studying numerous paintings in museums and art books we noticed how much the sky affects the mood of the picture: sunny, cloudy, murky, serene, melancholy, anxious. It reminded us of a variety of human moods, and we decided to create a notebook with fragments of the sky in different states so that everyone can choose a page that calls to him or her in the given moment.

It will be a pleasure to use this notebook to write, take notes, draw, keep a diary or a day planner, or record thoughts. The unusual backgrounds transform each page into an interesting story. This may be a background for a sketch or favorite poems, for notes, or a to-do list. Thus, everyone can find him or herself accompanied by pieces of art work every day.

Every page is beautiful in itself, and with your notes the notebook will become an exciting designer book that can be a part of your favorite fiction and art books library.

We've created the Sky notebook with an aim to create an aesthetically beautiful notebook for creative people and art lovers, romantics, travellers, intellectuals, for everybody who loves to discover something new. Sky notebook will inspire and develop your own creative side, bring you aesthetic pleasure, and uncover many, great old artists. Fragments of the masterpieces will always be with you.

Sky postcard. Vincent van Gogh "Wheat Field with Cypresses" (Fragment)

 The Metropolitan Museum of Art

Every page of your notebook contains a QR code that redirects you to the corresponding fragment painting page to find more information about its name, author, host museum and a view the complete painting. Thus, you can always discover something new, have a virtual tour to an art museum, and enjoy the beauty of splendid landscapes.

Skan

Explore art 

François Boucher "Washerwomen". 

The Metropolitan Museum of Art.

Among the fragments in the notebook are paintings by the following artists: Vincent van Gogh, Claude Monet, Camille Pissarro, Jacob Isaacksz. van Ruisdael, Claude Lorrain, François Boucher, Camille Corot, Pieter Bruegel the Elder, Thomas Moran, William Trost Richards Ivan Aivasovsky, Hendrick Avercamp, Canaletto  and others.

Cover type: Hardcover

Dimensions: 8.3”x5.8”

Paper type: Offset quality paper

Paper weight: 100GSM

Pages: 170

Ruling: Dot grid

Functionality: As a notebook, sketchbook, diary, smash book, scrap book, or planner.

Dot grid

 A ribbon to help you find important pages.

A lovely addition to the notebook are the extra sheets: to do list, birthdays, weekly planner, etc. These extra sheets will be available as a free download on our site: www.sky.artnotebook.net  after the conclusion of this funding project.

•    September & October – Indigogo Campaign
•    October & November – Manufacturing begins
•    November & December – Delivery (hurray!)
 

We put all of our efforts into manufacturing and delivering the notebook in accordance with schedule so that you receive your notebook on time. For this reason, we collaborated with a leading printing house that helps us with manufacturing the notebook so you receive it quickly.

We believe we will be able to deliver in a timely and efficient manner, and do not foresee any risks and challenges that would cause major delays. We will remain in regular communication with our backers as our project goes through the production process. 

We will always be available for questions: sky@artnotebook.net. Thank you again for your support!

SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN AND RECEIVE A PAGE OF FREE STICKERS WITH YOUR ORDER! Tag us on Facebook or Instagram and we'll add a free page of Sky Stickers to your order. By sharing and tagging us, you'll also get a chance to win a free Sky postcards kit or free Sky notebook. Winners will be announced at the end of our campaign.

1. Share us on facebook.
2. Send an email with a screen shot of your share to share@artnotebook.net

Your support can help make these Sky notebooks a reality. Our goal is 14.000 USD. It’s a minimum that we must to spend to manufacturing and delivering. We want to share Sky notebook with you so the more support we get the more chance bring this project to live. So please help spread the word!

story:
Inspiration

 

The definition of privacy in the English Oxford Dictionary (https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/pr...) is given as “A state in which one is not observed or disturbed by other people.” or as “The state of being free from public attention.”

 

The right to privacy is our right to keep a domain around us, which includes all those things that are part of us, such as our body, home, property, thoughts, feelings, secrets and identity. The right to privacy gives us the ability to choose which parts in this domain can be accessed by others, and to control the extent, manner and timing of the use of those parts we choose to disclose. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Privacy)

 

This fundamental right has been ethically and constitutionally endangered by the shady use of technology, raising concerns on how to fortify ourselves and the world from the threat of privacy infringement that companies, governments and other malicious factors are posing.

 

In opposition to the rapid advancement in technology in our days, there is a lack of the proper education and information for the public on this field.

 

Source: https://blog.keepersecurity.com/2017/01/13/most-common-passwords-of-2016-research-study/

 

By just taking a look at the list above you can realize the magnitude of the problem raised. With our project we have decided to take action and address the problem at a fundamental basis.

 

A chain is as weak as its weakest link.

 

It is very essential to understand that our privacy, just like a chain, is as vulnerable as our weakest link, in this case, as our weakest account and therefore as our weakest password.

 

The LOTOS Project tackles the problem by providing you with a safe and memorable password, while also giving essential tips to ensure and maintain your cyber-security.

 

How it works

 

The innovative element in our project, that distinguishes us from other applications such as password managers, is the RA.M.P. (RAndom Memorable Passphrase) algorithm. By devising the RA.M.P. algorith we are able to provide you with strong, but also memorable passwords!!

 

We have tested paswords that were created by our RA.M.P. generator and have had 100% successful results concerning the strength of the passwords and endurance against dictionary attacks.

 

 

 

Our project is based on a very specific and secure plan.

The program that hosts the RA.M.P. generator exists only in an isolated from the Internet computer. This computer was formatted and is systematically checked for any possible threats. We have a strict no-internet policy and the only way data is transferred into the computer is by secure USB hard drives.

The password that will be generated will be printed and sent to you via mail.

Mailing the passwords is one of the safest methods for delivering you our services.

The printer used is also always diconnected from the Internet and absolutely isolated.

 

 

But possessing bullet proof passwords is not the only way to protect ourselves from privacy intrusions and to maintain our security. The key is knowledge. That is why another aspect of The LOTOS Project is teaching people of other methods for staying safe in the cyber world and spreading the word about privacy. That is why the letter being sent is not just a list of passwords but also a guide to security and we are definite you will find the tips written inside very useful.

 

With your help, our future goal is to make The LOTOS Project and its innovative RA.M.P. generator available via a free Andoid application.

 

 

Password managers are a smart solution for managing your passwords and some times even generating random ones. The LOTOS Project is not however a substitute for this type of applications. We provide a clever way to generate memorable, strong, random passwords sent to you by mail and accompanied by a set of security tips.

 

The LOTOS passwords can be used in cases that a password manager could be inadequate, such as: a password manager’s master key, screen lock passwords, WiFi passwords or when not using your personal computer.

 

Even if you are using a password manager it is always easier to type in our LOTOS passwords rather than most complicated, random passwords.

It is a nice idea to use LOTOS complementary to a password manager.

 

WHAT WE OFFER & PERKS

 

We need your support to launch this project off the ground. With your help we can offer you finer passwords and spread through our campaign and throughout you the importance of cyber-security and privacy.

 

1) LOTOS Project: Classic Package

You will be mailed our RA.M.P. generated passwords and our privacy-security tips.

Includes: Three passwords

Privacy & security tips

Free subscription to our security-privacy newsletter (optional)

Free Shipping

 

 

2) LOTOS Project: Vintage Package

You will get a more classic version of our mailed password letters.

Includes: Three passwords

Privacy & security tips

Mailed with a vintage wax seal of our project’s monogram, the “L”

We will personally thank you (if you wish so) for your contribution and support on our social media pages

Free subscription to our security-privacy newsletter (optional)

Free Shipping

 

History note: Wax is used to verify  that something such as a document is unopened, to verify the sender's identity, for example with a signet ring, and as decoration. Wax was used to seal letters close and later, from about the 16th century, envelopes.

 

 

3) LOTOS Project: Premium Package

You will be mailed our RA.M.P. generated passwords and our privacy-security tips along with some cool stickers.

Includes: Three passwords

Privacy & security tips

3 laptop stickers with our logo, the LOTOS

We will personally thank you (if you wish so) for your contribution and support on our social media pages

Free subscription to our security-privacy newsletter (optional)

Free Shipping

 

 

If we reach our funding goal we will insert a few new features in The LOTOS Project:

* French RA.M.P. generated passwords

* Greeklish (Greek spelled out in Latin characters) RA.M.P. generated passwords

 

 

WHY “LOTOS”?

 

In Greek mythology the lotus-eaters (Greek: λωτοφάγοι, lotophagoi), were a race of people living on an island dominated by lotus plants, also known as persimmons. The lotus fruits and flowers were the primary food of the island and caused the inhabitants to forget and sleep in apathy. In general the lotos is a symbol of forgetfulness.

 

The name “lotos” was an inspiration since our RA.M.P. algorithm aims on creating memorable passwords, thus ones that are not easy to forget.

 

Who we are

 

The two co-founders of The LOTOS Project are the Papadopoulos brothers, Dimosthenis and Konstantinos. Our team plans on growing even more aiming to make the project available on more platforms and to spread the word about privacy and security.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Funding is not the only way you can help us.

Like our Facebook page - The LOTOS Project @lotosproject

Follow us on Twitter - The LOTOS Project @lotos_project

Use the Indiegogo share tools and

Spread the word in general to people you know that they need to hear this

We appreciate any help we receive.

Thank you all in advance just for investing some time and hearing what we have to say!!

The key is knowledge. That is why another aspect of The LOTOS Project is teaching people of other methods for staying safe in the cyber world and spreading the word about privacy. That is why the letter being sent is not just a list of passwords but also a guide to security and we are definite you will find the tips written inside very useful. With your help, our future goal is to make The LOTOS Project and its innovative RA.M.P. generator available via a free Andoid application.  Password managers are a smart solution for managing your passwords and some times even generating random ones. The LOTOS Project is not however a substitute for this type of applications. We provide a clever way to generate memorable, strong, random passwords sent to you by mail and accompanied by a set of security tips. The LOTOS passwords can be used in cases that a password manager could be inadequate, such as: a password manager’s master key, screen lock passwords, WiFi passwords or when not using your personal computer. Even if you are using a password manager it is always easier to type in our LOTOS passwords rather than most complicated, random passwords.It is a nice idea to use LOTOS complementary to a password manager. WHAT WE OFFER & PERKS We need your support to launch this project off the ground. With your help we can offer you finer passwords and spread through our campaign and throughout you the importance of cyber-security and privacy. 1) LOTOS Project: Classic PackageYou will be mailed our RA.M.P. generated passwords and our privacy-security tips.Includes: Three passwordsPrivacy & security tipsFree subscription to our security-privacy newsletter (optional)Free Shipping  2) LOTOS Project: Vintage PackageYou will get a more classic version of our mailed password letters.Includes: Three passwordsPrivacy & security tipsMailed with a vintage wax seal of our project’s monogram, the “L”We will personally thank you (if you wish so) for your contribution and support on our social media pagesFree subscription to our security-privacy newsletter (optional)Free Shipping History note: Wax is used to verify  that something such as a document is unopened, to verify the sender's identity, for example with a signet ring, and as decoration. Wax was used to seal letters close and later, from about the 16th century, envelopes.  3) LOTOS Project: Premium PackageYou will be mailed our RA.M.P. generated passwords and our privacy-security tips along with some cool stickers.Includes: Three passwordsPrivacy & security tips3 laptop stickers with our logo, the LOTOSWe will personally thank you (if you wish so) for your contribution and support on our social media pagesFree subscription to our security-privacy newsletter (optional)Free Shipping  If we reach our funding goal we will insert a few new features in The LOTOS Project:* French RA.M.P. generated passwords* Greeklish (Greek spelled out in Latin characters) RA.M.P. generated passwords  WHY “LOTOS”? In Greek mythology the lotus-eaters (Greek: λωτοφάγοι, lotophagoi), were a race of people living on an island dominated by lotus plants, also known as persimmons. The lotus fruits and flowers were the primary food of the island and caused the inhabitants to forget and sleep in apathy. In general the lotos is a symbol of forgetfulness. The name “lotos” was an inspiration since our RA.M.P. algorithm aims on creating memorable passwords, thus ones that are not easy to forget. Who we are The two co-founders of The LOTOS Project are the Papadopoulos brothers, Dimosthenis and Konstantinos. Our team plans on growing even more aiming to make the project available on more platforms and to spread the word about privacy and security.  Other Ways You Can Help Funding is not the only way you can help us.Like our Facebook page - The LOTOS Project @lotosprojectFollow us on Twitter - The LOTOS Project @lotos_projectUse the Indiegogo share tools andSpread the word in general to people you know that they need to hear thisWe appreciate any help we receive.Thank you all in advance just for investing some time and hearing what we have to say!!

story:
Hi Everyone!

This really is a concept for everyone. It will benefit everyone who eats food! It will benefit the environment while providing safe and nutritious food for any user anywhere on the planet.

Green Farm Bio Tech is the name of our grass roots organic farming technologies company. We are so grass roots we do not even have a website yet lol! - but that is coming. We are two guys who have backgrounds in basic farming and animal husbandry as well as a self taught approach to agro-biochemistry utilizing purely organic methods from start to finish. We have created pro-biotic formulas and processes that enhance and inoculate fertilizers, crops and the animals that consume them - including us humans.

In a nut shell we have come up with a total organic farming system that uses no chemicals, no growth hormones, no pharmaceutical injections and yet achieves a healthier and more nutritious end product at LESS than the cost of contemporary industrial and commercial farming practices.

To be absolutely honest we are hoping to get rich ourselves eventually, from our discoveries and hard work. However, we would also like to share the wealth with our contributors by offering them future investment opportunities with Green Farm Bio Tech for any size contribution. All contributors will be placed on a priority investors list. Contributors will also receive regular updates and progress reports through our soon to be launched website.

Our fertilizers are entirely organic. Our water and feed enhancers are entirely organic. We have designed a fermentation process to create entirely organic livestock inoculations which amazingly eradicate E-coli, Salmonella and other harmful pathogens without using the drugs and chemicals that are commonly incorporated into mainstream commercial farming practices.

All of these products are completely safe and actually beneficial to the surrounding environment - unlike contemporary commercial farming practices that are big polluters both to ground water and to the air we breathe.

So why are we here on this website asking for help?  Well, over the last 6 years I have invested about $27,000 of my hard earned money on developing these wonderful organic systems and products while my friend and business partner has invested more than double that amount. We have made great steps towards our goal of bringing our products and processes to the public awareness and thus into mainstream utilization - BUT and yes of course here is the 'but' - we are at the stage where we need to set up a series of tests under the auspices of some professors we have lined up to work with us in order to scientifically (and empirically) validate our results - in other words, we have to prove that our stuff works!

In order to achieve these results and to be able to present them to the public and industry we must build a much more elaborate small scale pilot bio-organic farming system in which to incorporate the necessary controls for the comparisons which will be made using the strict empirical approach standard to all properly conducted testing procedures.

To make that happen we need to lease a piece of agricultural land suitable to construct the testing facility. And then of course we need to build the animal pens, composting stations, laboratory hut, fermentation hut, irrigation and feed system to name a few things. The duration of the testing phase will be 12 to 16 months depending on various factors and that is once we have the above infrastructure in place. Thus we are estimating a cost for this 'phase 2' at approximately $200,000. We have come to this website - with hats in hands hoping (and praying!) that we could assemble about $150,000 of the estimated $200,000 we will need to advance this project. The remainder of funds will be assembled by my partner and I with the help of friends and family.

The benefits to people everywhere are easy to envision and self-evident so I don't think I need to state them - just use your imagination - the sky is indeed the limit for the applications we have developed!

They suggest at indiegogo.com that we state what's in it for you if you decide our project merits a contribution. Well, we would be honored to know each and every contributor and we would love to provide regular updates to contributors once we have a website up and running. We commit to that certainly and we make that pledge to you.

Simply put, it would be our privilege to involve you in any way you would like. Perhaps you may like to become involved in the testing phase itself and we would not be opposed to that possibility. Or maybe some Warren Buffet or Bill Gates type might read this and want to fund the whole project and become a partner - hint hint, lol!

Who knows, perhaps one day you may want to come and work for our company when we eventually launch Green Farm Bio Tech on to the world stage. Thanks for reading our pitch and stay in touch.

Here we go!

story:
Focusing on You, the Writer

Today’s word processors’ largely concern themselves with one function - formatting content. Whether it’s page breaks, margins, fonts or layouts for images and graphs, they are packed with a host of tools to help you decide how to style your content. But what about you, the writer? Are modern writing programs equipped to handle your unique work-flow, writing style, and ever-changing mood?

 

A Powerfully Flexible Writing Space

Trestle is a free upcoming writing app that allows you to craft your own writing space and work the way you want - like you would on a real desk.

 

The first thing when using Trestle will be the… whole lot of nothing. But don’t fret! You’ll soon realize that writing on Trestle is unlike anything you’ve ever experienced. While strikingly empty in the beginning you can fill the layout with powerful tools we call widgets. These widgets offer distinctive features such as Time, Notes, or Tasks that sort of act like a separate app on their own. You can add, remove, resize, and reposition these widgets anywhere you see fit! Before you know it you’ll have your perfect workspace - whether that’s a word processing powerhouse or a zenlike minimalist writer. And to top it off, you can even customize the design of your new workspace with our lovely Themes.

Prototype 1.0

Prototype 2.0

 

Free and Pro

Trestle will be a free to use app when launched. But wait! There are still incentives to be a backer and support the project right now! The Pro tier offers several benefits such as increased cloud storage, unlimited layout saves, and a customizable grid system. Look at the details below!

 

 

Introducing Sheets

Sheets are customizable writing areas in Trestle. They can be resized and repositioned at will and you can even use several of them at the same time. Visually, Sheets incorporate inline toolbars instead of fixed toolbars to minimize graphic cluster and distractions. The design choice help writing on Trestle simple and distraction-free. In addition, we have support for the Markdown syntax and plan on incorporating LaTeX support.

 

Cluster Free Widgets

Trestle implements features into containers called Widgets. Each Widget has a function such as time, notes, or tasks. This reduces unnecessary tools and the complexity of finding features while making tools you need much more accessible in the feature. Need to find a widget you need? Simply place it in your layout and you’re done! You can now reference it anytime you need with a simple glance. And don’t worry, you can easily remove, resize, and reposition them later.

 

 

A Dynamic Layout

With our handy Widgets and bare minimum structure, you can easily build layouts that suits your taste or particular task. Trestle’s grid layout will automatically organize your Widgets so that they do not overlap. Save layouts you use often so you can summon a workspace to handle that specific task.

 

 

 

Help create Trestle

Trestle has come a long way since it was just an idea. More specifically, we’ve been working on the technology of Trestle for a few months and have recently started working on the user experience. We currently have a prototype that contains the core functionalities. It is being developed actively but has quite a way to go.

We want to bring Trestle to you guys as soon as possible and want to make an official release in the next 6 months. The vast majority of the funds raised here will go towards feeding us with enough caffeine and sugar to help construct Trestle as soon as possible. As we’re working on the project with no other source of income, any help would be appreciated! Another big portion will go towards maintaining Trestle’s infrastructure (things like servers!). Help fund Trestle and we’ll promise to deliver a writing app you’ll fall in love with.

 

About the Team: Ryestory

 

John Bae (Co-Founder/Programmer)

Born in South Korea and raised in the United States, John is the head programmer of the team. He enjoys binge watching the Lord of the Rings series and regrets watching Doctor Who so late in his life.

Andre Kim (Co-Founder/UI&UX Designer)

Born and raised in Sudan, Andre is the UX/UI designer of Ryestory. He likes to analyze how people act the way they do. Be wary.

Belita Cho (Programmer)

Belita is a front-end developer of Ryestory. While she doesn’t speak english at all she enjoys communicating in binary language. If you wanna be friends with her say "01101000 01101001" to her.

 

Based in South Korea, Ryestory is small, cozy team that has been working on small projects for the past 3 years. Our most recent project, Trestle, has been in development for the past 6 months with progress becoming faster every month. We’re a jolly group of university students that like creating fun software to use. Feel free to contact us!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help the project in a non-financial way, subscribe to us through our site and help us spread the word about our campaign! Feel free to share the project on your social sites like Facebook or Twitter!

story:
My Story

Hello! My name is Malha Bly the owner & operator of The Hair Gym®, 6 Sigma Black Belt, Programmer, I.T. Business Analyst, Programmer & Cosmetologist. I have always had a love affair with hair. After years of struggling and many a thousand of dollars spent to find products for my Afro-European daughter's hair, I decided to create my own products.  Her Hair story was such a success I could not keep up with demand. However, the other products were not selling as well and I ended up with spoilage and waste.  That is when I decided there had to be a better way than bulk ordering product and I created The Cosmix & Cosmixology. With the input of cosmetic chemists and other cosmetologists I built and programmed a machine that can take your hair and skin analysis and customize the ideal care for you. This is real customization.!

 

WHY THE COSMIX & COSMIXOLOGY?

Ethnic hair care choices have increased over the years but they are not all-encompassing of the vast diversity that is within the community. Ethnic women contribute over 80% of the revenue in this industry but don't have any say to the ingredients in the products they purchase. This campaign is import to all of us because the day of the cookie cutter is gone. we now have so many textures of hair in the world today that simply taking a hair quiz only puts you in a class but you are in an individual and that matters.  With this system, for the creation of custom hair & skincare products, you are now in control. The FDA only requires producers to disclose a small percentage of what they actually put in the products you use. However, this convenient solution will empower you to reduce waste, save money, & chose what ingredients are right for you.

"KNOWLEDGE IS BEAUTIFUL"

 

 

THE WONDERFUL BENEFITS OF YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS

  • Your contribution will help The Hair Gym® start its first exclusive production run.
  • Your contribution gives you the power to decide what is best for you. 
  • Your contribution removes the dictatorship in skin and hair care.
  • Contributions are a vote for innovative change in how your skin and hair is cared for.
  • By contributing you make customization widely available to everyone.
  • The bottles are reusable and the formula is perfect for you so the impact on the reduction of waste is tremendous. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Due to the minimalistic design of this machine only  $30,000 is needed to get to the first production run. This is an IoT smart machine that can be controlled via an app. Therefore any additional funds will be used to switch from Wifi to cellular connectivity. If this campaign does not reach its funding goal funds will be used to produce a smaller quantity of units using cheaper materials...... But nobody wants that, RIGHT! 

Check out the cool perks for helping us reach our goal. Perks include salon-grade top selling shampoos, conditioners, masks, hair sprays, sheens and T-shirt towels, T-shirts, kits, and memberships.

NOW MAKING QUALITY COSMETICS IS AS EASY AS MAKING A CUP OF COFFEE

 

The Impact

This is an exciting time and opportunity! Your contributions will make a huge positive impact on the beauty industry as a whole. You will be greatly impacting our future by reducing waste and it impacts your bottom line if you are a salon or spa owner.

The Innovative Countertop CosMix combines, Science, Technology & Beauty

Ideal for Cosmetologist, Trichologist, Dermatologist & D.I.Yers

The CosMix is a machine that is paired with a hand-held hair analysis tool. Information travels across  Wifi to start the machines process (no need to be in the same room). Data collected from the hair and scalp analysis is captured, then a custom formula is created from a proprietary software algorithm using a massive database of oils and herbal ingredients. The operator may then add or subtract ingredients with a push of a button on their smartphone, computer or directly on the CosMix machine.

*Patented in the US, Patent pending in  GB  

Benefits:

  • No excess inventory locking up $$ or taking up space in your salon
  • No more waiting on bulk orders to arrive
  • Know exactly what is in the product you sell
  • Rapid mix technology produces hair and skincare within an hour
  • Easy customization of formulas
  • Eliminate the guesswork of which product for which, customer
  • Increase clientele and retail sales

 

Risks & Challenges

  1. Hardware challenge - Bandwidths for IoT varies and a sleeping terminal cannot collect information. Solution: Machine set to automatically turn on scheduled shop hours to conserve energy.
  2. Architecture challenge - IoT encompasses a wide range of technologies. IoT involves an increasing number of smart interconnected devices and the machine has to recognize many of the analyzing tools on the market. Solution: Allow manual input to the machine directly until the new technology has registered.

The Journey

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Financial contributions are awesome during this 40-day campaign but you know what else is awesome? You and that you took the time to check us out.  Please help us spread the joy that having access to the machine will create. 

  • Talk about us
  • Blog about us
  • Tweet about us
  • Share the link on Facebook, Pintrest, Instagram, etc.

And please if you have any questions, comments, or feedback comment them on our instagram  IndieGoGo post @ maneconcepts or MsBly2014

Financial contributions are awesome during this 40-day campaign but you know what else is awesome? You and that you took the time to check us out.  Please help us spread the joy that having access to the machine will create. 

Talk about us
Blog about us
Tweet about us
Share the link on Facebook, Pintrest, Instagram, etc.

And please if you have any questions, comments, or feedback comment them on our instagram  IndieGoGo post @ maneconcepts or MsBly2014

story:
Hello!

My name is Roberto Rosario and I started Mayan EDMS 6 years ago. To my surprise, it has gone beyond anything I had planned for it and anything I could have imaged. New features continue to be added to this day on every release.

There are some features however that no matter how much I want to add, simply can't. The most common reason is that I or any of the contributors, don't know enough about a topic to add them. In this case, it is the lack of knowledge of a computer language that prevents adding a feature.

 

The purpose of this campaign

The feature in question is the ability to select "zones" in a document so that OCR (Optical Character Recognition) can be performed in them. Mayan EDMS currently offers OCR, but it performed for the entirety of a document. Many users request this feature periodically as it increased exponentially the use of the recognized text of a document.

There are several tiers to solve this and add zone OCR support. The part regarding the backend (Python) code I can manage. The frontend interation to select these zones is the part that is missing.  With zone OCR support, Mayan EDMS will be able to recognize things like invoice numbers much easier. Since this information will be store as part of the document, it can also be used in other parts of the system like the full text search or the indexing system.

 

The plan

With your contribution, this campaign aims to raise enough money so that a programmer experienced in the topic of zone OCR, HTML, CSS, and Javascript can be hired to add the remaining front-end piece of the puzzle. Consulting with experienced Javascript developers the most common figure was two days at a rate of $45 USD per hour. This give the total estimate of $720 dollars to hire a developer. The resulting code will be become a part of Mayan EDMS, under the same license of the project, no strings attached.
 

Risks & Challenges

Being experienced in the development of Mayan EDMS I will work with the programmer contracted to first define the deliverables of the contract. The major risk for this campaign will be extending over the amount of hours contracted. If this is the case I plan to cover personally a few extra hours if that is all that is needed. In the worst case that the project doesn't get completed, the resulting code will still be made available as a code branch for other to hack on and maybe get it complete.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help with the campaign economically, please just spread the word. Just use the buttons at the campaign and share it on your social media sites.

 

Thank you for helping Mayan EDMS grow and keeping it as free software for everybody!

story:
Our story in developing A'parrot Learning Application began with ambition:

7 days or Less than 3 months- Plus New Language Plus Opportunities

Imagines in scenarios :

"Do you spend time in summer World Cup-Russia 2018 and exciting to spend 7 days to learn Russian conversation which can help you chat with local people in there?"

"Or How would a person like me who dislikes studying indoors, is not usually a fan of flashcards and already has a pretty good learning strategy, be interested in software for improving vocabulary?"

So, Let see How to handle with it :

Not Focus on Rules and Formal # Not like you tried before

The A’parrot languages application takes a practical approach, it does not focus on rules and definitions. Instead, it supports you how words work and what they do in sentences

The vocabulary words used in the A’parrot were chosen because of their applicability to real-life scenarios.

Everything on the A’parrot is designed to relevant engaging graphics and flashcards, they stimulate creative and logical through processes, and help you to study, review, and categorize language structures.

The A’parrot chapters are organized around parts of speech, combination of vocabulary words and dialogs to match your needs.

A’parrot is different from traditional languages app, it takes into account the different ways in which learner familiar with a new language and, according, provides a variety of tools

Learn At Your Style

Pick your level Beginner, or difficult-level phrases and select variety languages you want to journey with. It will be recorded and separated profiles to learn at your own pace.

Carefully designed graphic illustrations combine with translated mother language of user into visual image. Great for logical and recognize vocabulary words learners! 

Save your time and Speak smoothly by access community.

It helps you learn vocabulary words by pick and choose which all or one you like, and automatically update contents !

Easily to adjust time, repeat and customize appearance contents by You !

Flexible yourself study schedule by setting appearance (Daily, timeline, repeat, sound notification) and help you learn different elements of language: vocabulary, lessons, dialogs, quiz tests.

All study plan approved by Yourself only!

Yourself easy to pick and choose subject, time of Real-time conversations with native languages speakers

Video quality Fast – We integrated in this app video call function with high concentration on performance in Quality and Supporting Variety Network including 3G!

They provide the learner with the opportunity to unlock skill how combine words work and what they do in real!

Sharing your achievements like way you are! And exciting to climb up higher mountain!

Easily Push Notification Into Long-Term Memory

We use a simple learning tool: Push Notification System. This means we'll show you and test you on words, dialogs to unlock next lessons and repeat you before you have forgotten. And so far, customize schedule in-app will walk you through multiple choices: which words do you want to learn? Which flashcard subject will you begin in the first of day and how many times a day you desire its suitable for your busy schedule?

The app automatically sends push notification by selected timeline to easy access!

We are also preparing which words you’re going to forget and tests you on them beforehand. Every progress of learning will be recorded into performance chart and you can access and increase your index every time!

What Languages Will It Support?

French, Russian, English, Chinese, Vietnamese more coming soon!

Compatible With Android and iOS

Timeline to The Google Play and The App Store

We are in finalizing stages for functions in-app including:

  • Finalizing displays 
  • Finished function:  personal organization study plan
  • Finished function:  personal progress dashboard
  • Finished function:  Audio recording
  • In finalizing Database lessons and video call 

 If we meet our minimum funding goals, we'll start by finished a beta version of our app that should be ready by April of 2018, and then we'll release a full version onto the Android app stores in May of 2018.

The website, blogs will start shortly after the app in beta. We set a timeline to keep the beta dates on track with full features and listen feedback from social and the public so that our team can fix issues. And whether you'd like to start, We welcome you to contribute in community by contents and flashcard via our official website / blog, We'll review any of the flashcards you created and keep it update to everyone via notification! 

Important! No matter what language(s) you choose, The app is free to downloads included contents and flashcards, you only have to pay a little cost when you book speaking packages with the native speakers around the world.

About The App

What is The A'parrot learning application? 

- It is designed to give learners of Languages a difference concept study.

Who Created it?

- Philotes Capital., ltd (established in Oct.2017) with an established customer base and a support structure for handling large projects

Why should we use it?
- For anyone who has ever wanted to learn a language. At The A'parrot, we see that the best way to learn is through conversation. And A'parrot provides to you full tools to help you speak like a Native. "Plus New Language Plus Opportunities" A'parrot team

How much does it cost?

- Free to download (Google store, App store) including fee to access : contents of lessons, flashcards

- "A Little" cost to book Speaking packages with native speakers

Why We Need Your Support

We're crowdfunding to finance development of the app.

And we think Indiegogo is a perfect platform for such an adventure because of the vast majority of passionate people.

By your help in our campaign, you will help us bring this amazing app to the public. We’ve worked in effort into designing interface, building data and continuing listen feedback from users to make a better and fit with your needs

Thank you for your time and Let’s enjoy with A’parrot together

Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with?
- It's an iOS/Android native app.

When will the app be available?
- The official app will be on May.2018 with The Google Play and next version for iOS will be ready on Sepember.2018

About our team:

We are teammate, come from difference Foreign language level, but same point of us is exciting in developing simplicity application to help user can archive new languages as well as unlock new opportunities. Hence, we’ve established Philotes Capital., ltd (in Oct.2017) to develop the A’parrot languages application

story:
CRONIOS

Die Uhr, die Spaß macht. Ein Hingucker, ein Lichtmagnet, ein täglicher Helfer, ein Dekoelement. Neueste Technik, neueste Technologien, entwickelt und gebaut in                                   Berlin, Deutschland. Made in Germany.

                                 

                                 

                                 

The clock that is a lot of fun. An eye-catcher, a daily aid, a decorative piece. State-of-the-art technology—developed and manufactured in
                                    Berlin, Germany. Made in Germany.

CRONIOS basiert auf Pi - kreisrund und in sechzig Segmente unterteilt. Jedes Segment ist von einer Digital-RGB-LED besetzt. So ist es möglich, Sekunden, Minuten und Stunden farblich darzustellen.   

CRONIOS is based on pi—as round as a circle and divided in sixty segments. Every segment comes with a digital RGB LED. Thus seconds, minutes, and hours can be depicted using colors.

                                 


                                 

  

CRONIOS will gestalten. Jede CRONIOS will anders sein. Du kannst CRONIOS gestalten, Deine eigene CRONIOS ist das Ziel.

CRONIOS is designing. Every CRONIOS dreams of being different. You can design CRONIOS, your own CRONIOS is the objective.


CRONIOS hängt an der Wand, liegt auf dem Schreibtisch oder wird von einem Spiegel oder einer anderen Fläche reflektiert. Mit CRONIOS darf man spielen. CRONIOS ist flexibel. CRONIOS spielt mit.

CRONIOS may hang on the wall, lie on the desk or may be reflected by a mirror or another surface. You can play with CRONIOS. CRONIOS is flexible. CRONIOS will play along.

CRONIOS ist ein Design-Experiment. Unser Chef ist meint, CRONIOS braucht kein Mensch. Aber wir, die Entwickler, Denker und Träumer in unserer Firma, sind überzeugt, CRONIOS ist mehr, CRONIOS muss bekannt gemacht werden. Der Chef sagt "dann finanziert die Sache und gut ist".

CRONIOS is a designing experiment. Our boss is convinced that no one needs CRONIOS. But we, the developers, thinkers and dreamers at our company, think that CRONIOS is more than that and that awareness of CRONIOS has to be spread. Our boss says that we may go ahead if the project is properly financed.

OK! Das machen wir nun!  Okay, here we go!

Die Herstellung von CRONIOS basiert auf mehreren Hoch-Technologien. CRONIOS' Herz ist ein moderner 32 bit Cortex Controller mit integrierter Echtzeituhr und integrierter USB-Schnittstelle. Die eingesetzte Stütz-Batterie hält etwa 10 Jahre und ist natürlich auswechselbar. CRONIOS kann an einen PC angeschlossen und umfangreich konfiguriert werden. Sommer- und Winterzeit ist für CRONIOS kein Problem, CRONIOS weiss Bescheid, das alles wird automatisch erledigt. Ein PC-basiertes Konfigurationsprogramm ist inklusive. Es ermöglicht Einstellungen zu allen Events in Farbe, Helligkeit und Dauer. Einfach CRONIOS an den PC anschließen, schon kann man nach Herzenslust einstellen. CRONIOS macht Spaß.



CRONIOS is manufactured using several sophisticated technologies. CRONIOS's heart is a modern 32 bit cortex controller with an integrated real time clock and an integrated USB interface. The battery life is approximately 10 years and it can be replaced if depleted. CRONIOS can also be connected to a PC so there are numerous ways for personalization and configuration. Setting the clock to daylight saving time (DST) is no problem for CRONIOS because it switches those automatically. A PC-based configuration program is included as well. Several parameters like color, brightness, and the duration of effects can be adjusted. Simply attach CRONIOS to your PC and configure it according to your personal preferences. CRONIOS is a lot of fun.

Eingesetzt werden sehr leuchtstarke, neueste DIGITAL-RGB-LEDs. Jede der 60 LEDs hat einen eigenen digitalen PWM-Controller integriert. Nur so gelingt es überhaupt, dass jede LED in Farbe und Helligkeit völlig unabhängig angesteuert werden kann. CRONIOS ist eben high-tech. Über die USB-Schnittstelle wird die Stromversorgung sichergestellt und auch das Farbprofil konfiguriert.

CRONIOS uses bright state-of-the-art digital RGB LEDs. Everyone of the 60 LEDs comes with its own digital PWM controller. Hence, every single LED can have a distinct color and brightness. Its power is provided via the USB interface. In addition, it can also be used to configure the color profile.

   


CRONIOS kann man auch direkt bedienen: Eine aufgesetzte Drehscheibe erkennt, dass Du CRONIOS etwas mitteilen möchtest - entweder ein neues Farbprofil ausprobieren oder nur mal schnell den Kurzzeitwecker für die Kocheier stellen.

CRONIOS can also be configured in a more direct fashion: a rotary disk recognizes that you want to change CRONIOS’s appearance—you could try a new color profile or simply set the timer when you cook an egg.

CRONIOS' Elektronik stellen wir selbst her, denn die Berliner Firma DIAMEX ist  etablierter Entwickler und Hersteller elektronischer Komponenten.

CRONIOS's electronic components are manufactured by our own company—because the company DIAMEX from Berlin is an established developer and manufacturer of electronic components.

CRONIOS' Umhüllung oder Deko-Komponente übernimmt ein fantastischer Werkstoff - ACRYL.

CRONIOS's case is made of a marvelous material—ACRYLIC.

ACRYL oder PLEXIGLAS gibt es in unglaublich vielen Varianten und Ausführungen. Allen gemeinsam ist das wunderschöne Ambiente durch knackige Farben - die hochwertige Anmutung einer ACRYL-Installation. CRONIOS ist aus ACRYL. CRONIOS ist stylisch. ACRYL ist schwer. Das beeindruckt wirklich - halte CRONIOS und Du wirst sofort wissen - CRONIOS ist werthaltig!

ACRYLIC or PLEXIGLASS is available in numerous variations. All of them are characterized by a beautiful ambience because of their bright colors. CRONIOS if made from ACRYLIC. CRONIOS is stylish. ACRYLIC is heavy. That is really impressive—hold CRONIOS in your hands and you will realize immediately that CRONIOS is valuable.

DIAMEX verfügt über eine ganze Phalanx von ACRYL-Bearbeitungsmaschinen. Mit unseren CO2-Lasern, made in the USA, lassen sich alle Gehäuse- und Designelemente bearbeiten bzw. auf den Hundertstelmillimeter genau herstellen.

DIAMEX has a whole range of ACRYLIC machine tools at their disposal. Our CO2 lasers can cut all elements of the case as well as all design elements. They are accurate to one-hundredth of a millimeter.

CRONIOS' Gehäuse ist ein unmittelbares Laserprodukt. Schicht um Schicht höchste Präzision.

CRONIOS ist mehr als ein Prototyp, CRONIOS ist fertig entwickelt. Wer einen CRONIOS haben will, der bekommt auch einen! Egal ob für Wohnzimmer, Küche oder Bad. Oder zum Verschenken - denn Weihnachten steht vor der Tür und CRONIOS wird noch vor Weihnachten geliefert - versprochen!!!!!

CRONIOS is more than a prototype. CRONIOS is a fully developed product. Who would like to have a CRONIOS will get one! Whether for your living room, kitchen, bathroom, or as a gift for your loved ones—especially regarding Christmas time is of the essence.

Warum INDIEGOGO ?    Why have we opted for INDIEGOGO?

Ganz einfach: Unser Chef denkt, CRONIOS braucht kein Mensch. Aber er wird überzeugt werden, wenn es Unterstützer gibt - wetten, er knickt ein? Zeigen wir es ihm!
Auch möchten wir noch ein paar nette Features in die Software einarbeiten, einen Kurzzeitwecker, eine Würfelfunktion auf Zufallsbasis, weitere Lichteffekte, die zu bestimmten Zeiten abgerufen werden können. So beispielsweise kann man einen Geburtstag einer lieben Person einprogrammieren und CRONIOS zeigt ein Lichterspiel, als Merker oder auch als kleine Überraschung. Wecker- oder Alarmfunktionen, mit einem Lichteffekt hinterlegt, zeigen oder erinnern an Termine.

Frankly, our boss is convinced that CRONIOS was superfluous. But he will be convinced when there are supporters—bet that he is going to give in?
We would also like to add a few nice features to the software: a timer, a function to play dice with a random generator and more light effects which can be selected for certain points of time like adding the birthdays of your loved ones so CRONIOS displays a particular effect then. This function can also act as a reminder or a surprise. In this case alarm functions can be connected with a light effect so they remind you of appointments.

CRONIOS' Firmware kann man an einem Computer aktualisieren. Kinderleicht!

CRONIOS's firmware can be updated using a computer.

Also ran an den Speck - denkt an Weihnachten - denkt an Euch selbst - CRONIOS ist ein tolles Teil und ein tolles Geschenk für Eure Lieben!!!

So think of Christmas, think of your own cozy atmosphere at home—CRONIOS is a great gift for your loved ones!


CRONIOS zeigt Euch die Zeit endlich in bunt - was bitte will man mehr? Wir wollen CRONIOS produzieren! Bitte unterstützt uns jetzt - DANKE !!!!!!!!!!!!!

At last CRONIOS is displaying time in color. Please support us NOW!
THANK YOU VERY MUCH !!!!!!!!!!!!!

Technik und Ausstattung      Technology and Equipment

CRONIOS gibt es in vier farblichen Kombinationen
CRONIOS is available in four color combinations

                 

  1. rot schwarz – red / black
  2. gelb schwarz – yellow / black
  3. schwarz grün – green / black
  4. blau blau – blue / blue

Gewicht / weight: 330g / 0.73 pounds
Durchmesser / diameter: 14,7cm / 5.8 inches
Höhe / width: 3,0cm / 1.18 inches

CRONIOS wird am besten an eine weiße, reflektierende Wand gehängt. Da macht CRONIOS die beste Figur. CRONIOS benötigt für seine LEDs und die Lichtshow natürlich Energie. Ein USB-Kabel wird mitgeliefert, jeder USB-Port eines Computers liefert die benötigte Leistung. Man kann es aber auch am Smartphone-Ladenetzteil mit USB-Anschluss betreiben. Neueste Trends haben USB-Ports in Steckdosen eingearbeitet, auch die kann man nutzen. Wird die Spannungsversorgung unterbrochen, muss man CRONIOS natürlich nicht neu stellen. Denn die integrierte Echtzeituhr ist auf eine externe Spannungsquelle nicht angewiesen. Auch das Farbschema, Specials und Features gehen nicht verloren. CRONIOS wird ganz einfach an einem Computer konfiguriert. Wir liefern ein PC-Programm mit, mit dem man nach Herzenslust einstellen kann - Farben, Effekte, Funktionen - natürlich auch die Uhrzeit :)
Mit der innovativen Mittelscheibe kann man CRONIOS auch unmittelbar konfigurieren. Drehen und drücken. Drücken und drehen - fertig!

CRONIOS looks best when put on a white reflecting wall. Naturally, CRONIOS needs energy for its LEDs and light show. A USB cable is included and every computer’s USB port can provide the necessary energy. But it can also be used with a cellphone’s power supply. As a new trend there are plug sockets with integrated USB ports which can also be used. If the power supply happens to be interrupted CRONIOS does not have to be set again. The included real time clock does not need an external power supply. The color profiles, specials and features are saved as well. CRONIOS can simply be configured using a computer. A program for PC is included. It allows you to adjust your clock according to your personal wishes—colors, effects, functions—you can also set the time, of course :)
By using the innovative rotary disk CRONIOS can also be configured directly. Turn it and push. Push and turn it—that’s it!

Chancen und Risiken    Chances and Risks:

CRONIOS gibt es als fertigen Prototypen. DIAMEX verfügt über ein gut gefülltes Materiallager an allen benötigten ACRYL-Materialien.
Auch Mikrocontroller sind derzeit sehr gut verfügbar, das gilt auch für die verbauten passiven Komponenten. Auch Montagemateriealien sind ausreichend verfügbar.
Die LED-Stripes "WS2812 144 Stück pro Meter" werden als Fertigkomponente eingekauft. Im letzten Jahr gab es hier Lieferschwierigkeiten. Der Lieferant wurde daraufhin gewechselt. Nun laufen diese Bestellungen reibungslos. Natürlich haben wir keinen Einfluss auf Lieferanten von LED-Komponenten. Jedoch haben wir mittlerweile auch hier ein gut gefülltes Zwischenlager. Im Rahmen des aufgerufenen Crowdfundings ist das Lager gesichert. Nachbestellungen, aus jetziger Sicht, sind kein Problem.
Sollten die Ziele erreicht oder gar überschritten werden, wird unsererseits der Forecast unmittelbar angehoben und ausgelöst, um alle Unterstützer auch zu beliefern. Aus jetziger Sicht ist eine termingerechte Auslieferung problemlos realisierbar.

CRONIOS is a completed prototype. DIAMEX has all needed acrylic materials in stock.

Currently microcontrollers as well as all included passive components and mounting materials are easily available on the market.
The LED stripes "WS2812 144 pieces per meter" are bought as a finished product. Last year we have experienced delayed deliveries with this component which is why the supplier has been changed. As a consequence, no more delays have occurred. Because we have no bearing on these LED suppliers we have accumulated sufficient stock of these components in the meantime. Stocks are likewise sufficient for the duration and purpose of this crowdfunding. Currently repeat orders are not a problem.
In case the objective is reached or even exceeded we would immediately increase the forecast to be able to satisfy all supporters. Currently, the delivery is ensured according to plan.




                                                    


                                 


Bitte um Unterstützung    Please support us:

Gefällt Dir CRONIOS, dann erzähle auch Deinen technikbegeisterten Freunden und Bekannten davon! Nicht jeder erfährt in dem kurzen Zeitraum von unserem Projekt. Vielen Dank auch an Dich.

Do you like CRONIOS? Then please tell your friends and acquaintances who are also technology aficionados! Otherwise very few people will find out about this project throughout the short duration of this fundraising. Thanks a lot!


Montage eines CRONIOS Prototypen 
Assembling a CRONIOS Prototype
story_txt:
CRONIOS
Die Uhr, die Spaß macht. Ein Hingucker, ein Lichtmagnet, ein täglicher Helfer, ein Dekoelement. Neueste Technik, neueste Technologien, entwickelt und gebaut in                                   Berlin, Deutschland. Made in Germany.

                                  
                                  



                                  
The clock
that is a lot of fun. An eye-catcher, a daily aid, a decorative piece. State-of-the-art
technology—developed and manufactured in                                     Berlin, Germany. Made in Germany.
CRONIOS basiert auf Pi - kreisrund und in sechzig Segmente unterteilt. Jedes Segment ist von einer Digital-RGB-LED besetzt. So ist es möglich, Sekunden, Minuten und Stunden farblich darzustellen.    CRONIOS is
based on pi—as round as a circle and divided in sixty segments. Every segment comes
with a digital RGB LED. Thus seconds, minutes, and hours can be depicted using
colors.

                                 


                                 

  

CRONIOS will gestalten. Jede CRONIOS will anders sein. Du kannst CRONIOS gestalten, Deine eigene CRONIOS ist das Ziel.CRONIOS is
designing. Every CRONIOS dreams of being different. You can design CRONIOS, your
own CRONIOS is the objective.
CRONIOS hängt an der Wand, liegt auf dem Schreibtisch oder wird von einem Spiegel oder einer anderen Fläche reflektiert. Mit CRONIOS darf man spielen. CRONIOS ist flexibel. CRONIOS spielt mit.CRONIOS may
hang on the wall, lie on the desk or may be reflected by a mirror or another
surface. You can play with CRONIOS. CRONIOS is flexible. CRONIOS will play
along.
CRONIOS ist ein Design-Experiment. Unser Chef ist meint, CRONIOS braucht kein Mensch. Aber wir, die Entwickler, Denker und Träumer in unserer Firma, sind überzeugt, CRONIOS ist mehr, CRONIOS muss bekannt gemacht werden. Der Chef sagt "dann finanziert die Sache und gut ist".CRONIOS is
a designing experiment. Our boss is convinced that no one needs CRONIOS. But we,
the developers, thinkers and dreamers at our company, think that CRONIOS is
more than that and that awareness of CRONIOS has to be spread. Our boss says
that we may go ahead if the project is properly financed.
OK! Das machen wir nun!  Okay, here
we go!
Die Herstellung von CRONIOS basiert auf mehreren Hoch-Technologien. CRONIOS' Herz ist ein moderner 32 bit Cortex Controller mit integrierter Echtzeituhr und integrierter USB-Schnittstelle. Die eingesetzte Stütz-Batterie hält etwa 10 Jahre und ist natürlich auswechselbar. CRONIOS kann an einen PC angeschlossen und umfangreich konfiguriert werden. Sommer- und Winterzeit ist für CRONIOS kein Problem, CRONIOS weiss Bescheid, das alles wird automatisch erledigt. Ein PC-basiertes Konfigurationsprogramm ist inklusive. Es ermöglicht Einstellungen zu allen Events in Farbe, Helligkeit und Dauer. Einfach CRONIOS an den PC anschließen, schon kann man nach Herzenslust einstellen. CRONIOS macht Spaß.
CRONIOS is
manufactured using several sophisticated technologies. CRONIOS's heart is a
modern 32 bit cortex controller with an integrated real time clock and an integrated
USB interface. The battery life is approximately 10 years and it can be replaced
if depleted. CRONIOS can also be connected to a PC so there are numerous ways
for personalization and configuration. Setting the clock to daylight saving
time (DST) is no problem for CRONIOS because it switches those automatically. A
PC-based configuration program is included as well. Several parameters like
color, brightness, and the duration of effects can be adjusted. Simply attach CRONIOS
to your PC and configure it according to your personal preferences. CRONIOS is
a lot of fun.
Eingesetzt werden sehr leuchtstarke, neueste DIGITAL-RGB-LEDs. Jede der 60 LEDs hat einen eigenen digitalen PWM-Controller integriert. Nur so gelingt es überhaupt, dass jede LED in Farbe und Helligkeit völlig unabhängig angesteuert werden kann. CRONIOS ist eben high-tech. Über die USB-Schnittstelle wird die Stromversorgung sichergestellt und auch das Farbprofil konfiguriert.CRONIOS
uses bright state-of-the-art digital RGB LEDs. Everyone of the 60 LEDs comes
with its own digital PWM controller. Hence, every single LED can have a
distinct color and brightness. Its power is provided via the USB interface. In
addition, it can also be used to configure the color profile.

   

CRONIOS kann man auch direkt bedienen: Eine aufgesetzte Drehscheibe erkennt, dass Du CRONIOS etwas mitteilen möchtest - entweder ein neues Farbprofil ausprobieren oder nur mal schnell den Kurzzeitwecker für die Kocheier stellen.
CRONIOS can
also be configured in a more direct fashion: a rotary disk recognizes that you
want to change CRONIOS’s appearance—you could try a new color profile or simply set
the timer when you cook an egg.
CRONIOS' Elektronik stellen wir selbst her, denn die Berliner Firma DIAMEX ist  etablierter Entwickler und Hersteller elektronischer Komponenten.CRONIOS's electronic
components are manufactured by our own company—because the company DIAMEX from
Berlin is an established developer and manufacturer of electronic components.
CRONIOS' Umhüllung oder Deko-Komponente übernimmt ein fantastischer Werkstoff - ACRYL.CRONIOS's case
is made of a marvelous material—ACRYLIC.ACRYL oder PLEXIGLAS gibt es in unglaublich vielen Varianten und Ausführungen. Allen gemeinsam ist das wunderschöne Ambiente durch knackige Farben - die hochwertige Anmutung einer ACRYL-Installation. CRONIOS ist aus ACRYL. CRONIOS ist stylisch. ACRYL ist schwer. Das beeindruckt wirklich - halte CRONIOS und Du wirst sofort wissen - CRONIOS ist werthaltig!ACRYLIC or PLEXIGLASS
is available in numerous variations. All of them are characterized by a
beautiful ambience because of their bright colors. CRONIOS if made from ACRYLIC.
CRONIOS is stylish. ACRYLIC is heavy. That is really impressive—hold CRONIOS in
your hands and you will realize immediately that CRONIOS is valuable.DIAMEX verfügt über eine ganze Phalanx von ACRYL-Bearbeitungsmaschinen. Mit unseren CO2-Lasern, made in the USA, lassen sich alle Gehäuse- und Designelemente bearbeiten bzw. auf den Hundertstelmillimeter genau herstellen. DIAMEX has
a whole range of ACRYLIC machine tools at their disposal. Our CO2 lasers can cut
all elements of the case as well as all design elements. They are accurate to
one-hundredth of a millimeter.CRONIOS' Gehäuse ist ein unmittelbares Laserprodukt. Schicht um Schicht höchste Präzision.
CRONIOS ist mehr als ein Prototyp, CRONIOS ist fertig entwickelt. Wer einen CRONIOS haben will, der bekommt auch einen! Egal ob für Wohnzimmer, Küche oder Bad. Oder zum Verschenken - denn Weihnachten steht vor der Tür und CRONIOS wird noch vor Weihnachten geliefert - versprochen!!!!!
CRONIOS is
more than a prototype. CRONIOS is a fully developed product. Who would like to
have a CRONIOS will get one! Whether for your living room, kitchen, bathroom, or
as a gift for your loved ones—especially regarding Christmas time is of the essence.
Warum INDIEGOGO ?    Why have we
opted for INDIEGOGO?Ganz einfach: Unser Chef denkt, CRONIOS braucht kein Mensch. Aber er wird überzeugt werden, wenn es Unterstützer gibt - wetten, er knickt ein? Zeigen wir es ihm!Auch möchten wir noch ein paar nette Features in die Software einarbeiten, einen Kurzzeitwecker, eine Würfelfunktion auf Zufallsbasis, weitere Lichteffekte, die zu bestimmten Zeiten abgerufen werden können. So beispielsweise kann man einen Geburtstag einer lieben Person einprogrammieren und CRONIOS zeigt ein Lichterspiel, als Merker oder auch als kleine Überraschung. Wecker- oder Alarmfunktionen, mit einem Lichteffekt hinterlegt, zeigen oder erinnern an Termine.Frankly,
our boss is convinced that CRONIOS was superfluous. But he will be convinced
when there are supporters—bet that he is going to give in?We would
also like to add a few nice features to the software: a timer, a function to
play dice with a random generator and more light effects which can be selected
for certain points of time like adding the birthdays of your loved ones so
CRONIOS displays a particular effect then. This function can also act as a
reminder or a surprise. In this case alarm functions can be connected with a
light effect so they remind you of appointments.
CRONIOS' Firmware kann man an einem Computer aktualisieren. Kinderleicht!CRONIOS's firmware
can be updated using a computer.Also ran an den Speck - denkt an Weihnachten - denkt an Euch selbst - CRONIOS ist ein tolles Teil und ein tolles Geschenk für Eure Lieben!!!

So think of
Christmas, think of your own cozy atmosphere at home—CRONIOS is a great gift for your
loved ones!

CRONIOS zeigt Euch die Zeit endlich in bunt - was bitte will man mehr? Wir wollen CRONIOS produzieren! Bitte unterstützt uns jetzt - DANKE !!!!!!!!!!!!!
At last CRONIOS
is displaying time in color. Please support us NOW!THANK YOU
VERY MUCH !!!!!!!!!!!!!
Technik und Ausstattung      Technology and
Equipment
CRONIOS gibt es in vier farblichen KombinationenCRONIOS is
available in four color combinations
                  

rot schwarz – red / black
gelb schwarz – yellow / black
schwarz grün – green / black 

blau blau – blue / blue

Gewicht / weight: 330g / 0.73 poundsDurchmesser / diameter: 14,7cm / 5.8 inchesHöhe / width: 3,0cm / 1.18 inches


CRONIOS wird am besten an eine weiße, reflektierende Wand gehängt. Da macht CRONIOS die beste Figur. CRONIOS benötigt für seine LEDs und die Lichtshow natürlich Energie. Ein USB-Kabel wird mitgeliefert, jeder USB-Port eines Computers liefert die benötigte Leistung. Man kann es aber auch am Smartphone-Ladenetzteil mit USB-Anschluss betreiben. Neueste Trends haben USB-Ports in Steckdosen eingearbeitet, auch die kann man nutzen. Wird die Spannungsversorgung unterbrochen, muss man CRONIOS natürlich nicht neu stellen. Denn die integrierte Echtzeituhr ist auf eine externe Spannungsquelle nicht angewiesen. Auch das Farbschema, Specials und Features gehen nicht verloren. CRONIOS wird ganz einfach an einem Computer konfiguriert. Wir liefern ein PC-Programm mit, mit dem man nach Herzenslust einstellen kann - Farben, Effekte, Funktionen - natürlich auch die Uhrzeit :)Mit der innovativen Mittelscheibe kann man CRONIOS auch unmittelbar konfigurieren. Drehen und drücken. Drücken und drehen - fertig!CRONIOS looks
best when put on a white reflecting wall. Naturally, CRONIOS needs energy for
its LEDs and light show. A USB cable is included and every computer’s USB port can
provide the necessary energy. But it can also be used with a cellphone’s power
supply. As a new trend there are plug sockets with integrated USB ports which
can also be used. If the power supply happens to be interrupted CRONIOS does
not have to be set again. The included real time clock does not need an
external power supply. The color profiles, specials and features are saved as
well. CRONIOS can simply be configured using a computer. A program for PC is
included. It allows you to adjust your clock according to your personal wishes—colors, effects,
functions—you can also set the time, of course :)By using
the innovative rotary disk CRONIOS can also be configured directly. Turn it and
push. Push and turn it—that’s it!
Chancen und Risiken    Chances and
Risks:CRONIOS gibt es als fertigen Prototypen. DIAMEX verfügt über ein gut gefülltes Materiallager an allen benötigten ACRYL-Materialien. Auch Mikrocontroller sind derzeit sehr gut verfügbar, das gilt auch für die verbauten passiven Komponenten. Auch Montagemateriealien sind ausreichend verfügbar.Die LED-Stripes "WS2812 144 Stück pro Meter" werden als Fertigkomponente eingekauft. Im letzten Jahr gab es hier Lieferschwierigkeiten. Der Lieferant wurde daraufhin gewechselt. Nun laufen diese Bestellungen reibungslos. Natürlich haben wir keinen Einfluss auf Lieferanten von LED-Komponenten. Jedoch haben wir mittlerweile auch hier ein gut gefülltes Zwischenlager. Im Rahmen des aufgerufenen Crowdfundings ist das Lager gesichert. Nachbestellungen, aus jetziger Sicht, sind kein Problem.Sollten die Ziele erreicht oder gar überschritten werden, wird unsererseits der Forecast unmittelbar angehoben und ausgelöst, um alle Unterstützer auch zu beliefern. Aus jetziger Sicht ist eine termingerechte Auslieferung problemlos realisierbar.CRONIOS is
a completed prototype. DIAMEX has all needed acrylic materials in stock.

Currently
microcontrollers as well as all included passive components and mounting
materials are easily available on the market.The LED stripes
"WS2812 144 pieces per meter" are bought as a finished product. Last
year we have experienced delayed deliveries with this component which is why
the supplier has been changed. As a consequence, no more delays have occurred. Because
we have no bearing on these LED suppliers we have accumulated sufficient stock of
these components in the meantime. Stocks are likewise sufficient for the
duration and purpose of this crowdfunding. Currently repeat orders are not a
problem.In case the
objective is reached or even exceeded we would immediately increase the forecast
to be able to satisfy all supporters. Currently, the delivery is ensured
according to plan.
                                                     
                                  
Bitte um Unterstützung    Please
support us:Gefällt Dir CRONIOS, dann erzähle auch Deinen technikbegeisterten Freunden und Bekannten davon! Nicht jeder erfährt in dem kurzen Zeitraum von unserem Projekt. Vielen Dank auch an Dich.Do you like
CRONIOS? Then please tell your friends and acquaintances who are also
technology aficionados! Otherwise very few people will find out about this
project throughout the short duration of this fundraising. Thanks a lot!Montage eines CRONIOS Prototypen  Assembling a CRONIOS Prototype

story:
Short Summary

  • We are students that are interested in psychology, brain function, and happiness. The last year we've been investing our time in this project and studies connected with it. We really hope you'll like our idea.
  • We want to share our knowledge about habits and happy life and we want to invest in developing this type of self-development.
  • By investing in this project you are not only going to help us improve the nowadays knowledge about this topic, but you'll also help a lot of people that need our guideline and that will find our work helpful.

 

What we need & What you get

 

Why budget of 3500$?

  • 2000$ are going to IT workers for creating a fully functional APP, so we can work with you through the APP without any problems.
  • 1000$ We are going to invest in social media and website – design, IT work, marketing
  • 500$ Will help us to create a new study about habits and about our techniques

 

Why should I invest?

You can simply join us and help us with creating our idea by investing some of your money. There are many special perks that are worth much more than what you invest. Our APP is going to help many people to live their life in a better way. We are also going to shout out some free advice, and we will try to help everyone who needs.

What if we won’t reach the goal?

If we won’t reach our goal, then we will spend all the invested money into the creation of the APP. We’ll stay in touch with you and do all the work that is a necessary to help you with your habits through emails or messages.

The Impact

 

Is this project valuable?

For us, as creators of this idea, it is a really valuable project. Our vision is to help people with controlling their lives and to develop these instruments that we use to help. We want to make more studies and share the valuable advice for free in the future, so also most of what we earn from the APP we are going to invest again into our vision. Our goal is to give access to our proved information and techniques for free to the most of all people.

The result?

Motivated people who know how to handle their habits and lead the way of their life.
 

Risks & Challenges

We have prepared the plan of strategy for this service.
We need an app developer and prepare the programs for customers.
Then we will need time to cooperate with every customer individually.
We prepared everything and now we need only the budget to accomplish our mission, which is to help people with their habits!

Other Ways You Can Help

Someone just can't contribute, there are other ways:

  • Please share our campaign, some of your friends may need help.
    • To do that, you can use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Follow us on Facebook and be part of our community
    • You will see people with their statements and you can help them by sharing their statement and thanks to that more people will know about them and they will stay motivated!

Thank you very much for your time.

story:
Most Powerful, Convertible portable PRIVATE screen

Features Overview

 

 

The world’s first portable second screen with private watching mode increases both privacy and productivity. PRIVLI can be carried in public places and used as a screen without anyone else able to see its displayed content. A special set of polarized glasses allow owners to surf and work in complete privacy.

In private, you can use our permanent viewing glass to avoid using eye glasses  

Full HD and 4K display and built in speakers for the ultimate viewing experience

A second, multi-functional screen , which converts your laptop & desktop into touch screen, instantly

Multi-touch private monitor to ensure the utmost productivity and privacy to the users.

It is compatible with Nintendo, PS4 and Xbox One and can act as an additional monitor for any system. It means that users can enjoy fun and private gaming experience with this screen. It can go with Intel, Linux, Android, Mac and Windows OS.

Comes in a premium artificial leather case for use as a laptop or tablet. An adjustable back stand allows easy fixture and comfortable viewing angles.

Built-in Keyboard and Touch pad can convert any smartphone into a 4K Laptop to ensure hassle-free working.

More space to carry all the accessories you need

On the technical front, Privli features two sizes (15.6" & 13.3"), Wi-Fi and BLE enabled, weighs only 1.29 lbs with a sleek 9.7mm thickness. The private screen is compatible with Windows, Mac, Android, Linux, and Intel stick.

It has all the ports that users expect to have in a monitor. The ports are USB-C, USB 3.0, HDMI and 3.5 mm jack.

 

With 4K Ultra HD Display and 1080p FHD, this monitor has been designed with an aluminum body. The screen size is 15.6” and 13.3” and it has Wi-Fi and Bluetooth capabilities. With just a weight of 1.29 lbs and 9.7mm thickness, the screen has a 5000 mAh battery. Comes with four vibrant colors.

 

 

Share With Friends And Family!
