story:
More successful meetings mean more closed deals.

The Sales Journal is designed to help you close more deals by conducting more effective meetings with your prospects and customers. 

When I started my sales career I noticed a direct correlation between the effectiveness of my meetings, and the number of deals I closed. Twenty years later, many reps I train face the same challenges that I faced years ago. 

We work so hard to set qualified meetings that even a small increase in effectiveness can have a huge impact on the number of deals we close.

In my search to find a way to hold more effective meetings, I found all kinds of answers. CRM solutions and apps are great providing structure for your deals. The downside to these apps is you can't always have them open during a meeting and having your laptop can be distracting.

As I researched how to make meetings more effective, one thing that struck me was the power of writing things down. This is why every sales rep loves their notebook or journal, why we've seen the rise in trends like bullet journaling, and why I created the Sales Journal.

The Sales Journal combines my 20 years experience selling and training with the power of putting pen to paper. It will help you prepare for your meetings, execute and follow up more effectively.

Setting qualified meetings is one of the most challenging jobs in sales. The better we can prepare, execute, and follow up from our meetings, the more we will advance and drive to close. Here's how the Sales Journal will help you have more effective meetings.

  • Prepare - Write down your goals for each meeting.
  • Execute - Stay on track with a reminder of who is at the meeting, and any recent company or industry news.
  • Follow up - Agree on mutual next steps to keep accountability with your prospects.

Here is how the meeting pages of the Sales Journal are structured to help you conduct more effective meetings.

  • Contact names and roles - Who is attending and what is their role with the company? Are they an executive? Do they work in procurement or legal? Will they be an end user? The people attending will change the topics, flow, and details you cover.
  • Business description - What does their business do? Who are some of their flagship customers? Do they have any main competitors or industry leaders you should mention or avoid?
  • S.M.A.R.T. Meeting Goals - Set specific, measurable, attainable, realistic, and timely goals. What do you want to get from this meeting? This could be a demo, access to power, a timeline.
  • Recent news and events - Was there a major conference? What is on their blog? Have they made any large hires or been in the news? 
  • Specific Questions - Too many reps ask basic and closed ended question or leave forgetting to ask something important. Make sure you don't leave any important information on the table by remembering what you need to ask.
  • Their next steps - What do they need to do to drive the deal forward after the meeting? Maybe it's an introduction or hopefully a signed contract. Commit to the next steps during your meeting and keep your prospects accountable.
  • Your next steps - What do you need to do to be accountable to your prospects? What are your deliverables? 
  • Notes - Write down anything else that is relevant to the discussion for follow up or your next steps.

Research shows that writing things down helps commit them to memory. That's why every sales rep loves their notebook, and special goal setting journals have become so popular. But until now, none were created specifically for sales.

Every week in sales is different. Some weeks we might have 20 meetings, others we have none. One common criticism of many journals is that they confine you to a standard schedule and five day week. I want you to have the flexibility you need to be successful. The Sales Journal is designed to give you process and focus to close more deals.

  • 12 Guiding Principles for Success - These have helped me through my career and are always well received.
  • Goals page - Set S.M.A.R.T. goals you want to accomplish in the next month, quarter, and year.
  • 100 Meeting pages - Prepare, execute, and follow up more effectively.

To source the best manufacturer, I contacted dozens, and received samples from several of them ultimately choosing the best quality journal. This manufacturer also happens to make a well known brand of notebook. 

These are some reasons why I know you'll love the Sales Journal

  • Premium quality paper - 80gsm paper is a higher grade than most premium journals.
  • Fewer smudges - If you're left handed you're going appreciate this.
  • Pages lie flat - This was a must have. I can't stand journals that keep closing or flipping pages. When you lay the Sales Journal down, the pages lie flat.
  • Use any pen - Ivory white paper means any ink color pops. When some interviewer asks you to sell them their pen you can tell them it comes with the Sales Journal.

I don't consider myself a sales trainer; I'm a sales guy who happens to train what works. One reason I fell in love with the Basho techniques is because they're so practical. This journal incorporates the same fundamentals I teach the employees of some of the fastest growing companies like Salesforce, LinkedIn and Box, with the quality of your favorite journal or notebook.

When I started my sales career I noticed a direct correlation between the effectiveness of my meetings, and the number of deals I closed. Twenty years later, many reps I train face the same challenges that I faced years ago. 
We work so hard to set qualified meetings that even a small increase in effectiveness can have a huge impact on the number of deals we close.
In my search to find a way to hold more effective meetings, I found all kinds of answers. CRM solutions and apps are great providing structure for your deals. The downside to these apps is you can't always have them open during a meeting and having your laptop can be distracting.
As I researched how to make meetings more effective, one thing that struck me was the power of writing things down. This is why every sales rep loves their notebook or journal, why we've seen the rise in trends like bullet journaling, and why I created the Sales Journal.
The Sales Journal combines my 20 years experience selling and training with the power of putting pen to paper. It will help you prepare for your meetings, execute and follow up more effectively.


Setting qualified meetings is one of the most challenging jobs in sales. The better we can prepare, execute, and follow up from our meetings, the more we will advance and drive to close. Here's how the Sales Journal will help you have more effective meetings.


Prepare - Write down your goals for each meeting.

Execute - Stay on track with a reminder of who is at the meeting, and any recent company or industry news.

Follow up - Agree on mutual next steps to keep accountability with your prospects.


Here is how the meeting pages of the Sales Journal are structured to help you conduct more effective meetings.



Contact names and roles - Who is attending and what is their role with the company? Are they an executive? Do they work in procurement or legal? Will they be an end user? The people attending will change the topics, flow, and details you cover.

Business description - What does their business do? Who are some of their flagship customers? Do they have any main competitors or industry leaders you should mention or avoid?

S.M.A.R.T. Meeting Goals - Set specific, measurable, attainable, realistic, and timely goals. What do you want to get from this meeting? This could be a demo, access to power, a timeline.

Recent news and events - Was there a major conference? What is on their blog? Have they made any large hires or been in the news? 

Specific Questions - Too many reps ask basic and closed ended question or leave forgetting to ask something important. Make sure you don't leave any important information on the table by remembering what you need to ask.

Their next steps - What do they need to do to drive the deal forward after the meeting? Maybe it's an introduction or hopefully a signed contract. Commit to the next steps during your meeting and keep your prospects accountable.

Your next steps - What do you need to do to be accountable to your prospects? What are your deliverables? 

Notes - Write down anything else that is relevant to the discussion for follow up or your next steps.


Research shows that writing things down helps commit them to memory. That's why every sales rep loves their notebook, and special goal setting journals have become so popular. But until now, none were created specifically for sales.

Every week in sales is different. Some weeks we might have 20 meetings, others we have none. One common criticism of many journals is that they confine you to a standard schedule and five day week. I want you to have the flexibility you need to be successful. The Sales Journal is designed to give you process and focus to close more deals.



12 Guiding Principles for Success - These have helped me through my career and are always well received.

Goals page - Set S.M.A.R.T. goals you want to accomplish in the next month, quarter, and year.

100 Meeting pages - Prepare, execute, and follow up more effectively.


To source the best manufacturer, I contacted dozens, and received samples from several of them ultimately choosing the best quality journal. This manufacturer also happens to make a well known brand of notebook. 
These are some reasons why I know you'll love the Sales Journal


Premium quality paper - 80gsm paper is a higher grade than most premium journals.

Fewer smudges - If you're left handed you're going appreciate this.

Pages lie flat - This was a must have. I can't stand journals that keep closing or flipping pages. When you lay the Sales Journal down, the pages lie flat.

Use any pen - Ivory white paper means any ink color pops. When some interviewer asks you to sell them their pen you can tell them it comes with the Sales Journal.



I don't consider myself a sales trainer; I'm a sales guy who happens to train what works. One reason I fell in love with the Basho techniques is because they're so practical. This journal incorporates the same fundamentals I teach the employees of some of the fastest growing companies like Salesforce, LinkedIn and Box, with the quality of your favorite journal or notebook.

story:
In the media

You'll see us in The Register, ZDNet, SC Magazine, and IT News

Updates

We've added auto-updates to the software specs

Check our our blog for more technical details and use cases.


ORP1 - an Open Router Project

ORP1 is a high performance networking router that allows you to run a firewall, IPSec VPN (virtual private network) and a Tor server for your home network. Its easy-to-use web interface will make encrypted and anonymised communications for your entire network easier to set up and manage. Now you don’t need to be a geek to be able to ensure that every device you use at home uses the internet with privacy, whether it’s your home PC, smartphone or tablet.

Why is the ORP1 device important? Unlike routers from other security vendors who have been caught helping government surveillance of their customers, the ORP1 hardware and software is open source to provide a system that you can trust - there’s no government-mandated back door for snooping.

ORP1 is a powerful networking platform which is a big step forward from other home networking routers, because its hardware and software is being purpose-built on open source hardware and software for high performance, privacy, and ease of use.

Who should use an ORP1? If you’re an infosec geek, a journalist or activist who needs to ensure privacy of your communications, or just someone who wants no-fuss networking in your home which keeps your internet usage private, ORP1 is for you.


Why an Open Router Project?

With growth in Internet speeds and the ongoing revelations that everyday people are having their personal information captured, we felt the need for a powerful platform that can be used to encrypt communications and protect our privacy and anonymity. An affordable and trustworthy system didn't seem to be on the market , thus ORP1 - the Open Router Project - was born. We need your help to make this a reality.

Security products are nothing without trust and we feel it is necessary to have a product on the market that is truly open. As such, not only is the ORP1 software to be released with an open source license, we will also be releasing the hardware design.

Why we're crowdfunding the ORP1

We have funded the project research & development all the way up to prototype phase. Now we need your help to fund the final development of the prototype and manufacture the final product. Bootstrapping has worked up until now, but it’s meant the development of the ORP1 has been slow. We want to speed up the development so we can get the ORP1 out into the world as soon as possible. Especially since there’s a growing distrust of current security vendors - we want a secure and private alternative on the market ASAP.

Our Indiegogo budget will pay for:
  • user interface development
  • finalising the software
  • system and compliance testing
  • industrial design
  • the first manufacturing run.

The perks of being an early adopter

If you want to be among the first to get your hands on the ORP1, we recommend you buy a Privacy Freak (only 10 available, sorry!) or Early Adopter perk. We expect to ship the ORP1 prototype to Privacy Freaks and Early Adopters in April 2014. Assuming we reach our fundraising goal, we expect to ship the ORP1 to all supporters in May 2014.

If you can't afford an ORP1, but would like to support the project, you can buy a Freedom Lover perk for $25. You will receive a warm glow from having supported an open source project, as well as a discount code to be able to buy an ORP1 at the Indiegogo price of $400 if ordered by 31 July, 2014.

Obviously the faster we reach our fundraising goal, the quicker we can move to the next phase of development, so if you want ORP1 to happen, please pledge today, and share this page with your friends too.

The Specs - Hardware

With the increase in internet speeds across the world we’ve found it difficult to find affordable devices that can be used to encrypt data on high speed connections. Consumer devices tend to be underpowered while enterprise products are priced out of the reach of most people.  We’ve designed the ORP1 to ensure it is capable of coping with high speed connections while remaining affordable.

The ORP1 is powered by a Freescale QorIQ P1010 processor.  The P1010 includes a 32-Bit PowerPC core along with a hardware encryption engine, secure boot functionality, DDR3 interface, three Gigabit Ethernet (GE) ports, and two USB ports. A Gigabit Ethernet switch with 5 external GE ports is connected to one of the P1010’s GE ports.

Backers will receive a unit fitted with an 800MHz P1010 and 512MB of DDR3 SDRAM.  Backers will also receive a copy of the schematics and PCB layout.

Our performance tests have shown that the system gets line speed routing and firewall performance with almost no impact on the CPU.  IPSec testing has shown full-duplex IPSec performance at 700Mbps, and we are expecting this to be line speed with 15-20% CPU usage by manufacture.

Specifications

  • Freescale QorIQ P1010 @ 800MHz, with hardware encryption engine, and secure boot
  • WAN Port (Gigabit Ethernet)
  • DMZ/WAN Port (Gigabit Ethernet)
  • 5 Port Switch (Gigabit Ethernet)
  • VLAN Support
  • 512MB DDR3 SDRAM
  • 1GB NAND FLASH
  • 2 USB 2.0 Host Ports

The Specs - Software

The ORP1 has a custom Linux distribution built using Yocto and is configured via a web interface. The basic system will include:
  • Setup wizard
  • Basic network setup
  • DHCP server
  • DNS server (DNSMasq)
  • Firewall
  • NAT/Port Forwarding
  • IPSec
  • Tor (basic on/off)
  • IPv6
  • SIP Proxy
  • Firmware updating
  • Ability to enable automatic firmware updates: keep your system patched!
  • Status dashboard
  • Backup/Restore of configuration

Stretch goals

(Geeks, you’ll want to read this)

When we break our target we have quite a list of stretch goals we'd like to achieve. We'd like your input in ranking these, so backers will get the opportunity to let us know what they think before we finalise the order.  Here's a few of the stretch goals we're aiming for:

  • Tor Advanced (allow routing of certain services through your IP, limit internal IPs that use Tor, etc.)
  • OpenVPN
  • Intrusion Detection/Prevention
  • Certificate Management for IPSec (plus on-board CA for certificate creation)
  • QoS/traffic shaping
  • User Management
  • L2TP
  • SSL VPN
  • SSH Key Management
  • Diagnostics
  • Remote syslog
  • VLAN
  • MAC Filtering
  • USB Storage
  • USB Wifi
  • SNMP
  • RADIUS
  • Packet capture and display for diagnostics
  • Implement secure boot features
All software will be released under an open source license.



About Us

The ORP1 is being developed by an experienced team of four software and hardware developers from Redfish Group Pty Ltd in Brisbane, Australia.

Our lead designer, Justin Clacherty, is the Founder and Managing Director of Redfish. Justin has degrees in Engineering (Electronics) and in Information Technology (Computer Science). He has over 16 years experience as a professional engineer developing hardware and software systems for the electricity industry, mining, rail, entertainment, and telecommunications.

 
You can read more about our team on the ORP1 site.

story:
Short Summary

Convert your website visitors
into happy customers

Every website visitor is a potential customer. Call them before they leave your website.

Get an extra 30-125% of leads onto the phone

Close more deals and convert more website visitors, even after working hours

Get data and website behaviour insights from analyzing your calls

Let your customers access you by phone from anywhere in the world

1. CONVENIENT WAY TO COMMUNICATE

Contact by phone is one of the basic forms of contact for customers. By installing the CallPage widget on your company website, you will allow your customers to have direct contact with you. All they have to do is leave a number in the form and they will receive a return call from a company consultant almost instantly, even in just 28 seconds!

2. SAVE TIME

With the CallPage service, neither clients nor your employees need to waste time writing tedious emails or chatting. Customers can quickly and easily contact you without cost for the call.

3. QUICK RESPONSE

Customers do not like to wait, especially when they have a problem. Contact by phone enables a rapid solution for any difficulties. Thanks to the very good visibility of the CallPage widget on every website, customers can quickly report a failure. By responding without unnecessary waiting, you will be regarded favorably by the customer.

4. LOWER CUSTOMER SERVICE COSTS

A simple process and solving problems quickly lead to less working time, which leads to fewer customer service personnel needed and less cost for the company.

5. BUILDING A RELATIONSHIP

CallPage is the best way to start a conversation with anyone who views your page. A pop-up widget is a nice surprise for your site visitors. It evokes positive emotions and can influence the customer’s purchasing decision as well as the level of client satisfaction.

6. ATTRACTING POTENTIAL CUSTOMERS

The CallPage widget allows you to automatically detect any potential customers who are visiting your company website. By offering them a phone call, you will gain their contact details. Even if they do not buy your services, you can establish a relationship with them and come back with an offer at the right time.

7. BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF CUSTOMER NEEDS

Direct contact with clients will allow you to better understand their needs. Through active inquiry, you can learn more from customers about your company, services, or products. CallPage can help you better match the offer to customers and build loyalty.

8. INCREASE SALES

Not all visitors to your website will buy. If potential customers order through the widget, they will be automatically connected with the appropriate department consultant. The CallPage widget helps convert website visitors into buyers. Moreover, the widget increases conversion on the page, which translates into increased ROI and sales.

9. REDUCING THE AMOUNT OF REFUNDS

Contact by CallPage allows customers to have an immediate response. Clients already at this stage of the order would then be more ready to complete the purchase.

10. ANALYTICAL CAPABILITIES

Thanks to the information available in the CallPage account, you can find out which subpage the client was on while ordering a call. Such data, as well as other statistics and call recordings, are particulary useful for the sales department.

11. ADJUSTING FOR MOBILE DEVICES

If your website is not responsive, you do not need to waste money to change it. The CallPage widget is always visible on every mobile device. By installing it on your website, customers will have the option of easy and fast telephone contact.

Every business needs the right tools to improve. Both the small business freelancer and the large store can take advantage of the solutions offered by CallPage. Companies using CallPage already recognize the advantages of our tool. Now it’s time for your business to do the same! Explore the possibilities!

story:
Introduction

Automatic Height Adjustment with the drop of your phone

 

Adjustabot - The smartest standing desk that adjusts itself to your desired position simply by placing your smartphone on the charging powerhub. Make your working environment more organized and comfortable, and also get the health benefits from standing & exercise between sitting. The Adjustabot is the beginning of your work - life balance.

 

Our Journey

Since I’ve been working at home a lot more recently, I wanted to add a better desk to make my working environment more pleasant, productive, and comfortable. After researching all about sit and stand desks, and discovering that all the motorized ones were really expensive, I eventually settled for the manual one from Ikea. You know, the one that you had to manually crank to adjust the height. It was the only desk that fit my budget.

 

But it wasn’t long before I got tired of using the crank. Manually adjusting the height every time I switched working positions was just too tiring. So I actually found myself sitting all the time.

 

It was a lightbulb moment for me when I realized I can add a motor to do the work. I used a drill to experiment with different torque and speed to find the ideal motor. Then I created a case with my 3D printer. And was able to turn that troublesome desk into a proper motorized sit and stand desk. 

 

 

I showed my invention to my friends, who surprisingly weren’t that impressed. They thought it needed additional functions to truly make it great.

 

And with their help, we added a power hub with USB-A and USB-C charging ports with both PD and QC compatibility. It also has a 15 Watt high speed wireless charger. We created a mobile app for more precise control and the ability to save height profiles.

The APP also has health alarms, reminding you to stand up every 15 minutes or to take a water break. And my favorite feature of all is the automatic height adjustment. All you have to do is put your phone on the desk, and it will automatically adjust to your height.

After adding all these functions, my friends were finally satisfied. We’ve already consulted with sourcing agents and manufacturers. And now all we need is your support. Please back us today and bring Adjustabot to life. Thank you!

 

The Importance of Standing

 

Sit and stand desks have been getting more popular for the past few years. And there’s a good reason. Sitting too much, especially while working at a desk job tends to lead to a sedentary lifestyle, which promotes poor health and results in many chronic diseases like obesity, heart attacks, etc...  It’s reported that standing promotes many health benefits that can help mitigate the harms of sitting too much. Some benefits include helping to control blood sugar and blood fat levels, which can lower cholesterol, reduce back pain from poor sitting posture, helping to improve mood and energy levels, and boosting productivity. Research shows that maintaining a sit to stand ratio of 2:1 is optimal for comfort and energy levels, while maintaining good productivity. (https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24157240/)

 

Super Convenient Controls

 

Automatic Height Adjustment

We know working from home sometimes means your desk will be shared with other family members, and it will be annoying to adjust it every time through their smartphones. By placing your own smartphone on the power delivery hub, Adjustabot will automatically detect your height profile you preset on your phone and adjust it accordingly.
 

Mobile App Control

Unlike conventional standing desks, Adjustabot is app-controlled, so you can set your own sitting, standing, moving, exercise modes… to as many as you require. The app allows you to set up the perfect modes for your height, so you don’t have to waste minutes setting the height every time you adjust it.

 

One Touch Lever Control

Even though we live in the smartphone age, not everything needs to be connected. And there are definitely times we won’t have our phones with us. The simple one touch control lets you easily control and adjust the height as you please without additional hardware.
 

Power Delivery Charging Hub

Your working desk requires a lot of energy - from your smartphone, to your laptop. Normally it requires an extension to provide all the outlets for your gadgets. The power hub in Adjustabot provides different charging outlets for all your needs.

High Speed Wireless Charging

Qi-certified high-speed wireless charging to charge your smartphone at 15W. Just place your phone and the charging and never have to forget plugging in your phone to charge again.
 

100W Power Delivery

USB-A and USB-C charging ports with both PD and QC compatibility. Charging your laptops at full speed and any USB gadget you have.

 

Cable Management

The unsung heroes of any great desk setup are the cable management peripherals. Adjustabot includes two stylish desk grommets and a sleek cable management tray for you to organize all your cables and wires.

 

Health Reminders

Stand up and move reminder

Health experts have long been advising people to stand no less than 15 minutes per hour of sitting in front of your computer (https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/abs/10.1177/15...), but it’s simply annoying to set multiple alarms to remind ourselves to do it. The Adjustabot has built-in reminders in the app to notify you when it’s time to stand up and move your body, while also keeping track of your standing time per day. You can preset the time intervals between sitting and standing, the app remembers.

 

Take a water break

Every so often you forget to drink water when you’re focusing on work? The app is connected to your health reminder, not only does it remind you to stand, but also remind you when you need to have a dose of liquid.

 

Comparison

 

Specifications

 

Warranty

Control module (6 years warranty)

You can get the control module repaired/ exchanged 6 years after the module is delivered. It covers any defects in materials or workmanship under normal use during the warranty period.

Desk (10 years warranty)

The Desk (without the control module) are covered by a 10-year warranty, including defects in parts or workmanship under normal use. Any tear and wear will not be covered.

How to Assemble

 

Our Team

Like many of you, Parth was forced to work from home due to the global pandemic. With extra time on his hands, he combined his knowledge of engineering and creative spirit towards smart home design and came up with the idea of the Adjustabot. Many people within his inner circle weren’t impressed with the initial prototype. So they added new and improved functions. It quickly became a team of passionate people including:

Parth Panthal: Inventor and Project Lead

Jan Nowalski: Engineering

Nadia Kravets: Marketing, PR, Editing

 

Special thanks to all our other friends who made this project possible by giving great feedback and especially to Antawan Brown for helping with the software development and introducing us to crowdfunding as a way to fund our project.

We also confirmed our manufacturing and logistics partners, so production can begin immediately after the campaign. We hope this can expedite the delivery of all the rewards. 

Manufacturing Partner: Luo's Furniture Production

Logistics Partner: Empire Express

 

Timeline
story_txt:
Introduction Automatic Height Adjustment with the drop of your phone Adjustabot - The smartest standing desk that adjusts itself to your desired position simply by placing your smartphone on the charging powerhub. Make your working environment more organized and comfortable, and also get the health benefits from standing & exercise between sitting. The Adjustabot is the beginning of your work - life balance. Our JourneySince I’ve been working at home a lot more recently, I wanted to add a better desk to make my working environment more pleasant, productive, and comfortable. After researching all about sit and stand desks, and discovering that all the motorized ones were really expensive, I eventually settled for the manual one from Ikea. You know, the one that you had to manually crank to adjust the height. It was the only desk that fit my budget. But it wasn’t long before I got tired of using the crank. Manually adjusting the height every time I switched working positions was just too tiring. So I actually found myself sitting all the time. It was a lightbulb moment for me when I realized I can add a motor to do the work. I used a drill to experiment with different torque and speed to find the ideal motor. Then I created a case with my 3D printer. And was able to turn that troublesome desk into a proper motorized sit and stand desk.   I showed my invention to my friends, who surprisingly weren’t that impressed. They thought it needed additional functions to truly make it great. And with their help, we added a power hub with USB-A and USB-C charging ports with both PD and QC compatibility. It also has a 15 Watt high speed wireless charger. We created a mobile app for more precise control and the ability to save height profiles.The APP also has health alarms, reminding you to stand up every 15 minutes or to take a water break. And my favorite feature of all is the automatic height adjustment. All you have to do is put your phone on the desk, and it will automatically adjust to your height.After adding all these functions, my friends were finally satisfied. We’ve already consulted with sourcing agents and manufacturers. And now all we need is your support. Please back us today and bring Adjustabot to life. Thank you! The Importance of Standing Sit and stand desks have been getting more popular for the past few years. And there’s a good reason. Sitting too much, especially while working at a desk job tends to lead to a sedentary lifestyle, which promotes poor health and results in many chronic diseases like obesity, heart attacks, etc...  It’s reported that standing promotes many health benefits that can help mitigate the harms of sitting too much. Some benefits include helping to control blood sugar and blood fat levels, which can lower cholesterol, reduce back pain from poor sitting posture, helping to improve mood and energy levels, and boosting productivity. Research shows that maintaining a sit to stand ratio of 2:1 is optimal for comfort and energy levels, while maintaining good productivity. (https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24157240/) Super Convenient Controls Automatic Height AdjustmentWe know working from home sometimes means your desk will be shared with other family members, and it will be annoying to adjust it every time through their smartphones. By placing your own smartphone on the power delivery hub, Adjustabot will automatically detect your height profile you preset on your phone and adjust it accordingly. Mobile App ControlUnlike conventional standing desks, Adjustabot is app-controlled, so you can set your own sitting, standing, moving, exercise modes… to as many as you require. The app allows you to set up the perfect modes for your height, so you don’t have to waste minutes setting the height every time you adjust it. One Touch Lever ControlEven though we live in the smartphone age, not everything needs to be connected. And there are definitely times we won’t have our phones with us. The simple one touch control lets you easily control and adjust the height as you please without additional hardware. Power Delivery Charging HubYour working desk requires a lot of energy - from your smartphone, to your laptop. Normally it requires an extension to provide all the outlets for your gadgets. The power hub in Adjustabot provides different charging outlets for all your needs.High Speed Wireless ChargingQi-certified high-speed wireless charging to charge your smartphone at 15W. Just place your phone and the charging and never have to forget plugging in your phone to charge again. 100W Power DeliveryUSB-A and USB-C charging ports with both PD and QC compatibility. Charging your laptops at full speed and any USB gadget you have. Cable ManagementThe unsung heroes of any great desk setup are the cable management peripherals. Adjustabot includes two stylish desk grommets and a sleek cable management tray for you to organize all your cables and wires. Health RemindersStand up and move reminderHealth experts have long been advising people to stand no less than 15 minutes per hour of sitting in front of your computer (https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/abs/10.1177/15...), but it’s simply annoying to set multiple alarms to remind ourselves to do it. The Adjustabot has built-in reminders in the app to notify you when it’s time to stand up and move your body, while also keeping track of your standing time per day. You can preset the time intervals between sitting and standing, the app remembers. Take a water breakEvery so often you forget to drink water when you’re focusing on work? The app is connected to your health reminder, not only does it remind you to stand, but also remind you when you need to have a dose of liquid. Comparison Specifications WarrantyControl module (6 years warranty)You can get the control module repaired/ exchanged 6 years after the module is delivered. It covers any defects in materials or workmanship under normal use during the warranty period.Desk (10 years warranty)The Desk (without the control module) are covered by a 10-year warranty, including defects in parts or workmanship under normal use. Any tear and wear will not be covered.How to Assemble

 
Our TeamLike many of you, Parth was forced to work from home due to the global pandemic. With extra time on his hands, he combined his knowledge of engineering and creative spirit towards smart home design and came up with the idea of the Adjustabot. Many people within his inner circle weren’t impressed with the initial prototype. So they added new and improved functions. It quickly became a team of passionate people including:Parth Panthal: Inventor and Project LeadJan Nowalski: EngineeringNadia Kravets: Marketing, PR, Editing Special thanks to all our other friends who made this project possible by giving great feedback and especially to Antawan Brown for helping with the software development and introducing us to crowdfunding as a way to fund our project.We also confirmed our manufacturing and logistics partners, so production can begin immediately after the campaign. We hope this can expedite the delivery of all the rewards. Manufacturing Partner: Luo's Furniture ProductionLogistics Partner: Empire Express Timeline

story:
Short Summary

After 11 eye surgeries during my childhood I lost sight. I always believed there is a way to restore my sight. After 15 years of searching and trying many things I found how to help myself and others. The newest science from universities such as Harvard or Stanford  proves that you can heal yourself with the power of your belief, immune and nervous system! To save you days of studying scientific research and books how to heal yourself, we put the complex science into simple app. Diagnose the stress which cause over 80% of all modern diseases and start healing yourself and others with your smart phone. It will be your first healing kit.

We founded the mobile development company Logamic LTD which created tenths of apps. We have been always passionate of healthy life style such as exercising, healthy bio food, etc. But we felt there is something missing. We found it and want to share it with others by Heal Yourself app at a glance.

You, as the contributor become a member of a group without stress and medication. Become a role model for others to prove that living healthy and happy life is possible.


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise at least $15,000 to publish the minimum valuable product in form of personal mobile optimised web. To complete the  Android and iPhone app with all languages mutation and spreading the word around the world we would need about $100,000.


Overview of funding and goals

1.  If we raise at least $15,000 we will create the mobile optimised web with personal accounts and features:

1.1. Text and audio Hand book which explains the science behind easily at a glance. It saves you over 100 hours of reading and studying materials!

1.2. Beliefs finder: Helps you discover your subconscious beliefs which cause you stress.

1.3. Stress source finder: Helps you find the source of your subconscious internal stress which obstruct you to get healthy

1.4. Guide through self-healing exercises: To get rid of stress and restart your immune system.

1.5. Time of delivery 3 months

2. If we hit the goal of $35,000 we will create  a native personal iPhone and iPad app from the mobile web with added features

2.1. Instead of text and audio book we create interactive hand book for you which explains the outstanding science behind in easily understandable way.

2.2. Stress check measures your stress level using your heart rate variability. Just place your finger tip at your iPhone camera and wait few seconds.

2.3. Personal tracking of your progress.

2.4. More stress relieve exercises.

2.5. Time of delivery 5 months.

3. If we raise $60,000 we will create a Native personal Android app for all phones and tablets even the android devices are so fragmented. The Android version includes all of the iPhone app features:

3.1. Time of delivery 6 months

4. If we raise $100,000 we will add to the web, android and iPhone apps:

4.1. Translation into languages: Spanish, German, French, Italian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean.

4.2. Creating network of referrals ambassadors in as many as possible countries. If someone needs help on the healing journey there will be someone to talk to him/her in native language.

4.3. Physical goods, but that will be a surprise.

4.4. Time of delivery 7  months


The Impact

So many people have misguided perception and beliefs of  their life and the world. That all cause stress. Science proves that The stress cause over 80% of all modern diseases and illnesses. The stress is the source which we need to heal. Otherwise we just heal the symptoms in form of cancer, high blood pressure, diabetes and so on. Spontaneous remission project collects over 3.500 real cases of restoring health from HIV, diabetes, stage 4 cancer and other incurable diagnoses. Your immune system knows how to deal with cancer, viruses and bacteria. It does it every day  if the body isn’t suppressed by stress.

Our simple Heal Yourself app makes you understand how the biology works. Helps you discover where your stress is deep-rooted. You can start healing yourself quickly in comfortable way.

The world is over chemised. Too many medical drugs is prescribed to patients. But many times they can heal themselves.


Risks & Challenges

The only risk is that some people will need a personal approach to face and overcome all obstacles on their healing journey. They will understand the science behind and how it all works, but although we tested the prototype the practice may not be so easy for everyone.

The app is just tool to help you, but the miraculous outcomes are up to you. Just installing the app in your smart phone doesn’t make you healthy. The app will guide you on your healing journey, but the actual steps are up to you.

When we ran the prototype tests some people successfully found their cause of stress. But after that the action and exercises have to be done to see the results. Unfortunately their laziness was stronger than their will to be healthy.

The stress check algorithm has over 90% accuracy. Depends on the quality of your smart phone camera. Especially, the cheaper Android devices may have problem with the accuracy.

Otherwise we are not aware of any other pitfalls to deploy the app on time. If a challenging issue occurs we will keep you posted with everything. But as we mentioned we have 4 years experience in developing mobile apps so we know what such development requires.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please, spread the word about Heal Yourself app by:

  • Share it with your friends on your face book, twitter and other social media.
  • Write a blog post or suggest Heal Yourself app to other bloggers and media.
  • Sign up as the ambassador for your country.

story:
WHAT IS INTERMOSTAT?

Wouldn’t it be great if…you could see which websites each device in your network is visiting?

Wouldn’t it be great if...you could easily control the access to the internet?
Wouldn’t it be great if…you could see on your Smartphone who is using your whole bandwidth?

Intermostat is a small, easy-to-install device for your home or office that allows you to monitor internet traffic, bandwidth, and usage for each device connected to your network. Management of each device can be administered from a computer, tablet or smartphone. For parents, this is an easy way to control the internet usage of their family members.

Intermostat is a hardware device that connects to a router and passively gathers Internet protocol data making it accessible to end users.


WHAT DOES INTERMOSTAT DO?

Basically, Intermostat is a smart device which is connected through Ethernet to your router to help controlling the internet access of your Network. With this smart gadget, you can easily control  the settings of your network. For example, the bandwidth usage.

All administration can be done through the Intermostat-App. Every customer of Intermostat gadget gains free access for downloading the Intermostat-App, which will be offered for iOS and Android.

In the following we explain which functions we want to implement to the Intermostat product. All pictures shown are mock-ups of the Intermostat-App.

Devices Connected to Your Router

With Intermostat you can get the information, which devices are connected to your router, because Intermostat notices all devices which get internet access through your WIFI or LAN. This implies connected devices through your WIFI as well as connected devices through Ethernet.


Monitoring Websites

Intermostat allows you to monitor the websites, which every device has visited. Through tracking the router data and prepare the data, the user gets an overview of the websites visited generally, but you can also drill down to each device and get the specific information.


Filter / Block Websites

It is not only possible to monitor the websites visited, the administrator(s) can also block websites. This means they can choose websites, which couldn't be reached through the router connected to the Intermostat. Moreover, the websites can be blocked just for specific devices.


Alerts

The administrator(s) can receive alerts, if a specific website is visited. This can happen through email, text or an alert on the Intermostat-App.

Furthermore, it can be send an alarm, if a particular device exceed a certain bandwidth, e.g. if an online game ( which eats bandwidth) is played.

Bandwidth Monitoring

Another useful feature if Intermostat is the monitoring of the bandwidth. Through evaluating data from the router, Intermostat shows the user which device is using most of the bandwidth. The current measures can be brought up or the data can be shown on an hourly, daily, monthly basis.

Bandwidth Throttling

After having seen this data, the user has the opportunity to throttle the bandwidth for each device connected to the router. This can be done through splitting the bandwidth between the devices. As a result, a specific percentage of the total bandwidth can be guaranteed to a specific device. This helps, if you are for example watching an online movie.


Pausing the Internet

Intermostat allows you to pause the internet for all devices (for example during the night) or you can pause the internet for a particular device in your network.

Comparing Bandwidth Received

If you are wondering how much bandwidth you are getting in total from your Internet Service Provider (ISP), you can get this information with the Intermostat, too. Then you can compare this to the bandwidth promised by your ISP.

WHAT MAKES INTERMOSTAT UNIQUE?

Intermostat helps you to control the internet usage, which is especially helpful for parents. With our gadget you can see which websites your kids are visiting, block them if necessary or get alerts. Moreover, you can limit their internet usage by throttling the bandwidth or pausing the internet.

To control your internet settings and data is not easy with most of the routers. With Intermostat, this problem is solved: You can easily navigate with an app to several settings like the bandwidth usage.

HOW DID WE GET THERE?


HOW MUCH MONEY DO YOU NEED?

Our Goal is to raise $95,000. Based on our research, this amount will provide us the leverage we need to produce this unique product.


WHO ARE WE?

WHAT ARE THE RISKS AND CHALLENGES?

We’re an energized team of students from the University of Utah seeking our first round of funding for this innovative product. With your help backing our vision of developing hardware and software prototypes, we’ll provide owners of homes and businesses the ability to manage all devices band width usage within their network.  Based on our research, this product has great potential to benefit families who are concerned about the type of data that enters their home.  We are eager to start this project soon and build our first prototype. Until now, we can't provide you with a working prototype, but we believe that we can realize this idea with your help.

story:
DANDYCAN IN THE PRESS:

IN THIS VIDEO YOU CAN FIND OUT MORE ABOUT THE FEATURES OF DANDYCAN HEADPHONES.

HERE YOU CAN HEAR THE DESIGNER SPEAK:


DANDYCAN INFLUENCER PROGRAM - BE A REFERRAL DANDY AND GET YOUR PAIR FOR FREE!

ARE YOU A DANDY INFLUENCER? 

Through our Dandy Influencer Program, we want to give you your dandycan headphones for free. This by referring to the campaign and by helping to spread the word. So, If you successfully refer 10 friends to pre-order a Dandycan Headphone, then we will refund the price of your pre-order at the end of the Indiegogo Campaign.

How it works: Simply pledge for a DANDYCAN HEADPHONE to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons. 
Here is a step by step guide on how to: Dandycan Influencer Guide
Spread the word about DANDYCAN with your friends and around the web and you will get the credit! Get creative... Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed and blogs can help greatly! 


REMINDER!!

REMEMBER TO ADD THE SHIPPING TO YOUR TOTAL CONTRIBUTION AMOUNT!


PRODUCT INFORMATION

 


IN THIS VIDEO YOU CAN HEAR WHAT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT THE DANDYCAN HEADPHONES:

MORE ON THE STORY OF DANDYCAN HEADPHONES:

The Background & The Insights

DANDYCAN HEADPHONES is a project that was started two years ago when Daniel Åhman, a Scandinavian product designer, realized that he had bought a new pair of headphones almost once a year for the last twenty years. He thought to himself that it made no sense at all.

So he started pondering over why most of the headphones on the market were so crappy.

The conclusion and insight was that most of the products are made out of plastic and are also poorly designed.

Many headphones have mechanics and mechanisms that are weak and even unnecessary for the user. And besides that (and sometimes because of that) they often look ugly too.

Another thing that he found very annoying is that the cables always break which results in throwing the whole product away. That is not exactly environmentally friendly and feels like a total waste.

The start

So, instead of buying a new pair he decided to start a project with the goal to design durable headphones that would be a much more sustainable alternative to what is currently on the market.

Right from the start he chose to simplify the mechanics and to use materials that would not break.He also focused on solutions in which the whole product would not be disposed of in case of wear and tear. But besides being durable and more sustainable, they also needed to be aesthetically pleasing.

The Result – Almost indestructible, aesthetic and sustainable

The DANDYCAN headphones are all metal and leather with no breakable mechanics. The design combines modern and retro and has a sleek and classic look. It is made to be easy and simple to change the cable and the ear pads because they are actually the only parts that might eventually wear out. Scandinavian design at its best!


Why is this important for you?

You will reduce your waste and feel better about not throwing crappy things away. You will also have a nice and durable product that you don’t need to replace every year. We also think that you will enjoy their high-quality feel, their acoustics and their design and style.

But ultimately you will save a tiny bit of the earth and that should make you feel better.

Why are we here to ask for your support?

To be able to produce these fine headphones we need to invest in very expensive tooling. We also need to order a minimum quantity of 3000 pieces so that the vendor can assure the quality of the headphones. So, even if you help us get fully funded, we will still need to put money into this project. But you will give us an opportunity to actually make a difference, and you will give us a good start on our mission to make durable products and offer people a sound lifestyle.

Are you also tired of crappy products?

We hope that you will fund us by signing up for these dandy headphones. Dandycan headphones are not only beautiful, sleek and stylish but also durable and long-lasting. We want to offer you a sound and sustainable lifestyle and ultimately we will save (a tiny bit of) the earth.


More about the product

Acoustics

We believe that premium acoustics on a premium headphone should be standard. The combination of an acoustic chamber in aluminium and a high quality 40 mm premium speaker is probably the best start you can get. We then used an acoustic lab to tune and trim the sound curves to what we believe are great acoustics. We have achieved excellent acoustics on the mock-up but we will continue to fine tune during the next phase to create the perfect acoustics. The specifications may therefore change (for the better) during the next phase.

Design

We have kept the design classical, clean and simple. We have added some design features that make them look a little retro. You could call the design modern retro but most of all we strived to make them look sleek and dandy.

To summarize the design process we used emotions as a guide. If they looked good, sounded good, and were comfortable to wear, users would feel happy wearing them.

Mechanics

We wanted to minimize the mechanisms in these headphones because so often they add something negative to the design. There was a challenge to make the mechanisms strong enough without making the headphones too big or lose their comfort. But we could not compromise the height adjustment because people have different head sizes :-) . We therefore divided the height adjustment between two principals; some adjustment with an elastic headband and some with a slider. We found just having the slider adjustment would give you the crazy antenna look and just having the headband adjustment would make you look like an alien if you have a small head :-) . So the compromise between the principals was the best practice in this case.

Ergonomics

We have also worked a lot with the ergonomics of the product. The headphones' tilt is pre-angled to accommodate most peoples actual head size and shape. We have also chosen the softest and most comfortable protein leathers and memory foams available on market.

Environmental & Social responsibility

We take Mother Nature seriously. One of the main focus on the Dandycan headphones has been to make them durable so you don't need to consume new headphones all the time. We have also built the headphones to be very easy to disassemble and with materials that are easy to recycle. We also have a vision in the future to offer people the possibility to send back the product so we can reuse parts to build refurbished products and recycle whats left. We even would like to sell products with these used parts so that the headphones look used (like an old pair of jeans) but still with new speakers, cable and ear pads. We would like to make limited editions to support something we believe would make the world a better place. Some of the profits from this edition will then be donated to support the cause. 

Time Plan and Risks

Dandycan is a straight forward product and a lot of the work has already been done to reduce any potential risks. We have already visited and collaborated with the sourcing and manufacturing partners. The main risk in this project, would be poor quality from assembly and mechanical suppliers. We’ll reduce this risk by visiting mechanical suppliers and we will be present during product-builds, assembly and testing. 

Below you can see the time plan:


Our most important asset is the dandy peeps who support us, believe in us and make dandycan headphones possible. We want to thank and promise you that we will deliver you a truly beautiful, durable and good-sounding product!


FAQ

How come Dandycan Headphones are so cheap?

We use the philosophy to give back to our supporters. And therefore we have set the price as low as possible to take our vision into reality. We want to offer our supporters (hopefully you) a super deal since they invest in our vision. 

Do the headphones require batteries?

No, any standard iPhone/Andriod/Windows mobile phone can drive them.

Do I add the shipping fee to the perk amount.

Please add the shipping fee to your perk total. If you did not do so, go back and it should take you to a screen where you can edit your original perk amount to include the cost of shipping.

What type of warranty does Dandycan offer?

That means we offer a 1-year limited warranty on our product. If it’s a manufacturing defect and it’s within 1 year, you send them back and we send you a new one.

We will in future offer an extended warranty, however since we kept the sales price to a minimum and the fact that we are start-ups without resources we can only offer a regular warranty in this campaign.

How long is the Dandycan cable?

The cable on Dandycan Headphones is approx. 1,1 m (50 inches) long.

Can I control the volume on my device with the mic?

No. Volume control will have to be controlled through the device itself. Our mic comes with a one-button mic/remote so it cannot control the volume on devices.

What can I control with the one-button mic/remote?

Answer Calls (Press remote button once)

Hang Up-Calls (Press remote button once)

Play/Pause/Skip Songs (Press remote button once - Skip songs press button twice.)

Activate Voice Control (Long hold down the remote button)

What are the technical audio specification for Dandycan Headphones?

Transducer Principle: Dynamic, Closed

Driver Unit Size:  40 mm (Neodymium)

Impedance: 32 Ohms

Frequency Response: 20 - 20.000 Hz

Maximum Power: 30 mV

Weight Without Cable: ~200 gram

Microphone Directivity: Omni-Directional

Total Harmonic Distortion: <0.3%

Sensitivity: 103 db/mW

What about the acoustics?

Dandycan only uses premium components because we want to achieve premium acoustics. The headphones acoustics will be tuned and trimmed when we have produced parts from the tools for manufacturing. We have excellent acoustics on the mock-up but we will work further during next phase because we want to have the best possible acoustics. The specifications above may therefore change (to the better) during the next phase.

Where is Dandycan Headphones manufactured?

Components for Dandycan Headphones come from Japan, Taiwan and China, Final assembly is performed in China.

Where is Dandycan Headphones designed?

Dandycan Headphones is designed and developed in Sweden and we feel that our Design is very Scandinavian.

What's a referral program?

In a sentence: if you successfully refer 10 friends to contribute to a Dandycan Headphone, then we will refund the price of your Headphone! 







--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
story_txt:
DANDYCAN IN THE PRESS:IN THIS VIDEO YOU CAN FIND OUT MORE ABOUT THE FEATURES OF DANDYCAN HEADPHONES.HERE YOU CAN HEAR THE DESIGNER SPEAK:DANDYCAN INFLUENCER PROGRAM - BE A REFERRAL DANDY AND GET YOUR PAIR FOR FREE!ARE YOU A DANDY INFLUENCER? Through our Dandy Influencer Program, we want to give you your dandycan headphones for free. This by referring to the campaign and by helping to spread the word. So, If you successfully refer 10 friends to pre-order a Dandycan Headphone, then we will refund the price of your pre-order at the end of the Indiegogo Campaign.



How it works: Simply pledge for a DANDYCAN HEADPHONE to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons. 


Here is a step by step guide on how to: Dandycan Influencer Guide

Spread the word about DANDYCAN with your friends and around the web and you will get the credit! Get creative... Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed and blogs can help greatly! 


REMINDER!!
REMEMBER TO ADD THE SHIPPING TO YOUR TOTAL CONTRIBUTION AMOUNT!


PRODUCT INFORMATION
 









IN THIS VIDEO YOU CAN HEAR WHAT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT THE DANDYCAN HEADPHONES:

MORE ON THE STORY OF DANDYCAN HEADPHONES:

The Background & The Insights
DANDYCAN HEADPHONES is a project that was started two years ago when Daniel Åhman, a Scandinavian product designer, realized that he had bought a new pair of headphones almost once a year for the last twenty years. He thought to himself that it made no sense at all.
So he started pondering over why most of the headphones on the market were so crappy.
The conclusion and insight was that most of the products are made out of plastic and are also poorly designed.
Many headphones have mechanics and mechanisms that are weak and even unnecessary for the user. And besides that (and sometimes because of that) they often look ugly too.
Another thing that he found very annoying is that the cables always break which results in throwing the whole product away. That is not exactly environmentally friendly and feels like a total waste.





The start
So, instead of buying a new pair he decided to start a project with the goal to design durable headphones that would be a much more sustainable alternative to what is currently on the market.
Right from the start he chose to simplify the mechanics and to use materials that would not break.He also focused on solutions in which the whole product would not be disposed of in case of wear and tear. But besides being durable and more sustainable, they also needed to be aesthetically pleasing.
The Result – Almost indestructible, aesthetic and sustainable
The DANDYCAN headphones are all metal and leather with no breakable mechanics. The design combines modern and retro and has a sleek and classic look. It is made to be easy and simple to change the cable and the ear pads because they are actually the only parts that might eventually wear out. Scandinavian design at its best!



Why is this important for you?
You will reduce your waste and feel better about not throwing crappy things away. You will also have a nice and durable product that you don’t need to replace every year. We also think that you will enjoy their high-quality feel, their acoustics and their design and style.

But ultimately you will save a tiny bit of the earth and that should make you feel better.


Why are we here to ask for your support?
To be able to produce these fine headphones we need to invest in very expensive tooling. We also need to order a minimum quantity of 3000 pieces so that the vendor can assure the quality of the headphones. So, even if you help us get fully funded, we will still need to put money into this project. But you will give us an opportunity to actually make a difference, and you will give us a good start on our mission to make durable products and offer people a sound lifestyle.



Are you also tired of crappy products?
We hope that you will fund us by signing up for these dandy headphones. Dandycan headphones are not only beautiful, sleek and stylish but also durable and long-lasting. We want to offer you a sound and sustainable lifestyle and ultimately we will save (a tiny bit of) the earth.



More about the product
Acoustics
We believe that premium acoustics on a premium headphone should be standard. The combination of an
acoustic chamber in aluminium and a high quality 40 mm premium speaker is
probably the best start you can get. We then used an acoustic lab to
tune and trim the sound curves to what we believe are great acoustics. We have achieved excellent acoustics on the mock-up but we will continue to fine tune during the next phase to create the perfect acoustics. The specifications may therefore change (for the better) during the next phase.
Design
We have kept the design
classical, clean and simple. We have added some design features that make them look a little
retro. You could call the design modern retro but most of all we strived to
make them look sleek and dandy.
To summarize the design
process we used emotions as a guide. If they looked good, sounded good, and were comfortable to wear, users would feel happy wearing them.
Mechanics
We wanted to minimize
the mechanisms in these headphones because so often they add something negative to
the design. There was a challenge to make the mechanisms strong enough without
making the headphones too big or lose their comfort. But we could not compromise the height adjustment because people have different head
sizes :-) . We therefore divided the height adjustment between two principals; some
adjustment with an elastic headband and some with a slider. We found just having the slider adjustment would give you the crazy antenna look and just having
the headband adjustment would make you look like an alien if
you have a small head :-) . So the compromise between the principals was the best
practice in this case.
Ergonomics
We have also worked a
lot with the ergonomics of the product. The headphones' tilt is pre-angled to accommodate most peoples actual head size and shape. We have also
chosen the softest and most comfortable protein leathers and memory foams available on market.
Environmental & Social responsibility


We take Mother Nature
seriously. One of the main focus on the Dandycan headphones has been to make them durable so you don't need to consume new headphones all the time. We have also built the headphones to be very easy to disassemble
and with materials that are easy to recycle. We also have a
vision in the future to offer people the possibility to send back
the product so we can reuse parts to build refurbished products and
recycle whats left. We even would like to sell products with these used parts so
that the headphones look used (like an old pair of jeans) but still with new speakers, cable and ear pads. We would like to make limited editions to support something we believe would make the world a better place. Some of the profits from this edition will then be donated to support the cause. 
Time Plan and Risks
Dandycan is a straight forward product and a lot of the work has already been done to reduce any potential risks. We have already visited and collaborated with the sourcing and manufacturing partners. The main risk in this project, would be poor quality from assembly and mechanical suppliers. We’ll reduce this risk by visiting mechanical suppliers and we will be present during product-builds, assembly and testing. 
Below you can see the time plan:




Our most important asset is the dandy peeps who support us, believe in us and make dandycan headphones possible. We want to thank and promise you that we will deliver you a truly beautiful, durable and good-sounding product!

We use the philosophy to give back to our supporters. And therefore we have set the price as low as possible to take our vision into reality. We want to offer our supporters (hopefully you) a super deal since they invest in our vision.

Please add the shipping fee to your perk total. If you did not do

to a screen where you can edit your original perk amount to include the cost
of shipping.




What type of warranty does Dandycan
offer?
That means we offer a 1-year limited warranty on our product. If it’s a manufacturing defect and it’s within 1 year, you send them back and we send you a new one.
We will in future offer an extended warranty, however since we kept the sales price to a minimum and the fact that we are start-ups without resources we can only offer a regular warranty in this campaign.
How long is the
Dandycan cable?

mic?
No. Volume
control will have to be controlled through the device itself. Our mic comes

story:
The GoGoLeash Team provides you multi-functional dog handles with built-in LED, water tank, waste bag storage and SOFT training modes with a new training collar. Solve all the problems you may have. Make your time with your dog more harmonious. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

The leash handle has a water bowl and water tank that holds 150 ml of water so your pup can quench their thirst anywhere.  Also, the water tank can be easily disassembled.

 

We included a built-in storage area to hold up to 15 waste bags with an easy-tear dispenser. Our waste bag storage is a universal type, you can easily buy refills online.

 
 


Built-in Lighting for Nighttime: LED lights in both the leash handle and the dog’s collar keep you  both safe and visible at night. The irradiation distance was 3 meters and 1 meter respectively. 

 

 

Vibration collars are often suggested for hearing-impaired dogs or those who simply refuse to listen. The primary use of vibration in a dog training collar is to get the dog’s attention or use it as a recall signal.

 

When using vibration training, you want the collar to fit snugly enough for the dog to feel the vibration but not tightly. You should be able to put 1-2 fingers between the collar and your dog's neck. Vibration is a safe and humane way to work with dogs of any size to help train them, praise them, and correct behavior.

 

For sound training mode, Dogs can recognize certain sounds and tones and learn how to react to them. For example, your dog knows what the doorbell ringing means and how to react to it.

Through repetition, dogs will learn what a specific sound or tone means and be able to react to it appropriately.  

With sound training, you can easily overlay an audible sound over a known (or learning) verbal command and quickly teach your dog commands like "sit," "stay," and "heel."

Both training modes can be used to give your pup a warning, give them praise, or as a silent command depending on how you choose to train your dog.

When using any training tools, experts recommend you use verbal commands first and then training tools to reinforce the commands, and reward positive behavior with treats. Training tools are cues for your dogs - not a consequence or punishment. The GoGoLeash Training System has a maximum range of about 650 feet.
 

For training modes, internal channel switching allows you to switch from one dog to another to easily use their preferred training method only on them.

 

 

GoGoLeash’s handle have super bearing capacity up to 100 kg / 220 pounds and you can walk up to 5 dogs with one leash handle. 

 

 

 

The GoGoLeash is also compatible with regular car seat belt buckles to keep your dogs safe and secure in your vehicle.

 

Each leash handle is equipped with a safety strap to prevent accidental drop.

 

Our handles are ergonomically designed and easy to hold. 

 

 

We use 1.3 to 1.5 meters of adjustable reflective rope with universal buckle. 

 

 

GoGoLeash’s collar is IP65 waterproof and rain resistant so the smart leash and collar system can be used in any weather.

 

 

 

We won the NEW INNOVATIONS IN CONSUMER ELECTRONICS award at CES.

 

After the CES, we upgraded some features, such as size, design, function, etc. through the collected suggestions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

●     What shipping service will you be using?

●     Most of the rewards we have listed, will use Container shipping to ship to the destination country or city and then use the local post office or shipping services to get the GoGoLeash to your home. We want you to have the cheapest shipping cost possible and this is how we can do that.

 

●     Are there VAT, duties, or fees related to shipping?

●     For container shipment orders to US EU AU CA CN HK SG area, we will pay the tax.

●     Indiegogo rewards are gifts that you receive in return for your donations. They are different from ordinary sales/purchases. Our courier had worked on dozens crowdfunding projects which went smoothly through fulfillment. Under our arrangement, it won't entail additional costs for you under most circumstances. Despite that, the fact we're shipping directly from China may still impose a chance for further inspection and determination by the customs. The VAT, duties and fees vary by country. Please message us about the specifics.

 

●     Does it come with a warranty? If so, how long and what does it cover?

●     We provide a 12-month warranty on Indiegogo orders, same as retail.

 

●     What materials are the collar, leash, and handle made of?

●     All products are made of recyclable plastic materials.

 

●     How many training modes does it have?

●     Vibration and sound.

 

●     Can the intensity of the sound and vibration be adjusted?

●     No, it cannot. The training modes are gentle and not aggressive but are enough to get your pet's attention.

 

●     How bright are the LED lights for night walks?

●     The leash handle has a power of 1 watt and can be illuminated for 3 meters at night.

●     The smart collar can irradiate 1 meter.

 

●     How many poop bags can it hold?

●     15 bags of any brand.

 

●     How much water fits in the attached water tank?

●     150ml / 5.3 ounces.

 

●     What is the weight limit?

●     Leash weight limit is 100 kg/220 pounds and collar capacity is 50 kg/110 pounds.

 

●     How long does it need to be charged?

●     The collar can be fully charged in 30 minutes and last 15 days on one full charge.

●     The leash handle can be fully charged in one hour and lasts 95 days.

 

●     What kind of charger does it need?

●     Micro USB (provided)
