story:
A Kwik Look. 

 

Before we get into the nuts and bolts of it all, here’s the eagle-eye view of our campaign:

 

1. The product is an app that instantly connects sellers with nearby buyers for safe, secure and on-demand transactions using their mobile phones.

2. We use our own lingo and refer to our buyers as Buckaroos and our sellers as Buckeneurs.

3. The sole purpose of our app is to allow users to have the independence to take back control of their lives and the freedom to choose how they live it. 

4. The bigger goal is to offer an easier way to get the two things in life we all wish we had more of which is Time and Money.”

And we believe all of this is possible – with a single app and, of course, a whole lot of people. 

Keep reading for more juicy details...

 

Our Story

 

Whilst finding myself unemployed, I looked at the way in which employment, service delivery, and e-commerce operate in our world today.

Everyone's accustomed to buying products and scheduling services online… the problem is that we don’t have time to browse through endless options, trying to decide which product or service offers the best value for the price. As sellers, we sometimes have to wait days on end to get paid after delivery. 

Frustrated by the ways things were being done and the limitations I faced, I knew there had to be a better way.

I discovered that as sellers, we wanted a secure mobile solution, enabling us to sell our products, provide services or even complete tasks for nearby buyers. Sellers want to earn a kwikbuck and as buyers, we wanted an app that keeps up with a fast-paced life. So instead of waiting for days, weeks and months for our deliveries, we all wanted a solution that conveniently offers us what we want, whenever we needed it. 

I figured that since some of us have the time but not the bucks, while others have the bucks but never the time, my mission was to offer the perfect solution. I wanted to offer both buyers and sellers something new, innovative, safe and above all, convenient. 

I had my “ah-ha” moment and imagined users simply tapping to earn a buck or conveniently get what they want, whenever they need it. I wanted users to have the independence to take control of their lives, with the freedom to choose how they live it. I decided to combine a product marketplace, service delivery, and tasking solution, into one central on-demand mobile marketplace, giving users access to the products we loved, combined with the services we needed.

 

Through this vision, KwikBuck was born...

 

Convenience at Your Fingertips

 

Kwikbuck is the mobile app that lets you buy and sell products and services all in one place with one account. No more visiting one site to sell, another to buy then yet another to find work. You can do it all easily on Kwikbuck, where Anything is Available On-Demand.

The idea was born during a time when founder Jean Pierre ( JP ) was unemployed and looking for the best way to monetize his free time and earn a buck. 

“ I wanted to create a platform that allowed people to work when they wanted, earn what they needed, buy what they wanted and sell what they didn’t need. I was finding online shopping frustrating, with slow delivery times, spammers and hassles remembering passwords all proving annoying. “

So the idea was to create an online marketplace that cut out the hassles and save people time by making it easy to earn or spend a Kwikbuck.

In short, the idea behind Kwikbuck is to give people an easier way to get the two things in life we all wish we had more of: Time and Money.”

 

 

As Seen On

Kwikbuck has already enjoyed exposure on the following channels:

 

How We're Sending a Shockwave Through the World

 
 
Our goal is to build an app that becomes the go-to resource for anyone looking to earn or spend a kwikbuck. Our vision is for a marketplace that’s both mobile and social, somewhere that makes buying and selling goods and services locally, quicker and easier than it currently is. 
 
 

 

With Kwikbuck, our buckaneurs ( sellers ) get all the freedom and independence they crave by selling their goods, providing their services, or completing tasks. Our buckaroos (buyers) get the benefits of online commerce combined with world-class shopping.

Our platform allows buckaroos (buyers) and buckaneurs ( sellers ) to connect, conveniently and safely transact, sell and buy goods and services, and even get tasks done. It's the app where the gig economy meets a mobile marketplace. A place where passion can be turned into profits.

 

 

The New Form of Social & Mobile Employment

 

Sell goods. Buy services. Buy goods. Sell services. Do one or do them all. That’s the beauty of Kwikbuck. You can make money or spend it on one app you can trust, thanks to its transparent feedback system. 

Need to find a local painter, landscaper or perhaps a perfect locally handcrafted gift? Kwikbuck lets you search local product and service providers quickly using our custom mapping tool. 

You’ll discover who’s offering what in your own backyard. Maybe a neighbour is a wiz at electricals. Or someone a few blocks down the road is producing amazing art. Kwikbuck uncovers the talents of your community and lets you and discover the marketplace around you. You can also sell your products and services to that same community. Simply list what you have to sell and wait for the bucks to roll in.

 

 

By effortlessly combining the products we love with services we needed, our mobile marketplace offers you convenience and peace of mind, so you can gain access to whatever you want, whenever you need it all from one dedicated, innovative and convenient mobile marketplace! 

Kwikbuck will open up whole new markets for your products and services, giving you an easy way to promote yourself so you can earn a Kwikbuck (or three) and up your income.

 

 

How We're Different

 

 

Flexibility for Everyone

At Kwikbuck, we believe that a more flexible and convenient labour market increases the freedom, productivity, and wealth of everyone involved.
 
 

For the women and men who work with KwikBuck, our app represents a flexible new way to earn bucks. By creating mobile employment and redefining the mobile marketplace, we help strengthen local communities, empower individuals, and grow local economies.
 

Here's a little glimpse into the app and what it can do for you: 

 

Discover Creative Ways to Earn a Buck:

  •  Earning a KwikBuck is effortless. Simply create your store to instantly connect with buyers nearby. 

 

  •  Put your skills to good use. Provide your expertise and experience to vetted buyers near you. 

  •  Have some free time? Run errands, collect groceries or deliver parcels to earn a kwikbuck. 

  •  Communication is seamless. Keep your buyers up to date with your progress, ETA and more. 

  •  Set some goals. In addition to making a buck, you can also save a buck. Establish what you’re saving towards, set some goals and start accumulating your KwikBuck. 

 

 

Get What You Want, When You Need it:

  •  Whatever, Whenever. Discover products, services or taskers available near you.  

  • Serious about safety. With Kwikbuck, you'll always know who you're buying from.

  •  Get your orders delivered in minutes. Choose the service or products required, then sit back and relax as our vetted sellers take care of everything. 

  •  Keep track of your deliveries in Real Time. You'll receive updates every step of the way, so your deliveries never interfere with what's important to you. 
  •  Pay with your phone, not your wallet.  Pay securely and conveniently using your mobile device. Simply tap a button and your order's paid. 

 

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ’s

 

 

Compatible with iOS and Android

 

 

 

It's Time For Change 

 

Our cities are home to millions of individuals, and the truth is that we don’t have enough jobs for them all. The good news is that we can all do something about it. Let’s #giveabuck and empower our communities, together. 

 

A more flexible and convenient labour market increases the freedom, productivity and wealth of everyone involved.

 

 

 

Why We Need Your Help

 

With an idea as big and bold as Kwikbuck, we need your feedback as we build and test the app to ensure it delivers the life-changing, life-easing services we want it to.

By reaching out to the crowdfunding community, we hope to find a core group of our ideal users who share our collaborative spirit and who’ll give us direct, honest feedback to improve the app as it develops (not to mention the financial backing we need). 

 

Let’s talk numbers

 

We’ve already partially funded starting-up Kwikbuck ourselves. But we need additional funds to help us offset some of the initial and ongoing costs, as well as to finance additional features and further developments.

So, we’ve come to Indiegogo looking for help in raising $9,500. 

 

Here’s a breakdown of our budget:

  •  $4462 to cover the costs to finalize development of the "Services" feature of the app
  •  $1900 for marketing and advertising of the app
  •  $1300 to set up our website, emails, and domain hosting for the next 2 years
  •  $1480 for BETA Testing and Evaluation
  •  $223 for App Store Fee’s (for 2 Years) and Google Play’s once off fee.
  •  $135 to cover the total anticipated fees taken by Indiegogo and PayPal for the above amounts.

Any excess funds that we raise will go toward marketing, future feature development and international growth.

 

 

 

Stretch Goals

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Here's What's in it For You

 

Well, first and foremost, using the kwikbuck app could help you earn a buck, real kwik. (Did we mention that? Pretty sure we mentioned that.) But more immediately, your contributions can earn you some pretty cool stuff, including helping us in the beta testing, getting access to the app before anyone else, and becoming the proud new owner of a lifestyle where you’re in control!

When you help fund KwkBuck, you help people all across the world realize their potential. Check out our awesome perks and choose the one that feels just right. And if $1 is all you can afford, that makes your contribution even more special!

 

Earn a Buck for helping us Spread the Word! 

 

You can earn your first KwikBuck through a 20% referral commission of every dollar you help raise for our campaign! Simply click here to get started. 

 

 

We'll Hook You Up For Helping Us Out

 

Refer your friends and get additional benefits from the Kwikbuck App!

How to get started :

  • Copy your unique sharing referral link.
  • Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends and ask them to join us by placing an order on Indiegogo. A successful referral is only counted if someone pre-orders a Kwikbuck App Indiegogo campaign perk via your link.  
  • You’ll receive FREE referral prizes! The types of prizes vary, depending on how many referral orders are tracked via Indiegogo.

For every friend you successfully refer, we'll give you 5 bucks as a bonus to spend however you choose. for FREE! If you refer 10 or more friends, we'll give you 100 Bucks, straight into your Kwikwallet account.

Who? 

You must be a backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

How?

Log in to Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools, shown below.

Tracking Your Results:

  • Log into your Indiegogo account.
  • Click on your username beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  • Select the “My Profile” option.
  • Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  • See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount.
  • Based on the total points you've earned, we'll unlock your bonus bucks when the KwikBuck App launches

 

 

 

We Actually #giveabuck

 

Kwikbuck is all about making life easier for everyone. With this in mind, we’re ensuring that when you support our campaign by purchasing any one of our great perks, you can nominate a charity of your choice in the comments section. Tell us why we should #giveabuck about that good cause, and if we hit our funding target, we'll donate 10% of our total funds raised to one of the nominated charities.

 

 

 

What's Our Timeline?

 

The first beta for our "Services" will be launched in October 2018 followed by our "Product" feature beta test in mid- Jan 2019, with the "Tasking" feature expected to be launched in mid-March 2019. During our intitial BETA testing phase, we’ll be adding or removing features from the app, to ensure that a quality product is released to the general public. 

We will officially release the app on the Google Play and App Stores once we have completed our beta testing. That date will be up to backers; we’ll release the app to stores when we are confident that our backers are really happy with the product they have in their hands.

From there, we’ll be adding the additional features recommended by early users, as rapidly as we can following our official release. Timing will partially depend upon how quickly we reach that “backers are really happy with the product they have in their hands” status, though we’ll certainly be working to make those releases a lot quicker.

 

 

 

By becoming a backer now, you’ll get access to and enjoy our marketplace beta tests for free, as well as the opportunity to give us feedback on what would make this the perfect mobile marketplace for you.

 

 

Meet The Team Behind Kwikbuck

 

Plenty of focused, dedicated and driven people have helped get Kwikbuck to where it already is. And the team is ready to take it to the next level. Here’s your chance to find out a bit more about a few of us:

 

Jean Pierre (JP), Founder

The brains behind Kwikbuck, JP is a serial entrepreneur, visionary and all round nice guy. He’s worked in various industries, served as a business consultant and is what you might call an innovative wizard.

 

Yvette, Head of Design

Meet Yvette, the talent behind our marketing, spreading the word about Kwikbuck. She has over 10 years’ marketing experience under the belt and enjoys long walks on the beach.

 

Mr Cuddles, Our Support Structure

The bringer of coffee. The (fluffy) shoulder to cry on. Our steady support structure. Without this guy, we wouldn’t have come this far! 

 

And lastly, but most importantly…

 

You, Our Backers

You’re the motivation behind it all. The Dad’s, Moms and young individuals who help bring life to our cause and helping us change the way the world works.

 

 

Help Us Change The World Way the World Works

 

That’s all folks! Our app, our vision, our motivation and our goals. Are you ready to contribute toward the future of commerce and service delivery!? Thank you! Let’s get started.

In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can help out by telling all your friends about KwikBuck. Go ahead and post a link to the campaign or our website on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use.

We appreciate all contributions to what we are doing, and we thank you sincerely for your time. Let’s work together to bring KwikBuck to mobile users worldwide! 

From all of us at KwikBuck, Thank you, Buckaroo!

 

Share #KWIKBUCK with Friends AND Family! 

 

 

Acknowledgements

 

I would like to personally thank the team behind the Kwikbuck project, who have spent countless hours and late nights bringing the vision to life. You've remained dedicated & motivated throughout the entire development process and you've truly proven to the world what the human spirit can accomplish. It's been an extraordinary journey! Thank you! 

 

To our readers & backers, Thank you for sharing our vision!

 

 

P.S. After you donate, be sure to visit us at www.kwikbuck.com to sign up to our mailing list for FREE offers & exclusive updates!
story_txt:
A Kwik Look.  
Before we get into the nuts and bolts of it all, here’s the eagle-eye view of our campaign:
 
1. The product is an app that instantly connects sellers with nearby buyers for safe, secure and on-demand transactions using their mobile phones.
2. We use our own lingo and refer to our buyers as Buckaroos and our sellers as Buckeneurs.
3. The sole purpose of our app is to allow users to have the independence to take back control of their lives and the freedom to choose how they live it. 
4. The bigger goal is to offer an easier way to get the two things in life we all wish we had more of which is Time and Money.”
And we believe all of this is possible – with a single app and, of course, a whole lot of people. 
Keep reading for more juicy details...
 
Our Story
 Whilst finding myself unemployed, I looked at the way in which employment, service delivery, and e-commerce operate in our world today.Everyone's accustomed to buying products and scheduling services online… the problem is that we don’t have time to browse through endless options, trying to decide which product or service offers the best value for the price. As sellers, we sometimes have to wait days on end to get paid after delivery. Frustrated by the ways things were being done and the limitations I faced, I knew there had to be a better way.I discovered that as sellers, we wanted a secure mobile solution, enabling us to sell our products, provide services or even complete tasks for nearby buyers. Sellers want to earn a kwikbuck and as buyers, we wanted an app that keeps up with a fast-paced life. So instead of waiting for days, weeks and months for our deliveries, we all wanted a solution that conveniently offers us what we want, whenever we needed it. I figured that since some of us have the time but not the bucks, while others have the bucks but never the time, my mission was to offer the perfect solution. I wanted to offer both buyers and sellers something new, innovative, safe and above all, convenient. I had my “ah-ha” moment and imagined users simply tapping to earn a buck or conveniently get what they want, whenever they need it. I wanted users to have the independence to take control of their lives, with the freedom to choose how they live it. I decided to combine a product marketplace, service delivery, and tasking solution, into one central on-demand mobile marketplace, giving users access to the products we loved, combined with the services we needed. Through this vision, KwikBuck was born... Convenience at Your Fingertips Kwikbuck is the mobile app that lets you buy and sell products and services all in one place with one account. No more visiting one site to sell, another to buy then yet another to find work. You can do it all easily on Kwikbuck, where Anything is Available On-Demand.The idea was born during a time when founder Jean Pierre ( JP ) was unemployed and looking for the best way to monetize his free time and earn a buck. “ I wanted to create a platform that allowed people to work when they wanted, earn what they needed, buy what they wanted and sell what they didn’t need. I was finding online shopping frustrating, with slow delivery times, spammers and hassles remembering passwords all proving annoying. “So the idea was to create an online marketplace that cut out the hassles and save people time by making it easy to earn or spend a Kwikbuck.In short, the idea behind Kwikbuck is to give people an easier way to get the two things in life we all wish we had more of: Time and Money.”  As Seen OnKwikbuck has already enjoyed exposure on the following channels: How We're Sending a Shockwave Through the World  Our goal is to build an app that becomes the go-to resource for anyone looking to earn or spend a kwikbuck. Our vision is for a marketplace that’s both mobile and social, somewhere that makes buying and selling goods and services locally, quicker and easier than it currently is.   

 
With Kwikbuck, our buckaneurs ( sellers ) get all the freedom and independence they crave by selling their goods, providing their services, or completing tasks. Our buckaroos (buyers) get the benefits of online commerce combined with world-class shopping.
Our platform allows buckaroos (buyers) and buckaneurs ( sellers ) to connect, conveniently and safely transact, sell and buy goods and services, and even get tasks done. It's the app where the gig economy meets a mobile marketplace. A place where passion can be turned into profits.
 
 
The New Form of Social & Mobile Employment

 
Sell goods. Buy services. Buy goods. Sell services. Do one or do them all. That’s the beauty of Kwikbuck. You can make money or spend it on one app you can trust, thanks to its transparent feedback system. 
Need to find a local painter, landscaper or perhaps a perfect locally handcrafted gift? Kwikbuck lets you search local product and service providers quickly using our custom mapping tool. 
You’ll discover who’s offering what in your own backyard. Maybe a neighbour is a wiz at electricals. Or someone a few blocks down the road is producing amazing art. Kwikbuck uncovers the talents of your community and lets you and discover the marketplace around you. You can also sell your products and services to that same community. Simply list what you have to sell and wait for the bucks to roll in.
 

 
By effortlessly combining the products we love with services we needed, our mobile marketplace offers you convenience and peace of mind, so you can gain access to whatever you want, whenever you need it all from one dedicated, innovative and convenient mobile marketplace! 
Kwikbuck will open up whole new markets for your products and services, giving you an easy way to promote yourself so you can earn a Kwikbuck (or three) and up your income.
 
 
How We're Different


 
 
Flexibility for Everyone
At Kwikbuck, we believe that a more flexible and convenient labour market increases the freedom, productivity, and wealth of everyone involved.
  For the women and men who work with KwikBuck, our app represents a flexible new way to earn bucks. By creating mobile employment and redefining the mobile marketplace, we help strengthen local communities, empower individuals, and grow local economies. Here's a little glimpse into the app and what it can do for you:  Discover Creative Ways to Earn a Buck: Earning a KwikBuck is effortless. Simply create your store to instantly connect with buyers nearby.   Put your skills to good use. Provide your expertise and experience to vetted buyers near you.  Have some free time? Run errands, collect groceries or deliver parcels to earn a kwikbuck.  Communication is seamless. Keep your buyers up to date with your progress, ETA and more.  Set some goals. In addition to making a buck, you can also save a buck. Establish what you’re saving towards, set some goals and start accumulating your KwikBuck.   Get What You Want, When You Need it: Whatever, Whenever. Discover products, services or taskers available near you.

story:
Summary

There are many ways to generate reports in a django application but the majority requires a developer to create a new report or modify any aspect (it doesn’t matter if it’s small or big).

Today’s companies demands high flexibility on the business applications and django is amazing handling this but failing in the analytics and reporting unless you use a third party BI suite or create a custom reporting interface (and high time consuming).

With the analytics & reporting engine for django you can create amazing analytical views, flexible reports and custom dashboard.

Why this campaign

In my time working with django I've experienced how the tasks about reporting and analytics with django are time consumming and with almos no flexibility over the evolution of the models. This situation forces me (and many other developers) to use external tools specialized in reporting or business intelligence like pentaho, jasper, saiku or any other.

Those tools are great and powerfull but adds a new layer to the system and a new level of complexity by the usage of other language platforms and also doesn't follows your models evolution.

Then I have my brain working on how to deal with analytics and reporting tasks inside django, beign easy and powerfull as django itself; then, afther the brainwork I've started working in a prototype with the ability to dynamically configure which fields of a model I want to include in a report with a table layout and then generate a html view (all the matching rows) and downloadable pdf, csv and xls files.

I’m really impressed (again) of the amazing power of django handling any type of project because the current prototype is working as expected and can be extended in any imaginable way requiring only time to code.

I’m currently working part-time and thinking about to accept another job or start working on this exciting project developing an MVP or a complete solution depending on the archived goals.

In other words and to be clear, you would be hiring me by my experience in django and business application development to work day to day designing and developing a pluggable and open source software solution to extend your existing and future django applications with amazing analytics and reporting features bringing a layer of business intelligence with less effort.


Goals

I have defined a series of sequential goals I expect to achieve in order to get the next kickass analytics and reporting engine based on django.


1. $ 1,000.00 - From prototype to MVP

At this point I’ll be able to create a stable MVP with the basic reporting features as an starting point to get the desired solution. Some of the features at this point.

  • Standard django theme layout

  • Dynamic field selection

  • Field formatting

  • Page layout & style (basic)

  • Export

    • html preview

    • downloadable pdf, csv and xls files

  • Save reports as templates (to reuse later)

  • Permissions


2. $ 5,000.00 - Layout and templates

  • Customize the page layout

  • Complex row layouts

    • Not just simple table cells

    • Images

    • Subreports

  • Customize page sections

    • Page Header

    • Report header

    • Groups

    • Content (rows)

    • Report footer

    • Page footer

  • Report modes

    • Lists

    • Master / detail


3. $ 7,000.00 - Extensible API

Lets build a robust API who allows us to extend the functionality or restrict the access to report templates, models and fields by:

  • Setting custom rules (like in django admin for queryset, formfield_for_*, get_list_display, etc…)

  • Adding formatters

  • Creating custom fields (based on sql queries)

  • And playing with a full set of options


4. $ 10,000.00 - Aggregation & Measures

Do you like how the aggregation and measures implementations on OLAP cubes?... I do!.

And the great news is: this can also be added.

Lets think when an Officer wants to know the total sales by product family from your retail system and then selects the field “Product family” and the measure “Sales amount”, getting the total of sales for each product family; then wants to go a little deeper by adding the city of the store willing to get the total of sales for each product family in each one of the cities they have stores.

And this can go more deeper?... Of course!


5. $ 12,500.00 - Drilldown

Have you tried pivot tables on common spreadsheets?... Think in a web version of the sample report of the sales amount. You have selected a column for the field “country“ and another for the measure “Sales amount”. This reports shows a summary of all the countries with their respectives sales amount.

Well, the country is a geographic place divided in smallest regions, and those regions in more smallest regions, etc.; If add the ability to group any type of structure within the system then can automate the deepening walk by allowing the user to expand the top levels to get their childs with no limit on the levels of deep.


6. $ 15,000.00 - Charts

What about a analytics and reporting framework without graphics and charts?

It is possible to automate the charts generation by adding some intelligence in the manipulation of fields and measures of the reports, for example, taking the previous example (again), if have the field country and the measure sales amount, then can easily create a bar or pie chart, or a lineal chart by using the date instead of country and any type of combination.

To do this It’s possible to reuse the top chart libraries out there like Highcharts, sparklines, flotcharts, xcharts, or any other in the near future.

do you want charts?


7. $ 18,000.00 - Widgets & Dashboards

Think in the possibility to take a report template with a chart layout and wants to embed in real time on a private portal, smart tv, tablet, smartphone or a public blog or website?.. also to be able to group those widgets in a dashboard (with no limit on number of dashboards) granting granular permissions to widgets or the full dashboard.

Officers will love!


8. $ 21,000.00 - Celery integration

Wants to go async and distributed?... I like celery!.

Using Celery + djcelery (with any broker) this becomes an enterprise grade application capable to attend a high number of concurrent connections and processing a huge amount of data balancing the jobs between various servers. Lets add this capability to the project.


9. $ 25,000.00 - OLAP-like layer

At this point there are in consideration some key features of an OLAP implementation, as:

  • Measures of data

  • Aggregation

  • Grouping levels of structures

  • Drill Down

Why not to extend this by adding the ability to setup custom dimensions and to design multidimensional cubes by grouping your models and database views?.


10. Over Funds - take the best, to make it amazingly better.

As you may know, this platform allow the overfunding of a project, then I want to tell you that if the campaigns get at this point then all the exceeding money would be used in this same project, being allowed to:

  • Add more functionality (as were suggested)

  • Improve and optimize all the previous described features.

  • Create custom extensions for existing django packages.

  • Hire another developer(s) to reduce the time

  • Talk on conferences about the project

  • Create video tutorials about the project

  • Anything else that makes the project better


About me

I'm a Software Engineer from Guatemala specialized in business applications.

I've beign developing web applications from the last 9 years and the last 6 developing business web applications based on the django framework.

I like the doing thigs in the "django way", thinking in modularity and extensibility of the projects I've involved.

I also passionated doing business analytics implementations on business web applications and it will be very exciting to work developing the next kickass business analytics platform based on django.


Spread the word

If you can't contribute with “coins”, share this campaign with your friends by mail and social networks because someone of your friends or their friends may be interested to contribute.


Questions

Ask anything you need to know, I'll be pleased to discuss with you.
story_txt:
SummaryThere are many ways to generate reports in a django application but the majority requires a developer to create a new report or modify any aspect (it doesn’t matter if it’s small or big).Today’s companies demands high flexibility on the business applications and django is amazing handling this but failing in the analytics and reporting unless you use a third party BI suite or create a custom reporting interface (and high time consuming).With the analytics & reporting engine for django you can create amazing analytical views, flexible reports and custom dashboard.Why this campaignIn my time working with django I've experienced how the tasks about reporting and analytics with django are time consumming and with almos no flexibility over the evolution of the models. This situation forces me (and many other developers) to use external tools specialized in reporting or business intelligence like pentaho, jasper, saiku or any other.Those tools are great and powerfull but adds a new layer to the system and a new level of complexity by the usage of other language platforms and also doesn't follows your models evolution.Then I have my brain working on how to deal with analytics and reporting tasks inside django, beign easy and powerfull as django itself; then, afther the brainwork I've started working in a prototype with the ability to dynamically configure which fields of a model I want to include in a report with a table layout and then generate a html view (all the matching rows) and downloadable pdf, csv and xls files.I’m really impressed (again) of the amazing power of django handling any type of project because the current prototype is working as expected and can be extended in any imaginable way requiring only time to code.I’m currently working part-time and thinking about to accept another job or start working on this exciting project developing an MVP or a complete solution depending on the archived goals.In other words and to be clear, you would be hiring me by my experience in django and business application development to work day to day designing and developing a pluggable and open source software solution to extend your existing and future django applications with amazing analytics and reporting features bringing a layer of business intelligence with less effort.GoalsI have defined a series of sequential goals I expect to achieve in order to get the next kickass analytics and reporting engine based on django.1. $ 1,000.00 - From prototype to MVPAt this point I’ll be able to create a stable MVP with the basic reporting features as an starting point to get the desired solution. Some of the features at this point.
Standard django theme layout
Dynamic field selection
Field formatting
Page layout & style (basic)
Export

html preview
downloadable pdf, csv and xls files

Save reports as templates (to reuse later)
Permissions
2. $ 5,000.00 - Layout and templates
Customize the page layout
Complex row layouts

Not just simple table cells
Images
Subreports

Customize page sections

Page Header
Report header
Groups
Content (rows)
Report footer
Page footer

Report modes

Lists
Master / detail

3. $ 7,000.00 - Extensible APILets build a robust API who allows us to extend the functionality or restrict the access to report templates, models and fields by:
Setting custom rules (like in django admin for queryset, formfield_for_*, get_list_display, etc…)
Adding formatters
Creating custom fields (based on sql queries)
And playing with a full set of options
4. $ 10,000.00 - Aggregation & MeasuresDo you like how the aggregation and measures implementations on OLAP cubes?... I do!.And the great news is: this can also be added.Lets think when an Officer wants to know the total sales by product family from your retail system and then selects the field “Product family” and the measure “Sales amount”, getting the total of sales for each product family; then wants to go a little deeper by adding the city of the store willing to get the total of sales for each product family in each one of the cities they have stores.And this can go more deeper?... Of course!5. $ 12,500.00 - DrilldownHave you tried pivot tables on common spreadsheets?... Think in a web version of the sample report of the sales amount. You have selected a column for the field “country“ and another for the measure “Sales amount”. This reports shows a summary of all the countries with their respectives sales amount.Well, the country is a geographic place divided in smallest regions, and those regions in more smallest regions, etc.; If add the ability to group any type of structure within the system then can automate the deepening walk by allowing the user to expand the top levels to get their childs with no limit on the levels of deep.6. $ 15,000.00 - ChartsWhat about a analytics and reporting framework without graphics and charts?It is possible to automate the charts generation by adding some intelligence in the manipulation of fields and measures of the reports, for example, taking the previous example (again), if have the field country and the measure sales amount, then can easily create a bar or pie chart, or a lineal chart by using the date instead of country and any type of combination.To do this It’s possible to reuse the top chart libraries out there like Highcharts, sparklines, flotcharts, xcharts, or any other in the near future.do you want charts?7. $ 18,000.00 - Widgets & DashboardsThink in the possibility to take a report template with a chart layout and wants to embed in real time on a private portal, smart tv, tablet, smartphone or a public blog or website?.. also to be able to group those widgets in a dashboard (with no limit on number of dashboards) granting granular permissions to widgets or the full dashboard.Officers will love!8. $ 21,000.00 - Celery integrationWants to go async and distributed?... I like celery!.Using Celery + djcelery (with any broker) this becomes an enterprise grade application capable to attend a high number of concurrent connections and processing a huge amount of data balancing the jobs between various servers. Lets add this capability to the project.9. $ 25,000.00 - OLAP-like layerAt this point there are in consideration some key features of an OLAP implementation, as:
Measures of data
Aggregation
Grouping levels of structures
Drill Down
Why not to extend this by adding the ability to setup custom dimensions and to design multidimensional cubes by grouping your models and database views?.10. Over Funds - take the best, to make it amazingly better.As you may know, this platform allow the overfunding of a project, then I want to tell you that if the campaigns get at this point then all the exceeding money would be used in this same project, being allowed to:
Add more functionality (as were suggested)
Improve and optimize all the previous described features.
Create custom extensions for existing django packages.
Hire another developer(s) to reduce the time
Talk on conferences about the project
Create video tutorials about the project
Anything else that makes the project better

About meI'm a Software Engineer from Guatemala specialized in business applications.I've beign developing web applications from the last 9 years and the last 6 developing business web applications based on the django framework.I like the doing thigs in the "django way", thinking in modularity and extensibility of the projects I've involved.I also passionated doing business analytics implementations on business web applications and it will be very exciting to work developing the next kickass business analytics platform based on django.Spread the wordIf you can't contribute with “coins”, share this campaign with your friends by mail and social networks because someone of your friends or their friends may be interested to contribute.QuestionsAsk anything you need to know, I'll be pleased to discuss with you.

story:
We take our water for granted. We open our taps and clean, drinkable water comes out.

And then we use water purifiers  and boil water our water to make it even cleaner. But on the other side of the world, a child will have died from water-related diseases by the time you read this. And we can do something about this.

Mobile game with a social cause

We are raising awareness on and alleviating the global water scarcity issue through Aquarion, a fun and innovative mobile game with a social cause. Here's how it works: You play as a UN ambassador, tasked with tackling the problem of water scarcity. Throughout the game, you get to hear real stories and statistics about real people, and you have the power to make changes affecting millions.

In short, our game teaches players more about the global water scarcity issue, and we are partnering World Vision so profits can be used to fund sustainable water projects in third-world countries.

Time is ticking and change is on the way in the form of a game on your smartphone. Aquarion. Your game, your choice.

story:
Why this pen?

The pen is an object that has changed a lot over time. The invention of the ballpoint pen nearly a century ago revolutionized the way we used them, making most of the Sergeant Major fountain pens or nibs that were considered too expensive, less reliable and requiring too much maintenance disappear. Despite all its advantages, a ballpoint pen does not have the smoothness or writing quality of its predecessors. The pen has lost its soul: instead of being our companion, it is an object that we throw away after having emptied its ink. At Olun we are lovers of progress, but we are also looking for elegance and that is why we designed the Pen One. It works with roller cartridges that you can change easily and that contain less viscous ink, allowing you to saturate the paper like a fountain pen while keeping the simplicity of a ball. It is a jewel with a modern style, pure and made with noble materials to resist time.

 

Design

"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication" Leonardo da Vinci

In the 6th millennium B.C., our ancestors began to use clay tablets. Almost 7000 years later, Steve Jobs revolutionized the way we work by returning to this simple medium and bringing it to life through technology. We believe that simplicity is the most beautiful way to design something and it is this spirit that we wanted to share with the Pen One: elementary shapes enhanced by the colors of titanium. This pen is thin, like a simple pencil.

 

Titanium

Titanium is a very light metal, particularly strong, insensitive to magnetism and resistant to corrosion and heat. It was first used in combat aircraft, missiles and rocket engines. We have chosen this material to make this pen an object you can trust. In its natural state titanium is white but to achieve the elegance we wanted, we also used a black treatment directly in the metal, so you will never have problems with a paint that gets damaged ...because there is none.

 

Founder edition

To commemorate the launch of the pen, we have chosen to create a limited edition variant. This variant will be made of black titanium only and only 10 copies will be created. Each copy will bear its number in Roman numerals, laser engraved. Thus each pen will be unique and when each unit will have been sold, it will never be possible to buy it again.

 

Why crowdfunding?

Behind Olun there are two old friends: Maxime and Thomas. During a discussion we were thinking about a gift we could give each other to celebrate the success of one of our projects. Maxime's pen was empty so we decided to see if there were some nice premium pens that we could keep all our life to remember this moment. Unfortunately we didn't find what we were looking for, so we decided to create it ourselves. We wanted a pen with a modern design but keeping its soul of yesteryear. The technical challenge being more complicated than we thought, we almost gave up several times but finally we had an idea. Maybe we are not the only ones who want to write without compromise, to believe in something that lasts. By supporting this project you will allow this dissident pen, out of time and out of the system, to exist.

Risks & Challenges

We don't have a prototype yet. A part of the funding from this campaign will be used to pay for the prototypes so we can improve and fix them if this is needed before releasing the final version. The machining plans are already ready and the main challenge is now to reach the objective of 1950€ in order to start production. If we don't reach it, all contributors will get their money back.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

To help us you don't have to pay a single cent, a simple sharing of the campaign with your friends or on your social networks would already be very useful, use the Indiegogo share tools!

JOIN US ON DISCORD: discord.olun.studio

story:
Now you can charge up

and stay organized with Suitcase Computer.

 

 

 

 

 

We need to meet our goal to bring Suitcase Computer to market. Period.

 

We need $740,000, but will make it for $300,000.

The money goes entirely in the purchase of components and assembly to manufacturing the product. For this product to cost this price we have to manufacture at least 1000 units, to sell them at listed prices above. If we manufacture fewer than 1000 units, the price of the product goes way up. This is because the Suitcase Computer we want to make has several top of the line components.

If we don’t make our goal...

Everyone gets their money back.

If we make $4 million+

we can manufacture a wide array of colors.

 

Suitcase Computer is an internationally patented design with trademark.

story:
Intro

A few years ago I worked at Ogilvy and in my free time, I created a notebook for my own ideas. It also helped me to become a one of the best creators on eYeka (I very recommend this website to every junior in the advertising. It helps you to create a good portfolio and you can learn a lot of stuff here). 

A lot of people liked my handmade Creative Journal and now I have decided to give an opportunity to own this notebook. Everyone deserves to have clear and simple brief for making ideas and be the best. 


Creative Journal

There are a lot of briefs in an advertising industry. Creatives have to know many things about new campaign for a brand. What is a product, task, budget and deadline... I have worked for many advertising agencies and after five years I decided to share this Creative Journal. It is a beautiful tool for creating advertising campaigns, because you have a brief and space for your ideas in one place.

Inspiration journal

There is also another version of the notebook. Only for your inspiration. On the Cannes Lions festival of Creativity I met many people writing notes about the awarded campaigns. And I did the same. That is why I made Inspiration Journal with the pages only for an inspiration. Next time when you will go on the advertising festival. You should take this with you!

Details: 

Size: 5 x 8 in (13 x 20 cm) 
Pages: 198 
Cover: Softcover - the finish is gloss, and there are no flaps. 
Paper: Cream uncoated (80 GSM)

Click here for Hi-res photos! 

Who am I? 
My name is Jan Marcinek and I’m a copywriter. I finished Bachelor of Arts at the Film Academy of Miroslav Ondricek in Pisek (Screenwriting and Directing) and I was also a student of Young Creative Academy in Cannes. 

I'm also dedicated to spreading the young talent of the advertising industry. I work as digital media specialist for Young Lions Czech Republic since 2010, where we aim to inspire, educate and grow the fresh blood that the advertising industry is built on.

Risk & Challenges: 

Fulfillment will be a biggest challenge because I don't know how many units to ship or where to ship them until the Indiegogo campaign is over. But printer is ready and I think that post office will also do their best. :) I will so my best to get rewards to backers as soon as possible, because I would like to be ready for the coming Cannes Lions festival of Creativity.

story:
KardseBook

The Most Affordable Compact 2-in-1 Pc

Meet KardseBook, it is very compact 2 in 1 PC that is very powerful and affordable. Made for professionals, Student, Home use, Creator. Whatever you do, let next-generation Kardse Complete your all requirements.

Featuring the 6 Generation Intel Core processor and all-day battery life, help you take your ideas to another level. Wherever you do, Kardse makes it easy to work and play virtually anywhere, with laptop-to-tablet versatility that adapts to you.

What is Kardse

          

 Best 2 in 1 Tablet Laptop

                             

Better Typing with Kardse Keyboard

           

 

Slim and Stylish

Easy to Carry, Fits Everywhere Design That Suits You

  10 Points Multi-touch Screen

Dimensions and Connectivity

    Camera to Conduct HD video calls

Another advantage is that thanks to excellent thermal characteristics, there is no need for cooling fans, thus providing completely silent operation.

Three Different color

                                    SPEED DUAL BAND

 

Rapid Operations & Mass Storage

Embedded with 512GB SSD storage and dual-channel 16GB LPDDR3 high-speed RAM, Plus thanks to the dual channels, memory bandwidth is doubled so that you can enjoy faster performance than a single-channel memory notebook. Kardse provides you Hd audio jack with USB type C with the dual speaker.

BEST SSD SPEED

 Long-lasting All-day Battery

Kardse Active lifestyles require plenty of power. Power-hungry full-size laptops often cannot get you through the day, but Kardse battery has sufficient capacity to power your fun and games for up to 10 hours.

Best Resolution and Aspect Ratio

Compact Magnetic Keyboard: Simple & Comfortable

We designed the magnetic keyboard, and a maximized the touchpad for you so that you can enjoy accurate typing and ultimate comfort through the tip of your fingers. Made for Kardse, our next-generation Type Cover feels and performs like a traditional laptop keyboard, with optimal key spacing for fast and fluid typing, and an enlarged glass trackpad for precision control.

Best for office use


Stylus: An Amazing pen

Kardse Stylus uses 2048 Levels of Pressure Sensitivity. It provides high sensitivity and precise writing & graphic arts control. It is the perfect addition when pin-point accuracy is required for high-level tasks, graphic design, and art.

Product comparison

 

About the Company

kardse was founded in 2014 by Amit Ksana and Ved Punia which is based in India and China. Kardse has been dealing with computer components and hardware for a long time. Kardse specializes in development and hardware research. The company goal is to understand the user requirements and meet the expectations of the user to provide them a better experience with the latest technology. Kardse is a team of hardworking designers, engineers, and developers. If you have any questions regarding the campaign you can contact at info@kardse.com

Team

 

FAQ's

Q: Does Kardse provide Shipping?

A: Yes, Kardse will be providing worldwide free shipping to all over the world who pre-order through the Crowdfunding campaign.

Q: What is the warranty period of Kardse Book?

A: kardse Book will be provided with 1 year of Warranty. You can directly contact the support if you have any issue and we will replace the kardseBook.

Q: Is there any alternative operating system can be used in kardseBook?

A: Yes, you can use Linux based OS in the KardseBook. We have tested KArdsebook with Ubuntu which works Flawlessly.

Q: What If KardseBook Does not raise the targeted amount?

A: We are pretty sure we will achieve our target. We are going for fixed funding if Kardse does not reach the target funding, The amount will automatically be reversed to the BackersBy Indiegogo.

Q: What Other Color choices we can get?

A: Currently We have given three color option to choose from. RED, GREY, and BLUE. It is possible to introduce new colors. if everything going according to plan.

Q: What are the contact onformation?

A: You can contact directly on info@Kardse.com If you have any questions.

story:
The creator

The developer and maintainer of the project is Radostin Cholakov - 7th grader from Bulgaria involved in programming. He, actually has a ton of experience despite the age of 13 and has been awarded by multiple companies and organizations, including Google and Axosoft. More about Radi:

TV and newspaper appearances.

Another software projects created and maintained by him:

List of almost all projects: http://bit.ly/30xkAvq

Open source projects: https://github.com/radi-cho

"Gravity Flight Space Adventure" - a game by Radostin

I was firstly involved in programming when I was ~9 years old. I saw "the magic" my aunt and her husband were doing (software engineers). They were writing "text" and getting a beautiful and powerful websites and apps as a result. That was unbelievable for me back then. Day over day I was searching Google and Youtube for tutorials on different programming topics. Over time evolved.. Now I can safely describe myself as experienced web and mobile "developer".

I've worked with various web technologies based around JavaScript, back-end solutions, mobile development with Java and Kotlin, cross-platform development with Flutter and React Native, game development with Unity and C# and machine learning with Python.

- Radostin Cholakov

The project

There are multiple applications for digital well-being, health, exercise, goals & statistics already in the store. They, however are somewhat too specialized, some are hard to use, and others lack important features. The idea behind Project Chocolate  is the ability of getting powerful insights of what you're doing but with simple to use and beautiful UI. To better understand what actually a user will be able to do with the app let me tell about some use cases:

Encouraging

Let's say you wanna complete a book for 2 weeks. You can just read it and not deal with any apps ;), but in case you decide to do you will be able to create your custom template, enter the amount of pages and the time you wanna complete the book. Then everyday after you read you can log how much you've read, with 2-3 clicks (open app -> enter quantity -> click 'record data'). That's it. The data which is collected over time shows you if you read more or less than you should. It will remind you with notifications if you want when necessary. You can skip the book today because someone invited you to a party, but tomorrow you will read twice as much, right?

You will be able to set minimum value. For example - minimum of 40 pages per day. But yesterday you've read 90 so it won't be "fatal" if you skip today ;)

As mentioned above you can do it with 3 clicks, but if you wanna more detailed insights you can get them! The app will include feature called 'Record Types' so you can log not only how many pages you've read but also how much time it took you. Today you've read 30 pages for 30 minutes, tomorrow 35 pages for 50 mins.. You can track your speed over time with beautifully designed diagrams and the app will calculate everything you may possibly wanna track - your average speed, the days you read the most, which book is more boring :) , ect.

Limiting

Now you wanna limit how much time you're spending on your phone, computer and other devices. You will be able to set maximum value - 3 hours a day, for example. The app will include built-in timer. You can let it run while you're playing Fortnite and it will remind you when to stop. If your average time is more than the average maximum we will send you some recommendations on what to do. :)

Tracking progress

You work on a important project - let's see how you're doing. Log how much time you've spent on different tasks, how much money it cost, ect.

Templates

As you see you can use one app for vastly different approaches. That will be possible with custom Topic Templates. Let's say you wanna eat less chocolate. You can log how many grams you've eaten or how many calories consumed, but for simplicity you can add Record Types (as mentioned above) to your template. You frequently eat Snickers. Create a record type for how much grams and calories a Snickers has once and then every time you want to log a Snickers consumption you can just do it with 2 clicks without need to include the quantity of all the units you may possibly wanna keep track of. Over time you create record types for all kinds of deserts. But a friend of yours wanna do the same? Do not worry! You can share your templates with friends so they do not need to recreate all the record types or enter unnecessary template details.

How the campaign funds will be used

The funding from this campaign will be used for:

Developing the overall project;

Building iOS version and distributing it. If the campaign is not successful only Android app is coming.

Financing the project so no ads will exist in the app.

Early Access Program

Every backer will be eligible for early access program so you can watch the process of development on your own device. Any feedback and recommendations are appreciated. More info in the perks section.

The technology

The app will be supported for both Android and iOS with Google's Flutter framework. The user data will be stored in Firebase Firestore and the user insights will be generated algorithmically in Google Cloud Functions and Compute Engine.
story_txt:
The creator
The developer and maintainer of the project is Radostin Cholakov - 7th grader from Bulgaria involved in programming. He, actually has a ton of experience despite the age of 13 and has been awarded by multiple companies and organizations, including Google and Axosoft. More about Radi:
TV and newspaper appearances.
Another software projects created and maintained by him:
List of almost all projects: http://bit.ly/30xkAvq
Open source projects: https://github.com/radi-cho
"Gravity Flight Space Adventure" - a game by Radostin
I was firstly involved in programming when I was ~9 years old. I saw "the magic" my aunt and her husband were doing (software engineers). They were writing "text" and getting a beautiful and powerful websites and apps as a result. That was unbelievable for me back then. Day over day I was searching Google and Youtube for tutorials on different programming topics. Over time evolved.. Now I can safely describe myself as experienced web and mobile "developer".
I've worked with various web technologies based around JavaScript, back-end solutions, mobile development with Java and Kotlin, cross-platform development with Flutter and React Native, game development with Unity and C# and machine learning with Python.
- Radostin Cholakov
The project
There are multiple applications for digital well-being, health, exercise, goals & statistics already in the store. They, however are somewhat too specialized, some are hard to use, and others lack important features. The idea behind Project Chocolate  is the ability of getting powerful insights of what you're doing but with simple to use and beautiful UI. To better understand what actually a user will be able to do with the app let me tell about some use cases:
Encouraging

You can just read it and not deal with any apps ;), but in case you decide to do you will be able to create your custom template, enter the amount of pages and the time you wanna complete the book. story:
Short Summary:

My name is Frank and I'm a masters student at the University of Ottawa. Throughout my studies I've always looked for an ideal solution for taking notes in classes, doodling or just brainstorming different ideas. I loved using pencil because it was erasable but it didn't offer me a visually attractive medium to publish great ideas. I also hated wasting tons of paper when scribbling down temporary notes. Whiteboards were one solution because I could swiftly scribble down colorful diagrams and solve different problems, but they aren`t exactly portable enough to carry everywhere I go.  Thus, I helped design the wipebook ; an erasable notebook that combines the best of both worlds. Unfortunately, wipebooks are really expensive to make in small quantities so I’m hoping to raise enough money to sell them at a reasonable price so others can benefit from them as well. Wipebooks are also reusable, so we could all stop wasting tons of paper! Think about it, it could be the last notebook you ever buy.

 

CHECK OUT OUR SWEET WIPEBOOK HARLEM SHAKE VIDEO

 

Comic of the day:

Everyday of our campaign we will be uploading humourous comic of the day, detailling our trials and tribulations. We figure if we fail, atleast we will have a hilarious documentation of the entire adventure.

All comics are drawn from the wipebook itself!

What We Need & What You Get:

What we need are preorders, lot's of em! Why? because the price per unit get’s much more reasonable as we get a larger order. By ordering a wipebook, you’ll receive a wipebook kit that includes the book and the erasable pen! Pretty straight forward right?

The Impact:

By ordering the the wipebook, not only will you be helping us develop the product even further ,you’ll also be helping the world become less dependant on paper! Isn’t that pretty awesome.

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you know friends who are designers, students or anyone in general that loves using whiteboards for idea generation, tell them about the wipebook! If you want to be part of the wipebook team, or you think you could provide us with some valuable help just contact us at any time.

story:
Love to Create but Hate to Clean up?

 

Define Territory & Cage-In the Mess

For the creative mind, making a mess is a part of the creative process.  If you are like us - Wanting to maintain a clean and clear zone to keep our creativity flowing, but have a difficult time doing so - you will enjoy the Mess-Free Hobby Board.

 

What set it apart?

Patent Pending Silicone Edge Makes the difference!

Blocks the Chaos and gives peaceful creative space to work.

 

Soft, Comfortable, and Flexible

 

 EZ Cleaning Encourages Kid's Responsibility

Bendable Board so we can Clear our Territory Easily

 

It is designed to cage the mess within the bendable board so you can quickly and easily clear the space. It also encourages kid's responsibility by showing them how easy it is to stay organized and clean up after themselves after their fun activities.

 

What can you do with the Cut & Clear Hobby Board?

Great to keep little pieces used by little hands in one place!

 

Perfect for the hobbyist who needs to keep projects organized and easy to move without losing anything!

 

From Scrapbooking to masterworks of art, the Cut and Clear Hobby Board keeps everything contained.

 

The board is stiff enough to even be used on your lap as a portable work surface while the Flex-Edge prevents pens and laptops from Rolling or sliding off!

 

Problems Solved! 

Make life easier by solving everyday problems like:

Avoid Dangerous Surprises!

 

 

Product Spec:

Shape like a tray to retain all scraps inside the board and keeping the rest of the area clear.

 

 Size:  A3 (450x300mm) or (18x12 inches)

Shape: Rectangular

Materials included: Silicon edge, Hobby Board,  and Adhesive 

 

Silicone edge:

The 1.5-meter-long silicone edge wraps around the entire Cut & Clear Hobby Board and is locked in place with an adhesive ridge.  However, you can conveniently pop it out when you need to switch from the Centimeter Scale side to the Inch Scale side.

The non-slip feature on this Flex-Edge will keep the Cut & Clear Hobby Board stable and prevent moving while you work on it.

 

The product is shipped pre-assembled. It is made with an A3 size Self-Healing Hobby Board.  The secret is the patent-pending silicone edge.  It is durable, soft, and flexible to allow freedom of movement and use, yet it is strong enough to keep the mess in.

Help us bring this product to life so we can Cage the Mess, Free Creativity, and Enjoy a tidy life.

 

The Why?

We start the PlayPopper journey from being in lockdown (due to COVID-19) and trying to have more at-home fun activities.  The board was created to keep family members busy in their own creating space while being mindful of others - helping keep the rest of the house clean.  So, everyone can stay sane spending more time at home together. We are certain it will surely make life...better.

 

Our Experience:

This is our 2nd campaign on Kickstarter. Our first campaign was the Aspen Tyke Traveler Smart Diaper Bag. We successfully raise funds and delivered the products. It was amazing the get the message from the backers informing that the products arrive just in time for the Holliday. Also, it's exciting to hear feedback from our backers. We always listen to you and continuously learn, improve, and move forward.

 

Testimonials: 

From our previous Crowdfunding Campaign, we were so excited to receive these testimonials from our backers.

 

 

 

 

 

A Big Thanks:

We could not have come this far without supports from our community.  Please give a BIG ROUND OF APPLAUSE to the following organizations:

Red Worldwide, TECH Fort Worth, TMAC, Lighthouse for the Blind of Fort Worth, Fort Worth Chamber of Commerce, and UT Arlington College of Business.

 

#messfree, #cuttingboard, #hobby, #tidy, #craftboard, #safety, #techfw, #why, #thewhy, #cut, #cutclear, #cutandclear, #cut&clear

story:
Short Summary

My wife and I live in Kansas. We operate an agricultural retail business serving Kansas, Missouri, and parts of Nebraska. The largest employer in our county is the school district and the county government. It is our goal to become the largest nongovernment employer in the county, we want to give back to the area that raised my family. 
 

With the skills and talents that God gave us, he put us to work serving people, and in our area it is farmers. We are wanting to raise funds to develop an app that helps connect food producers to consumers. The app will provide a secure online portal to purchase food for pick up or direct ship. Essentially a virtual farmers market. This will create 4 jobs.
 

Second we are raising  funds to purchase a local farm elevator that is going out of business and purchase farm fertilizer and application equipment. This will create 10 new jobs.
 

Finally, we are raising money to build a local butcher shop with meat counter for Kansas City suburbs and bedroom communities.  This will create  10 new jobs. 
 

We are asking for your help to rebuild our community post COVID-19, please join us. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $4 million in funding,  this amount will allow us to hire 2 app developers to create the app.  In addition to the app, we would be purchasing a local grain elevator that is going out of business and building a butcher shop with a meat counter to help local communities have a location that is sanitary for processing locally sourced meat.   The grain elevator purchase will require some updates of grain handling systems and storage.  Finally, will be building a fertilizer and farm chemical application hub.   All together, the new business venture would add 20-25 jobs to our local communities.  

The Impact

Since the corona virus affected local food markets. Demand is very high from locally sourced food, that is healthy.   In addition growing business is the key to any successful community. If businesses make wise investments they can better serve communities and help improve the lives of many.  Please join us in building our community. 

Risks & Challenges

Our only risk is not helping farms succeed, please help save the local small farms and rural communities. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share the word.

story:
There is an old story ... when a person had something difficult to say, they would find a hole in a tree and share their secret; the tree would keep their secret forever ...

Do you find that it’s difficult to communicate with others? Are you shy? Do you spend a lot of time on social networks, but find it hard to connect and communicate with yourself? 

Whisper Pillow is a playful pillow. Push the right button and speak into Whisper Pillow to record your voice with a message up to 90 seconds.

Push the left button and listen to the recording. Every time you input your voice, the last recording will be deleted.

The unique design allows you to record a message and have privacy even in public spaces.  Do you want to record a feeling or thought for yourself? Do you want to record a message for someone you’re in a close relationship with, like a partner, friend, sister, parent? Speaking into your phone is cold and sterile, but the Whisper Pillow is fun and comforting. Whisper Pillow allows you to be interactive with yourself anywhere you are, at any time.

   

Whisper Pillow is a fresh experience to try!

story:
Short Summary

Nutshell Planner is inspired by an artist's sketchbook, and is the only planner with a full dot-grid page on every weekly and monthly spread. It's a one stop shop for note-taking, list-making, sketching, memory keeping, and all your daily plans. It's so handy, you'll want to take it everywhere, so I designed it in a convenient size and it weighs less than a pound.

Each two-page spread has a 5mm dot grid on the left side, and a simple planning space on the right. It's designed by me (an Army Veteran) and made in the USA by a family-owned print shop in my home town. It's available with a basic black or crystal clear coil.

Planner Specifications:
Cover: Natural Chipboard, 7 x 8" 
Pages: Bright White, 70lb. text, 6.5 x 8" 
Professionally Tabbed
Coil: PVC in Crystal Clear or Basic Black
12 months: January-December, 2018
Weight: 15 oz
164 pages

75 planners are ready to ship.
