story:
Short Summary

  • Make everyday a rewarding experience for customers.
  • An easy to use loyalty rewards platform for businesses to connect with their customers.
  • Give business owners the ability to reward their loyal customers with an effective mobile app.
  • The app is now available for iOS and Andriod - QR Scanner Rewards (Click to download)

 

Video on why users love it....

 

The Impact

So what's so different about this app versus other loyalty apps in the market? 

The good news is, there are huge differences. Firstly, the app works like your generic QR Scanner App, that scans any QR Code to open websites or save vCard contact details directly into your phone. Hence the app has the basic features that millions of people already use...



For Users - We also provide you with the ability to get any of your favourite merchants that you patronize to create their very own customized loyalty rewards app for FREE. (Yup, now you can get any merchant to start giving loyalty rewards, cos its that simple to get started)
We are talking about the merchants who don't have big brand names, like the shops around the corner of your street. 
 

 

Why are we helping small business owners?

For Business Owners - We understand the plight of the small retail merchants who are competing with big brand names and online platforms. Also from the feedback gathered from the ground, most merchants would love to have this app if it's made available. Well, we would love to announce that now it is made available at an afforable price.

 

Video on why merchants should use it....

 

For Merchants, with just a $10 monthly fee after seeing the benefits of the app, the app will help gain more awareness by get their business listed in the app which will be viewed by users of the same app. This way, potential customers will be able to find such merchants when they search for nearby merchants within the app. The nearby feature shows the merchants location and distance to users. This helps to keep everything relevant for both merchants and users.

 

All merchants have access to their dashboards which lets them set rewards, view the stamps and rewards awarded and lets them push promotions or birthday discount notifications to their customers.

 


Merchant Backend - Dashboard

 

There are also more rewards from us.

Another good news is that, we are also incorporating our very own rewards system within the app that issues our very own 'COINS' that can be used for redemption of ConnectUpz rewards and more.

Earning Coins is as simple as referring other friends to download the app. In the future, we will be adding more ways to earns coins.


Now to make this successful, it is truly in your hands as a User or Merchant. We are looking to on-board as many merchants from as many countries as possible so that users are able to find a ready list of merchants within the app. 

As for users, by Paying It Forward, you get to enjoy getting rewards for simply doing the things you already do everyday. You also will be able to Earn Coins for inviting other users to download this app for both iOS & Android. Most importantly, you will be helping to start the next Retail Revolution.

 

Video on the Retail Revolution

 

Pricing & Plan (For Merchants)

 

We have created the above merchant plans to suit different needs and each tier is reasonably priced, so that we grow with the merchant requirements.

To view a sample of the Merchant Website Business Page - Click Here


Risks & Challenges

There are no more Risks for this app, as we have already crossed the biggest hurdle of creating the app and launching it for iOS and Andriod on 1st Jan 2019. We are now working to onboard millions of users and as many merchants as possible within the next 6 months.


Other Ways You Can Help

We would love it, if you could support this project by sharing this campaign on your social media channels. Thank you for being an awesome person, from all of us at Connectupz!

Facebook page: https://facebook.com/connectupz
Twitter page: https://twitter.com/connectupz
Instagram page: https://instagram.com/connectupz
 

iOS App: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/qr-scanner-rewa...
Android App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...
Website: https://connectupz.com

story:
Esington Note among best inventions!

The Esington Note was named one of the "The best Kickstarter inventions for September" by MSN!

December 2014, we introduced the Esington Glass to the world.  Thanks to the Kickstarter community, we raised nearly $200,000 and more than 10,000 glasses have been distributed around the world! 

We're now proud to introduce our 2nd product, The Esington Note.

"WOW! All of a sudden all other notebooks seem pretty useless." --Gareth H.

 

 

"I like the notebook, it seems to be very high quality and would last a long time. The fold flat design really appeals to me since while in art school sketchbooks curving in towards the spine was always a major annoyance. I'm happy with my Esington Glass and very interested to see where this goes." --Arland W.

"The best part of this concept is that it keeps me in the present. This notebook will help me further minimize the clutter in my life and will organize my mind so I'm not constantly forgetting what I just thought during my hectic day. Chunk my time with the Esington Glass and now, have my own personal assistant at my fingertips. A very nice rendition of the more complex systems out there now. I'd back this project in a heartbeat. I'm there!" --Anna A.

You now have the coolest notebook in the room

Magnetic pen holder: The pen is perfectly positioned in the spine, magnetically held in place by a super-strong flat magnet.

Tear out pages: your current working space is always on top. Never waste time searching through the past.

True lay-flat design: There is no paper in the spine. There are two separate modules that lay completely flat. No regular notebook can claim a true lay-flat design.

Paper modules and refills: Each notebook comes with all 5 standard sized notepads FREE. You can pick up refills from the office supply store. We will also be offering refills on esington.com after the kickstarter campaign ends.

 A lifetime notebook

The Esington Note is stitched with the highest quality lifetime microfiber leather wrapped around a solid steel core. It's designed to last a lifetime. Paper modules can be refilled forever.

The Esington Note has a light, thin steel core wrapped in the highest quality microfiber leather.

About the contruction

The steel core production is very expensive and unusual for any notebook. The lining, stitching and prep work involved in creating a piece like this is only matched by one other manufacturer we know of (Mont Blanc).  You can see the outer quality in the pictures, but what you can't see is the work that goes into preparing the core.  It requires a special wood fiber wrap, special stitching and tight tolerances.  

We hired one of the best in the business to come up with the manufacturing process and design.  The result is the sturdiest, highest quality notebook you can buy anywhere at any price. 

About microfiber leather

The leather used in the Esington Note is "microfiber leather".  It is a synthetic leather that is used in many high-end purses and wallets because it has superior qualities to animal leather.  It also generally costs more than genuine leather.

  • The look and feel are comparable to fine calfskin
  • Tear resistance, abrasion resistance, tensile strength, cold-resistance, water resistance, acid resistance, alkali resistance and fade resistance are all superior to most animals leathers.
  • made from tosea-island nano-fine fiber bundles and top grade polyurethane resins.
  • Vegan
  • Eco friendly
  • Lasts a lifetime (or more)

Why a regular notebook slows you down

“It is only when the mind is free from the old that it meets everything anew, and in that there is joy.” ― Jiddu Krishnamurti

The Esington Note features tear-out pages. As soon as you finish with one page, simply tear it out and now you have a pristine, unmarked notebook.

The Note is designed to keep you in the present moment . To keep you mindful of what's important now. A regular notebook chains you to the chaos of your disorganized, cluttered past. Break through with a perpetually neat and clean Esington Note.

Have important thoughts you need to keep? You don't want to clutter up your notebook, just file the tear-out pages or digitally archive it.

You have 70,000 thoughts every single day

How many of them are brilliant ideas that are slipping away? How many times have you thought "I'll write that down later" or "I'd better not forget that!"? The fact it, we've trained ourselves to simply let these thoughts pass by; to be forgotten forever.

It's too hard to get ideas out of your head.

If you try to use your phone, you have to unlock your phone, find an app, chose the type of input, then tap away at the screen. Every thinking step you take changes your thought - sometimes to the point you can completely forget it!

If you have a notebook, you have to look for a pen. Even if you have a pen with you, you have to fish for it, unbuckle it, orient it in your hand. Then you have to fumble through the notebook to find the right page! That's a lot of thinking steps to go through just to jot down a quick thought. Many times we just try keeping the thought in our head. This robs us of valuable energy and by the end of the day we're exhausted.

Idea creation and writing habits

The more you use the Esington Note, the better you'll become at idea generation.  You are training your brain to put ideas into this world instead of letting them slip by or holding them in your head.  After using it for a couple of weeks, you'll notice a huge increase in the number of ideas that you are constantly generating. Your brain literally rewires itself and you will become an idea machine.

You'll also get into the habit of writing.  If you've ever wanted to be a better writer or reader, this is the perfect first step.  The hardest part is getting started.  The Esington Note makes it as easy!

The Journey

5 Generations of the Esington Note

While I was immersed in the Esington Glass project, I found myself having spontaneous thoughts I really wanted to keep.  Sometimes I would try to hold the thought until I could type it out on my phone or computer, but I soon realized that holding thoughts like this is a great way to kill your creativity and zap your energy.  

Soon I found myself carrying around a small note pad, but half time time I didn't have a pen with me.  I awkwardly stuck a pencil into the spiral notebook.  After drawing blood while trying to fish my pencil out of the spiral, I realized I needed to invent something new.

I fashioned an early prototype of the Note with a modified (cardboard core) notebook and small magnets.  It worked pretty well, but fell apart after about a week of use.  I knew that having a reliable notepad around was critical, and I wanted one I could use forever.  I began the search for a leatherworker with experience doing this sort of thing.  I found one of the leaders in leatherwork manufacturing and we went back and forth with design choices for more than three months.  

After three more months of testing this final design, I believe it's ready for production. I couldn't be happier with how the Esington Note turned out. I take it everywhere I go. I'm 10x more creative and energetic than I was without it.

Paper modules can be refilled forever.The Esington Note has a light, thin steel core wrapped in the highest quality microfiber leather.About the contructionThe steel core production is very expensive and unusual for any notebook. The lining, stitching and prep work involved in creating a piece like this is only matched by one other manufacturer we know of (Mont Blanc).  You can see the outer quality in the pictures, but what you can't see is the work that goes into preparing the core.  It requires a special wood fiber wrap, special stitching and tight tolerances.  We hired one of the best in the business to come up with the manufacturing process and design.  The result is the sturdiest, highest quality notebook you can buy anywhere at any price. About microfiber leatherThe leather used in the Esington Note is "microfiber leather".  It is a synthetic leather that is used in many high-end purses and wallets because it has superior qualities to animal leather.  It also generally costs more than genuine leather.
The look and feel are comparable to fine calfskin
Tear resistance, abrasion resistance, tensile strength, cold-resistance, water resistance, acid resistance, alkali resistance and fade resistance are all superior to most animals leathers.
made from tosea-island nano-fine fiber bundles and top grade polyurethane resins.
Vegan
Eco friendly
Lasts a lifetime (or more)
Why a regular notebook slows you down“It is only when the mind is free from the old that it meets everything anew, and in that there is joy.” ― Jiddu KrishnamurtiThe Esington Note features tear-out pages. As soon as you finish with one page, simply tear it out and now you have a pristine, unmarked notebook.The Note is designed to keep you in the present moment . To keep you mindful of what's important now. A regular notebook chains you to the chaos of your disorganized, cluttered past. Break through with a perpetually neat and clean Esington Note.Have important thoughts you need to keep? You don't want to clutter up your notebook, just file the tear-out pages or digitally archive it.You have 70,000 thoughts every single dayHow many of them are brilliant ideas that are slipping away? How many times have you thought "I'll write that down later" or "I'd better not forget that!"? The fact it, we've trained ourselves to simply let these thoughts pass by; to be forgotten forever.It's too hard to get ideas out of your head.If you try to use your phone, you have to unlock your phone, find an app, chose the type of input, then tap away at the screen. Every thinking step you take changes your thought - sometimes to the point you can completely forget it!If you have a notebook, you have to look for a pen. Even if you have a pen with you, you have to fish for it, unbuckle it, orient it in your hand. Then you have to fumble through the notebook to find the right page! That's a lot of thinking steps to go through just to jot down a quick thought. Many times we just try keeping the thought in our head. This robs us of valuable energy and by the end of the day we're exhausted.Idea creation and writing habitsThe more you use the Esington Note, the better you'll become at idea generation.  You are training your brain to put ideas into this world instead of letting them slip by or holding them in your head.  After using it for a couple of weeks, you'll notice a huge increase in the number of ideas that you are constantly generating. Your brain literally rewires itself and you will become an idea machine.You'll also get into the habit of writing.  If you've ever wanted to be a better writer or reader, this is the perfect first step.  The hardest part is getting started.  The Esington Note makes it as easy!The Journey5 Generations of the Esington NoteWhile I was immersed in the Esington Glass project, I found myself having spontaneous thoughts I really wanted to keep.  Sometimes I would try to hold the thought until I could type it out on my phone or computer, but I soon realized that holding thoughts like this is a great way to kill your creativity and zap your energy.  Soon I found myself carrying around a small note pad, but half time time I didn't have a pen with me.  I awkwardly stuck a pencil into the spiral notebook.  After drawing blood while trying to fish my pencil out of the spiral, I realized I needed to invent something new.I fashioned an early prototype of the Note with a modified (cardboard core) notebook and small magnets.  It worked pretty well, but fell apart after about a week of use.  I knew that having a reliable notepad around was critical, and I wanted one I could use forever.  I began the search for a leatherworker with experience doing this sort of thing.  I found one of the leaders in leatherwork manufacturing and we went back and forth with design choices for more than three months.  After three more months of testing this final design, I believe it's ready for production. I couldn't be happier with how the Esington Note turned out. I take it everywhere I go. I'm 10x more creative and energetic than I was without it.

story:
What's color got to do with it?

Color is a magical design tool that can be used by every one to transform your world, and I want to share it with you.

Hi, I'm Denise Hopkins, owner of ImaginEco Design.  I am an architect from Grand Rapids, Michigan.  My mission is to improve your world through architecture, interiors, and landscapes inspired by my intense passion for nature, color, and modern design.  My next project is to seriously delve in to the power of color to enhance lives.  And I need your help.

                                              

I need to raise $4000 to contribute to the cost of an intense course in color and its use in architecture, interiors, and landscapes. So I'm turning to my strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, I'm offering stunning nature prints, color palettes for your home's interior or exterior, personal design consultations, all to improve your life through incredible, fabulous color! Your contributions will help me expand my knowledge of color and then share it with you and others to improve lives with simply beautiful color. 

Click to see my work:  http://www.imaginecodesign.com/


Colorful Rewards

  • Your contributions will supplement the cost of a 4-day course in architectural color, including the course cost, course supplies, airfare, and hotel expenses.
  • To thank you for your support and generosity, I'm offering nature prints that I've personally photographed, color palettes, and personal design consultations.

  • Enter to win or donate to receive a personal design consultation.  You'll receive a Design Plan of Action, shown below, with my recommendations for your space.

The Colorful Consequences

I've been fortunate to work with many clients whose lives I've changed through color.  I transformed this tropical condo simply by using a bold color palette.  Here's what my colorful client said, "Denise designed my condo from a just a shell to a beautiful, exciting, and wonderful place to live."  This wonderful client shared with me that she never thought she deserved to work with a design professional, and she was going to just paint every thing white.  The fact is that every one of us deserves to have a home and work place that makes us feel inspired or comforted or safe or invigorated.  Color can do that and that's what I want to give to each of you.


It's time to bring the most effective design tool, color, to you and the world!


This is a sample of the Up Close and Virtual perk you can receive!


Share the color love!

Thank you for visiting, learning about ImaginEco Design, and for your support on every level.  Pass it on to your colorful friends, join the discussion on facebook here https://www.facebook.com/ImaginEcoDesign, and share through Indiegogo.

THANK YOU FROM THE BOTTOM OF MY COLORFUL HEART!

Denise Hopkins

story:
Short Summary

TELEGRAM is a fast, secure multi-platform instant messenger which syncs your conversations across all your devices
TB10 - is a Native TELEGRAM app for BlackBerry 10 including compatibility for new layout of BlackBerry Passport, with keyboard shortcuts and attractive unique UI for BlackBerry10 devices.
Telegram is not available for BlackBerry 10 Devices and we believe many users want a native client for productivity and seamless integration with BlackBerry functionality.

Beta Phase Link

We encourage you to check out beta phase half backed app in the BlackBerry world with following link.
http://appworld.blackberry.com/webstore/content/59949612/?lang=en&countrycode=IN
What We Need & What You Get
We initially planned to sell updated TB10 on BlackBerry world but we couldn't estimate the user need for a NATIVE app. So we came up with crowd funding, we need your help to make a native app.
We will deliver you with a fully functional native app with regular updates then after.

The Impact

A fully functional native app will considerably change the way you message, so no matter how good an Android app is, it has a potential lag and mismatch with BlackBerry OS when ported.

Risks & Challenges

The reason why there is still no fully functional native app for BlackBerry has to do with Telegram API limitations, challenges and BlackBerry restrictions to HUB integration.
Telegram has quite challenging API which makes the development challenging given we have to satisfy BlackBerry with limitations on HUB integration.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are a small team but we aimed big and came up with a promise to deliver a fully functional native app, IF you are a BlackBerry user and want to see telegram on blackberry with native functionality you may want to spread the word for any BlackBerry user out there

More On TB10: Forum Link

http://forums.crackberry.com/blackberry-10-apps...

story:
This campaign has now shifted to urge donations to be made directly to the Drone Pilots Association.


We made the best effort we could, but momentum is not at a level that will bring this Indiegogo campaign to reach its goal by the deadline. You will receive a full refund after the campaign ends (if unsuccessful) and processing goes through. We urge you to donate directly to the DPA on their website at: http://dronepilotsassociation.com/donate-to-legal-fund/

Thank you for getting involved,
Mike Cairns

story:
Story

Due to the social distancing measures various learning institutions across the globe had to quickly shift towards online education. As a student myself I was having hard times organizing a bunch of links and notes on my computer. Thus, I came up with the idea of Zoomer. Zoomer is a platform that will keep all of your meetings / calls / online events organized. I was able to create a MVP which you can already use on zoomer.org.uk, however, in order to implement more functions this project needs some funding.

story:
Why Crowdfunding / Warum Crowd Funding

Dear friends, fans and supporters, first we would like to thank you for all your support and comments. A lot of you asked, why crowd funding on indiegogo! The reason is, that we would like to try to produce the BlackOut Titanium without any bank loan or other investors. We are dedicated to the product and we do not want to accept any changes concerning quality and functionality based on “financial arguments”.
So crowd funding seems to be a good solution. But be assured, the BlackOut Titanium will be there for all of us in future.
Your Michael and the MANE Tec Team

Liebe Freunde, Fans und Unterstützer, vorab möchten wir uns bei Euch für die vielen positiven Kommentare bedanken. Es gibt sehr oft die Frage, warum Crowdfunding. Der Grund dafür ist, dass wir das "BlackOut-Titanium" ohne Kredite herstellen wollen. Wir sind mit unserem Produkt derart verbunden und vertraut, dass wir eine Einflussnahme aus wirtschaftlichen Gründen bzgl. Qualität und Funktionalität, unbedingt vermeiden wollen. Darum ist Crowdfunding für uns die ideale Lösung, ...und glaubt mir, das BlackOut-Titanium wird es für uns Angler künftig auch sein.
Petri Heil wünscht Euch,
Euer Michael und das MANE-Team!

Für den deutschen Text bitte hier klicken

The ultimate - all in one - high tech - single hand - ANGLERS TOOL - the BlackOut Titanium

WHY all this in one headline? No, not because we are Germans, but because it is what it is.

You are a professional Angler: it took you one look and you knew this is a must-have!
You are not a professional Angler: this is what you need, to really get the fun and satisfaction in fishing.
It will stay with you for years! Made out of Titanium, Tungsten and high quality Aluminium. Therefore stainless and resistant to saltwater.

It is the utlimate tool made out of ultimate materials in an ultimate design.
Some keyfacts:

  • 5 functions in one tool
  • Blade made out of titanium
  • Saw and Scaler integrated in blade
  • Special shaped belly opener
  • Priest made out of tungsten
  • Scraper integrated in Priest
  • Middle body made out of high quality aluminium
  • Last but not least: unbelievable design


Our Fans - Our Supporters - Our Customers

Fishing is one of the most popular sports. Millions enjoy this exiting hobby.

So buy it now - support us now - and get more than 20% saving NOW.

Just imagine the fascinating amount of anglers world wide. And we believe, that the Blackout Titanium will fascinate many of these anglers, as already the feedback on our facebook page shows.


Your Support

The Blackout Titanium is ready to go into serial production. By buying our perks, you will enable us to get the production started with our German production partners. We should then begin assembling the Blackout Titanium within September this year.
Please note: If the production should not start an a result to the indiegogo-campaign, indiegogo will refund your money back to you!

Delivery
Please understand, that this product is a High Tech Tool, made out of the best materials available and also produced by high quality production machines to guarantee best possible finishing.
This takes time. Although the saying goes "Good things come to those who wait", we do not want you to wait too long. So delivery will be by end of February next year, as we want you to enjoy the new season with your new BlackOut Titanium.


Patented in USA and Germany
After developing the Blackout Titanium for 3 years and producing many tryouts on our way to perfection, we got approved International patents on the final product. Our main developer Michael, was finally satisfied with the Blackout Titanium, after insisting to reach the typical German "highest technical" outcome.

Here are some pictures of our way to perfection:
Stage One - first Product: Fully functional all in one tool, but disapproved by Michael: "This is not unique enough"

Stage Two - second product: All-In-One - yes, but the handling characteristics where not acceptable.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So after many tryouts, we kept working on the goal: A "UNIQUE, never seen before" tool must be developed. About one year ago, Michael had the idea for the new design. We all knew: that is what we want. The technical designers started to work on the production drawings, again and again optimizing the tool.
Now, we are proud to present our Blackout Titanium.


Responsible minded handling of the fish
One of our main reasons for developing the Blackout Titanium is the responsible handling of the fish. We at MANE are all passionate Anglers and we fish in many different regions, like Norway Deepsea, Red Sea, Lakeside, and last but not least Flyfishing at rivers. In our opinion, every Angler has the duty to treat the fish in the right way, not letting it suffer too much.
That is, why especially the PREY became what you can see. During development, it was changed to perfection many times. We do not use Lead, although quite heavy. We found, that only tungsten can satisfy our demand for highest standards.


Caught the fish - and then ... use the BlackOut Titanium
Imagine after successfull fishing,  you have to prepare the fish!
1. step: Opening the fish without cutting inner organs and destroying the taste of the meat: For that we developed the fascinating Blade with the rounded nose and the special shaped cutting edge.

2. step: Cleaning the fish with the Scraper


- "Sorry folks, the tool still can not swim on the surface, but we do need some targets for our engineering division" -

Next Steps - the Blackout Titanium Family
We are already preparing two new models of the Blackout Titanium. In addition to the presented Middle Size Version "Salmon", there will be a small Version, the "Blackout Titanium Trout" and a bigger Version, the "Blackout Titanium Barracuda".


About us
Our company, MANE UG, is a registered German company in Munich under Register Court: Munich - Commercial Register: HRB 188 851.
We have been developing and successfully selling amazing new tools for anglers since 2010. Please visit our Website and look at the FUNNEL 3 in 1 Threader .


Michael Mariotti, our chief development engineer, located at our company headquarter in Munich, Germany, is a certified toolmaker and worked in the field of Anglers for many years. At one point, he decided to develop tools which solve well known problems of Anglers.

Although produced in Germany, we offer our products for a reasonable price.


----------------------------------

Das ultimative - 5 in 1 - high Tech - Einhand - Anglerwerkzeug - das BlackOut Titanium

Warum all dies in einer Überschrift? Wir können nicht anders. Das ist das Ergebnis unserer Entwicklung.

Als Profiangler haben Sie es auf einen Blick gesehen: Das ist Ihr neues Werkzeug,
Als Hobbyangler werden Sie es schätzen lernen, denn es ist am Ende des Tages das was Sie brauchen um wirklich den Spaß beim angeln auszukosten.

Das Blackout Titanium wird Sie jahrelang begleiten. Kaufen Sie sich kein Arsenal an Billigwaren mehr, welches jedes Jahr erneuert werden muss. Das BlackOut Titanium besteht aus Titanium, Wolfram und hochwertigem Aluminium. Daher ist es natürlich rostfrei und salzwasserresistent.

Es ist das ultimative Werkzeug, gefertigt aus ultimativen Materialien in einem ultimativen Design.
Einige Schlüsselargumente:

  • Fünf Funktionen in einem Werkzeug
  • Klinge aus Titanium
  • Säge und Entschupper in der Klinge integriert
  • Besondere Form der Klingenspitze als Waidlochöffner
  • Betäuber aus schwerem Wolfram
  • Nierenkratzer im Betäuber integriert
  • Griff aus hochwertigem Aluminium
  • Alles integriert in einem unglaublichem Design


Unsere Fans - Unsere Unterstützer - Unsere Kunden
Alleine in Deutschland sind mehr als 3,5 Millionen Angler in Verbänden organisiert und somit ist Angeln der zweite Volkssport nach Fußball (den wir übrigens auch lieben).

Kaufen Sie das Blackout Titanium jetzt - unterstützen Sie uns jetzt - und erhalten Sie jetzt mehr als 20% Rabatt.

Denken Sie nur an die faszinierende Anzahl der Angler weltweit. Wir sind der festen Überzeugung, dass sehr viele dieser Angler vom Blackout Titanium fasziniert sein werden. Schon jetzt gibt es ein überwältigendes positives Feedback auf unserer Facebookseite .


Ihre Unterstützung
Das Blackout Titanium ist bereit für die Serienproduktion. Mit Ihrer Unterstützung, dem Kauf eines Perks, also der Vorbestellung, können wir mit unserem deutschen Hersteller die Produktion im September dieses Jahres starten.
Bitte beachten Sie an dieser Stelle: sollte der Produktionsstart mit Hilfe dieser Indiegogo-Kampagne nicht starten, erhalten Sie von Indiegogo den Kaufpreis zurück!

Auslieferungsdatum
Wir bitten um Verständnis, dass die Fertigung des Blackout Titanium, aus den sehr hochwertigen Materialien und auf Maschienen, die die Qualität sichern, leider Zeit benötigt. Wir versuchen mit der Auslieferung ab kommenden Februar zu beginnen. Somit steht der Freude an diesem Werkzeug in der Saison 2015 nichts mehr im Wege.


Patentiert in Deutschland und USA
Nach drei Jahren Entwicklungszeit und der Herstellung von vielen Prototypen, haben wir unser Ergebnis, das Blackout Titanium, in Deutschland und USA patentieren lassen. Natürlich erst, nachdem unser Chefentwickler Michael endlich zufrieden war, mit dem typisch deutschen Anspruch auf höchste Qualtität.

Im folgenden einige Schritte hin zur Perfektion
Stufe Eins: Die erste Version, eigentlich fertig für die Serienproduktion, wurde von Michael komplett verworfen: "Das ist mir nicht einzigartig genug!"

Stufe Zwei: die zweite Produktionsserie, "Alles in Einem - ja, aber das Handling ist nicht akzeptabel!" - Na gut Michael, dann machen wir halt weiter!!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Somit gingen wir den Weg weiter. Michael bestand auf einem "Einzigartigen, noch nie dagewesenen" Werkzeug, Vor ungefähr einem Jahr hatte er dann die zündende Idee, und die Funktionalitäten in dem neuen Design integriert. Jetzt mussten nur noch die technischen Zeichner unter den strengen Vorgaben von Michael, die richtigen Produktionsvorgaben erstellen.
Endlich können wir nun das Ergebnis präsentieren: Unser BlackOut Titanium


Verantwortungsvoller Umgang mit dem gefangen Fisch
Einer unserer Hauptgründe für die Entwicklung des Blackout Titanium ist der verantwortungsvolle Umgang mit dem gefangenen Fisch. Wir alle bei MANE sind begeisterte Angler. Ob in Norwegen beim Pilken, in Abu Dhabi am Riff, In Deutschland am See oder beim Fliegenfischen am Fluss, jeder Angler hat die Verpflichtung zum waidgerechten Umgang mit dem Fang.
Auch deswegen wurde der Betäuber stets weiter entwickelt. Dieser besteht nun aus Wolfram, anstatt aus Blei, um unseren hohen Ansprüchen zu genügen.


Fisch gefangen ! und jetzt ... benutzen Sie das BlackOut Titanium
Sie waren erfolgreich, jetzt muss der Fisch ausgenommen werden!
1. Schritt: Öffnen Sie den Fisch mit der neuartigen und patentierten Titaniumklinge und dem abgrundeten Waidlochöffner. Sie werden dabei keine inneren Organe verletzen. Somit bleibt die "Fisch"-Fleischqualität gewährleistet und der Geschmack des Fisches wird nicht zerstört.


2. Schritt: sauberes und einfaches ausnehmen mit dem Nierenkratzer.


- Leider kann das BlackOut Titanium noch nicht schwimmen, aber Michael braucht ja noch Aufgaben!! -

Die nächsten Schritte
Wir entwickeln derzeit bereits zwei weitere Modelle der "BlackOut-Titanium" Familie. Neben der inzwischen vorgestellten Version in mittlerer Größe, dem "Salmon" werden wir 2015 die beiden Modelle "Trout" als unser kleinstes Modell, sowie das große Modell "Barracuda" für  Meeresangler und "Großwildfischer" präsentieren.



Wir über uns
Unser Unternhmen, die MANE UG, ist ein in München ansässiges Unternehmen unter dem Registergericht:  München, Handelsregister: HRB 188851 und der

Umsatzsteuer-Identifikationsnummer gemäß § 27a Umsatzsteuergesetz: DE274782561.

Seit 2010 entwickeln und vertreiben wir innovative und neuartige Anglerwerkzeuge. So stammt auch der vielgelobte "Funnel 3 in 1 Einfädler" von uns.

We should then begin assembling the Blackout Titanium within September this year.Please note: If the production should not start an a result to the indiegogo-campaign, indiegogo will refund your money back to you!
DeliveryPlease understand, that this product is a High Tech Tool, made out of the best materials available and also produced by high quality production machines to guarantee best possible finishing. This takes time. Although the saying goes "Good things come to those who wait", we do not want you to wait too long. So delivery will be by end of February next year, as we want you to enjoy the new season with your new BlackOut Titanium.Patented in USA and GermanyAfter developing the Blackout Titanium for 3 years and producing many tryouts on our way to perfection, we got approved International patents on the final product. Our main developer Michael, was finally satisfied with the Blackout Titanium, after insisting to reach the typical German "highest technical" outcome.Here are some pictures of our way to perfection:Stage One - first Product: Fully functional all in one tool, but disapproved by Michael: "This is not unique enough"Stage Two - second product: All-In-One - yes, but the handling characteristics where not acceptable.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------So after many tryouts, we kept working on the goal: A "UNIQUE, never seen before" tool must be developed. About one year ago, Michael had the idea for the new design. We all knew: that is what we want. The technical designers started to work on the production drawings, again and again optimizing the tool.Now, we are proud to present our Blackout Titanium.Responsible minded handling of the fishOne of our main reasons for developing the Blackout Titanium is the responsible handling of the fish. We at MANE are all passionate Anglers and we fish in many different regions, like Norway Deepsea, Red Sea, Lakeside, and last but not least Flyfishing at rivers. In our opinion, every Angler has the duty to treat the fish in the right way, not letting it suffer too much.That is, why especially the PREY became what you can see. During development, it was changed to perfection many times. We do not use Lead, although quite heavy. We found, that only tungsten can satisfy our demand for highest standards.Caught the fish - and then ... use the BlackOut TitaniumImagine after successfull fishing,  you have to prepare the fish!1. step: Opening the fish without cutting inner organs and destroying the taste of the meat: For that we developed the fascinating Blade with the rounded nose and the special shaped cutting edge.2. step: Cleaning the fish with the Scraper- "Sorry folks, the tool still can not swim on the surface, but we do need some targets for our engineering division" -Next Steps - the Blackout Titanium FamilyWe are already preparing two new models of the Blackout Titanium. In addition to the presented Middle Size Version "Salmon", there will be a small Version, the "Blackout Titanium Trout" and a bigger Version, the "Blackout Titanium Barracuda".About usOur company, MANE UG, is a registered German company in Munich under Register Court: Munich - Commercial Register: HRB 188 851.We have been developing and successfully selling amazing new tools for anglers since 2010. Please visit our Website and look at the FUNNEL 3 in 1 Threader .Michael Mariotti, our chief development engineer, located at our company headquarter in Munich, Germany, is a certified toolmaker and worked in the field of Anglers for many years. At one point, he decided to develop tools which solve well known problems of Anglers.Although produced in Germany, we offer our products for a reasonable price.
----------------------------------Das ultimative - 5 in 1 - high Tech - Einhand - Anglerwerkzeug - das BlackOut TitaniumWarum all dies in einer Überschrift? Wir können nicht anders. Das ist das Ergebnis unserer Entwicklung.Als Profiangler haben Sie es auf einen Blick gesehen: Das ist Ihr neues Werkzeug,Als Hobbyangler werden Sie es schätzen lernen, denn es ist am Ende des Tages das was Sie brauchen um wirklich den Spaß beim angeln auszukosten.Das Blackout Titanium wird Sie jahrelang begleiten. Kaufen Sie sich kein Arsenal an Billigwaren mehr, welches jedes Jahr erneuert werden muss. Das BlackOut Titanium besteht aus Titanium, Wolfram und hochwertigem Aluminium. Daher ist es natürlich rostfrei und salzwasserresistent.Es ist das ultimative Werkzeug, gefertigt aus ultimativen Materialien in einem ultimativen Design.Einige Schlüsselargumente:
Fünf Funktionen in einem Werkzeug
Klinge aus Titanium
Säge und Entschupper in der Klinge integriert
Besondere Form der Klingenspitze als Waidlochöffner
Betäuber aus schwerem Wolfram
Nierenkratzer im Betäuber integriert
Griff aus hochwertigem Aluminium
Alles integriert in einem unglaublichem Design

Unsere Fans - Unsere Unterstützer - Unsere KundenAlleine in Deutschland sind mehr als 3,5 Millionen Angler in Verbänden organisiert und somit ist Angeln der zweite Volkssport nach Fußball (den wir übrigens auch lieben).Kaufen Sie das Blackout Titanium jetzt - unterstützen Sie uns jetzt - und erhalten Sie jetzt mehr als 20% Rabatt.Denken Sie nur an die faszinierende Anzahl der Angler weltweit. Wir sind der festen Überzeugung, dass sehr viele dieser Angler vom Blackout Titanium fasziniert sein werden. Schon jetzt gibt es ein überwältigendes positives Feedback auf unserer Facebookseite .Ihre UnterstützungDas Blackout Titanium ist bereit für die Serienproduktion. Mit Ihrer Unterstützung, dem Kauf eines Perks, also der Vorbestellung, können wir mit unserem deutschen Hersteller die Produktion im September dieses Jahres starten.Bitte beachten Sie an dieser Stelle: sollte der Produktionsstart mit Hilfe dieser Indiegogo-Kampagne nicht starten, erhalten Sie von Indiegogo den Kaufpreis zurück!AuslieferungsdatumWir bitten um Verständnis, dass die Fertigung des Blackout Titanium, aus den sehr hochwertigen Materialien und auf Maschienen, die die Qualität sichern, leider Zeit benötigt. Wir versuchen mit der Auslieferung ab kommenden Februar zu beginnen. Somit steht der Freude an diesem Werkzeug in der Saison 2015 nichts mehr im Wege.Patentiert in Deutschland und USANach drei Jahren Entwicklungszeit und der Herstellung von vielen Prototypen, haben wir unser Ergebnis, das Blackout Titanium, in Deutschland und USA patentieren lassen. Natürlich erst, nachdem unser Chefentwickler Michael endlich zufrieden war, mit dem typisch deutschen Anspruch auf höchste Qualtität.Im folgenden einige Schritte hin zur PerfektionStufe Eins: Die erste Version, eigentlich fertig für die Serienproduktion, wurde von Michael komplett verworfen: "Das ist mir nicht einzigartig genug!"Stufe Zwei: die zweite Produktionsserie, "Alles in Einem - ja, aber das Handling ist nicht akzeptabel!" - Na gut Michael, dann machen wir halt weiter!!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Somit gingen wir den Weg weiter. Michael bestand auf einem "Einzigartigen, noch nie dagewesenen" Werkzeug, Vor ungefähr einem Jahr hatte er dann die zündende Idee, und die Funktionalitäten in dem neuen Design integriert. Jetzt mussten nur noch die technischen Zeichner unter den strengen Vorgaben von Michael, die richtigen Produktionsvorgaben erstellen.Endlich können wir nun das Ergebnis präsentieren: Unser BlackOut TitaniumVerantwortungsvoller Umgang mit dem gefangen FischEiner unserer Hauptgründe für die Entwicklung des Blackout Titanium ist der verantwortungsvolle Umgang mit dem gefangenen Fisch. Wir alle bei MANE sind begeisterte Angler. Ob in Norwegen beim Pilken, in Abu Dhabi am Riff, In Deutschland am See oder beim Fliegenfischen am Fluss, jeder Angler hat die Verpflichtung zum waidgerechten Umgang mit dem Fang.Auch deswegen wurde der Betäuber stets weiter entwickelt. Dieser besteht nun aus Wolfram, anstatt aus Blei, um unseren hohen Ansprüchen zu genügen.Fisch gefangen ! und jetzt ... benutzen Sie das BlackOut TitaniumSie waren erfolgreich, jetzt muss der Fisch ausgenommen werden!1. Schritt: Öffnen Sie den Fisch mit der neuartigen und patentierten Titaniumklinge und dem abgrundeten Waidlochöffner. Sie werden dabei keine inneren Organe verletzen. Somit bleibt die "Fisch"-Fleischqualität gewährleistet und der Geschmack des Fisches wird nicht zerstört.2. Schritt: sauberes und einfaches ausnehmen mit dem Nierenkratzer.- Leider kann das BlackOut Titanium noch nicht schwimmen, aber Michael braucht ja noch Aufgaben!! -Die nächsten SchritteWir entwickeln derzeit bereits zwei weitere Modelle der "BlackOut-Titanium" Familie. Neben der inzwischen vorgestellten Version in mittlerer Größe, dem "Salmon" werden wir 2015 die beiden Modelle "Trout" als unser kleinstes Modell, sowie das große Modell "Barracuda" für  Meeresangler und "Großwildfischer" präsentieren.Wir über unsUnser Unternhmen, die MANE UG, ist ein in München ansässiges Unternehmen unter dem Registergericht:  München, Handelsregister: HRB 188851 und der 
Umsatzsteuer-Identifikationsnummer gemäß § 27a Umsatzsteuergesetz: DE274782561.Seit 2010 entwickeln und vertreiben wir innovative und neuartige Anglerwerkzeuge. So stammt auch der vielgelobte "Funnel 3 in 1 Einfädler" von uns.

story:
What is SKUTCH ?


Skutch: All geometry in one tool  

Skutch is above everything else a remarkable design object. Capable of everything you can expect and more from a tool of conception. Skutch goes beyond, allowing us to combine design and geometry in an instinctive and accurate manner. Skutch becomes as never before an extension of ones hand.



Its design: a revolution

Skutch is a tool that integrates its design as a part of its function. It has a unique shape that has been studied to allow the use of all geometric design functions without limiting creativity.



Solid and extremely light

Skutch is an alloy between sturdiness and design. Made out of anodized aluminum to prevent abrasion and corrosion. Skutch is available in four colors. Also, its laser engraved graduations guarantee an excellent resolution and accuracy as well as perfect resistance. 



A new form of design

Skutch is not just a tool, but also a variety of possibilities within our reach. Thanks to all the characteristics it offers, such as being able to draw circles, lines and angles; we have the necessary accuracy for the creation and experimentation of new forms of expression.



A universal tool inches/ cm

Whether you use metric units or inches, Skutch allows you to rapidly sketch, draw and design complex and precise shapes in both measurement units. No more conversion problems, Skutch permits you to draw in cm or inches with extraordinary precision, ranging from 1 mm to 1/16 inches.


The SKUTCH is here.




In the media 



How SKUTCH works

Skutch has a singular form as a result of several months of work. It is designed to be functional as well beautiful attention must be given to all its details. With the Skutch details, you can create anything.


1. Ruler in cm/ Precision 1 mm

2. Ruler Inches/ Precision 1/16 Inches 

3. Compass in cm

4. Compass in  Inches/ Inches and 1/2 Inches

5. Perpendicular Line

6. Angle 30°- 60°-90°

7. Angle of 2°to 50°/ Precison of 2°

8. Rounded corners

9. Easy attachment


Specifications



No Limits to Creativity



PERKS



Project Timeline



Who We Are

We are a group of design architects who met in Paris, where we worked for several years. Our approach is conceptual and creative. Although our first passion is drawing and design, that's why we worked several months on this tool that is meant to be an extension of the hand of the artist.

The packaging

We tried to work on a simple and elegant packaging.

Production process 

The production is provided by a French factory, the packaging and the entire shipment will be made from Paris to the different contributors.


Why did we choose crowdfunding?

We chose crowdfunding because I think today is the financing method closest to the user. It allows to exchange and share with the contributors, the only one that can exist on the project.

Why do we need your help?

We need your help because so you will believe in our project.

Where will the funds go?

The funds will help to ensure the production tools, packages and shipments to contributors. It is possible to succeed in our project if we can be able to provide and produce enough large orders.

Risks&Challenges

We pass by a single company to ensure the production allowing to deal with a single contact and better control of deadlines. There is always a risk of possible delays during the production of the project, however, we will try our best to keep delays to a minimum so, each delivery is on time as agreed.


FAQ

How do I pick the color?
After the campaign, we’ll reach out to everyone and have you select the color.


How can I buy a Skutch?

You can choose one of the counterparties to obtain a Skutch or a pack. You can pay by card or by Paypal service.

How is done sending?

The shipment is performed as standard, in a bubble envelope by mail. If you want to receive the package we recommend you to specify it in your order and calculate the additional costs.

How can I contact you?

The easiest way to contact us is by e-mail: skutchdesign@gmail.com, and we'll answer as soon as possible.

How can you help us?

To reach our goal, we need your help. You are the essence of this project! You can;

Contribute by acquiring a Skutch: Click in the right part of the campaign to be part of our counterparties.

Share our project through Facebook, Pinterest, or e-mail your friends, etc...

story:
Eboard Secure Mail

Eboard Secure Mail is a web based private messaging platform that is a more secure communication solution than current email systems. It is being designed and  run by me, Gabriel Evans. I have 11+ years of experience in Systems Design and Engineering. During my time working for everything from small local businesses to multinational enterprises, I have seen first hand the time, money and man hours spent on keeping users safe from phishing and malicious emails.

The Problem

Email is a vulnerable form of communication.

There are many problems with current email systems including:

∙ Phishing ∙ Spam ∙ Email Hijacking ∙

High Profile Incidents:

DNC and Hillary Clinton Hacked Email, Sony email hacking

Securing email systems is costly, complex and doesn’t always work

  • Expensive and complex spam filters
  • Incorrectly tuned email filtering systems
  • Messages are blocked that should be delivered and some are delivered that shouldn’t be.

Current Systems: Effects of Spam and Malicious Email

  • “Unsolicited mail now accounts for 86 percent of the world's email traffic, with about 400 billion messages sent each day.” – CISCO
  • “Researchers’ analysis put the cost of lost productivity due to SPAM at $14 billion, attributed mostly to time that workers wasted clearing their inboxes. Adding in additional outlays to organizations on SPAM filters, added storage and network bandwidth brings the overall cost of dealing with SPAM in the $20 billion ballpark.”  -Economics of Spam Study
  • “Verizon combined over eight million results of sanctioned phishing tests in 2015 from multiple security awareness vendors and found that:
    • 30 percent of phishing messages were opened by the target across all campaigns, up 30 percent from last year.
    • 12 percent of users went on to click the malicious attachment or link, up 9 percent since last year.
  • "Only 3 percent of the targeted individuals reported the phishing email to management.” Return Path
  • “The potential annual cost to a company in the event of a successful phishing attack is around $3.7 million.” Ponemon Institute

Our Solution

Eboard Secure Mail eliminates spam, phishing and email hijacking by ensuring messages stay on the server of origin. Utilizing an approval based contact and messaging system as well a secure push notification system for messaging events keeps your communication safe and secure.

Why Eboard Secure Mail?​

  • Familiar Webmail like interface
  • Contains all familiar features that current email has including but not limited to an inbox, outbox, sent items, mail organization and searching capabilties.

Note: Wireframe

  • Businesses can save millions of dollars in software and hardware support that normal email systems require to ensure safe messaging
  • Approval based Contact Management System
    • Users can only send and receive messages from users in their contact list. No more spam or phishing attacks from senders you don’t know.
  • Messages remain on the server of origin and are protected there.

What We Need & What You Get

 

Where we are

February 2017 Building MVP and Beta

  1. Development team for beta and future features secured
  2. Wireframes are being refined for UI, functionality and look and feel of the system
  3. Rollout of beta of core services scheduled for May 2017
  4. Future features identified including but not limited to dual factor authentication and subscription based group messaging

Where we are going

Looking to raise $150K for hosting, development, advertising and business startup costs

  1. Rollout dual factor authentication and subscription based group messaging
  2. Target price for subscription based messaging at $3 per seat
  3. Grow site traffic to fifty thousand users by end of year 2017
  4. Grow partnerships with local managed service providers to offer the service to their customers
  5. Launch systematic press campaign and raise brand awareness.

The Impact

In an online world where leaks are an everyday occurrence and malicious emails are a regular part of everyday life, we can work together to build a safer way to communicate. Through your donation you can become an important part of this campaign and help make safer communication a reality.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute you can still help:

  • You can help to get the word out about this exciting new system
    • Post on Facebook
    • Tell your friends
  • Contribute ideas. I am always open to new ideas and thoughts on how to make this solution even better!

story:
Overview
Airlid is a patent pending wide mouth water bottle lid with a magnetic handle that is compatible with many different brands of bottles; it’s a multi-purpose product that will expedite your timelines, improve your efficiency, help you to stay connected, and encourage you to maintain proper hydration throughout the day.

                                                                   

Grab and Go.
 Lightweight, minimal, and modern in design, simply use this lid on your bottle and go.
It's two functions in one, which will lessen the amount of items you need to pack in your bag for a day. Live conveniently with healthy mindset.

 

 

How it works

Simply stick the metal ring to the back of your phone and attach it to the lid handle. Using strong magnets and a reliable hinge, your phone will be supported at any angle or orientation that provides the best viewing.

 

Features and Benefit

    

 

 

IMPORTANT NOTE: Although the lid fits different sizes of water bottles (18 -64 oz), we recommend it using larger diameter bottles on hard surfaces with some water in it. This provides a stable base to support phones of various weights at various angles, with little or no water. Due to different sizes and weights of different phones and bottles, it is difficult for us to test each phone and bottle separately. Please do not mount your phone on the lid of an empty bottle, as it may not balance your phone and may damage it after it falls. If you are using it with small or light bottles, please make sure the bottle is full. For more info, please check our FAQ.

 

 

Airlid has been designed to fit wide mouth hydro flask bottles, but many other brands use similar neck and threads, so its compatible with many other brands too.If your bottle is within the guidelines below it will fit. 

If you have any question about the lid compatibility, please contact us at info@airlid.co, we will try our best to give you a satisfactory solution.

This lid is not compatible with Yeti, Manna, Tal, Hydro Flask growlers, standard mouth water bottles, internal thread water bottles, and all  bottles that don't meet the above guidelines.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

All Indiegogo campaigns come with risks and challenges, and ours makes no difference. Although we have already talked with the factory and the design house about the time for the completetion of this project and we do not see any direct risk and challenges but ,there are always indirect and unseen issues that may present during the manufacturing process.we will keep everyone updated on the progress and issues that may arise.

story:
Short Summary

We need to create small job opportunities  for young youths who do not have jobs. These will help them from being idle and decrease the number of crimes done. Many youths who are idlers intend to joing group gangs in participating in drags, alcoholism, sex and other crimes. So by opening small business for them to work will really help to keep their mind busy.  

What We Need

We just need those who are willing to support this campaign to raise funds so that we can be able to achieve our ambition. E.g Opening small shops, restaurants, purchasing small vehicles to work as Taxis, purchase  BodaBoda bike Ryders for the youths, Introducing more public vehicles and hire the youths as drivers and conductors and many other more.
story_txt:
Short Summary
We need to create small job opportunities  for young youths who do not have jobs. These will help them from being idle and decrease the number of crimes done. Many youths who are idlers intend to joing group gangs in participating in drags, alcoholism, sex and other crimes. So by opening small business for them to work will really help to keep their mind busy.  

What We NeedWe just need those who are willing to support this campaign to raise funds so that we can be able to achieve our ambition. E.g Opening small shops, restaurants, purchasing small vehicles to work as Taxis, purchase  BodaBoda bike Ryders for the youths, Introducing more public vehicles and hire the youths as drivers and conductors and many other more.

story:
Introducing Italian Spinner

 

A unique Italian design, high-level manufacturing and precious materials make our products different. 

Only on Indiegogo do you have the opportunity to personalise your fidget spinner.

Every product is composed of 1 frame, 3 weights, a bearing cup and an amazing hybrid ceramic bearing. 

The frame comes in 5 different shapes; each one can be plated in Yellow, Pink or White Real Gold. Each frame can be attached to a bearing cup and 3 weights in the 3 same plating options.

Below you'll find the 5 different frame shapes.

For each frame shape, you can choose a total of 9 combinations of plating options, as pictured below, 3 for the frame and 3 for the complements (bearing cup and weights).

 

 

Our Story 

Everything started with one idea, three friends and a lot of passion.

The idea was to create an exclusively high-end Fidget Spinner accessible to anyone. We spent hundreds of hours in design and product research, and now we are ready to show the world our product. We need your support to start mass production in order to grant you an accessible price for this exclusive product.  

 

Prototyping Steps

In our prototyping process, we tried many different procedures, machines and materials, each one tested many times to ensure the best product results.

Our final workflow is explained by the following steps:
 

Specifications


 

Risks & Challenges

We have the final product and our manufacturer is ready to produce. We will begin shipping out as soon as our campaign ends. We've invested a lot of our own time and money into researching and developing  before this Indiegogo campaign. So you don't need to wait too long for your spinner!

We are in partnership with one of the best Italian manufacturing companies. Lots of big fashion brands work with our partner, so we are sure that the production process will go smoothly.

We use a nickel-free Galvanic according to Italian law. 

We keep up good communication with our supplier.

We have the source for bearings, and they are coming from a large company in Canada. They are made out Hybrid Ceramic. We selected this out of dozens of different bearings because this bearing is the one we like the most in terms of sound, spinning time and durability.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you may be interested in the project, but at this stage are not interested in getting one of our Fidget Spinners. You can still help us by:

  • Spreading the word and making some noise about the Italian Spinner.
  • Use the Indiegogo tools to share our campaign with your friends and family.

 

FAQ

  • When the Italian Spinner will ship out? 
    • We will ship out our spinners to all the backers at the beginning of September. 
  • What are the Italian Spinner - Fidget Spinners made of? 
    • Our fidget spinners are made of a frame, 3 weights and a bearing cup in brass, hand polished gold plating, and 1 Hybrid Ceramic 608 Bearing. 
  • I am a wholesaler, who should I speak to if we want to distribute the Italian Spinner - Fidget Spinner? 
    • You can simply send an enquiry to our email: info@italianspinner.com.

 

Get in touch with us
